GP12nardp1_u:4427: bhavatpūrvaṃ brāhmaṇasya bhavanmadhyaṃ nṛpasya ca // NarP_1,25.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:4443: abhivādanaśīlaḥ syād vṛddheṣu ca yathākramam // NarP_1,25.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:4445: ādhyātmikā diduḥkhāni nivārayati yo guruḥ // NarP_1,25.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:4451: pāṣaṇḍaṃ patitaṃ vrātyaṃ tathā nakṣaghatrajīvinam // NarP_1,25.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:4453: unmattaṃ ca śaṭhaṃ dhūrttaṃ dhāvantamaśuciṃ tathā // NarP_1,25.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:4457: bhartṛnghīṃ puṣpiṇīṃ jārāṃ sūtikāṃ garbhapātinīm // NarP_1,25.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:4460: pratyekaṃ tu namaskāro hṝnti puṇyaṃ purākṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:4461: śrāddhaṃ vrataṃ tathā dānaṃ devatābhyārcanaṃ tathā // NarP_1,25.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:4462: yajñaṃ ca tarpaṇaṃ caiva kurvantaṃ nābhivādayet /
GP12nardp1_u:4463: kṛte 'bhivādane yastu na kuryā tprativādanam // NarP_1,25.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:4464: nābhivādyaḥ sa vijñeyo yayā śūdrastathaiva saḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4466: tasya pādau ca saṃgṛhya adhīyīta vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4471: pariveṣaṃ gate sūrye śrotriye gṛhamāgate // NarP_1,25.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:4473: saṃdhyāyāṃ garjite meghe hyakāle parivarṣaṇe // NarP_1,25.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:4475: manvādiṣu ca devarṣe yugādiṣu caturṣvapi // NarP_1,25.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:4477: tṛtīyā prādhave śuklā bhādre kṛṣṇā traghayodaśī // NarP_1,25.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:4478: kārttike navamī śuddhā māghe pañcadaśī tithiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4486: kārtikī phaālgunī caighatrīṃ jyaiṣṭhī pañcadaśī sitā /
GP12nardp1_u:4491: galagrahe durddine ca nādhīyīta kadācanā // NarP_1,25.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:4495: anadhyāye tu yo 'dhīte taṃ vidyādvrahmaghātakam // NarP_1,25.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:4496: na taṃ saṃbhāṣayedviprana tena saha saṃvaset /
GP12nardp1_u:4499: anadhītya tu yo vedamanyatra kurute śramam // NarP_1,25.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:4503: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ yaccānyatkarma vaidikam // NarP_1,25.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:4507: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde smārtācāreṣu varṇāśramadharmeṣvadhyayanādidharmanirupaṇaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:4513: adhītya gurave dattvā dakṣiṇāṃ saṃviśedvṛham // NarP_1,26.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:4515: dvijaḥ samudvahetkanyāṃ suśīlāṃ dharma cāriṇīm // NarP_1,26.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:4527: atikṛṣṇāṃ raktavarṇāṃ dhūrtāṃ naivodvahe dvudhaḥ // NarP_1,26.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:4528: sadā rodanaśīlāṃ ca pāṇḍurābhāṃ ca kutsitām /
GP12nardp1_u:4533: garvitāṃ bakavṛttiṃ ca sarvathā nodvahedvudhaḥ // NarP_1,26.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:4535: pragalbhāṃ vāguṇāṃ jñātvā sarvathā tāṃ parityajet // NarP_1,26.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:4536: bharttṛputreṣu yā nārī sarvadā niṣṭhurā bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:4537: parānukūlinī yā ca sarvathā tāṃ parityajet // NarP_1,26.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:4539: pūrvaḥ pūrvo varo jñeyaḥ pūrvābhāve paraḥ paraḥ // NarP_1,26.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:4542: brāhmeṇa ca vivāhena vaivāhyo vai dvijottamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4545: abhāveṣu tu pūrveṣāṃ kuryādeva parānbudhaḥ // NarP_1,26.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:4549: dhārayedvaiṇavaṃ daṇḍaṃ sodakaṃ ca kamaṇḍalum // NarP_1,26.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:4553: parānnaṃ naiva bhuñjīta paravādaṃ ca varjayet // NarP_1,26.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:4555: na saṃhatābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ kaṇḍūyedātmanaḥ śiraḥ // NarP_1,26.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:4559: nāroheduṣṭrayānaṃ ca śuṣkavādaṃ ca varjayet // NarP_1,26.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:4560: anya striyaṃ na gacchecca paiśunyaṃ parivarjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:4563: asūyāṃ matsaratvaṃ ca divāsvāpaṃ ca varjayet // NarP_1,26.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:4565: svakaṃ nāma svanakṣatraṃ mānaṃ caivātigopayet // NarP_1,26.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:4566: na durjanaiḥ saha vase nnāśāstraṃ śṛṇuyāttathā /
GP12nardp1_u:4567: āsavadyūtagīteṣu dvijastu na rartiṃ caret // NarP_1,26.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:4568: ārdrāsthi ca tathocchiṣṭaṃ śūdraṃ ca patitaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:4569: sarpaṃ ca bhaṣaṇaṃ spṛṣṭvā sacailaṃ snānamācaret // NarP_1,26.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:4570: citiṃ ca citikāṣṭaṃ ca yūpaṃ cāṇḍālameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4571: spṛṣṭvā devalakaṃ caiva savāsā jalamāviśet // NarP_1,26.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:4579: tāṃbūlamaśuciṃ nādyāttathā suptaṃ na bodhayet // NarP_1,26.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:4581: na vāmahastenaikena pibedvakreṇa vā jalam // NarP_1,26.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:4585: darśe ca paurṇamāsyāṃ ca yāgaṃ kuryādyathāvidhi // NarP_1,26.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:4589: darśe ca pretapakṣe ca śrāddhaṃ kuryādgṛhī dvijaḥ // NarP_1,26.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:4590: manvādiṣu mṛdāhe ca aṣṭakāsu ca nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:4591: nāvadhānye samāyāte gṛhī śrāddhaṃ samācaret // NarP_1,26.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:4593: puṇyakṣetreṣu tīrtheṣu gṛhī śrāddhaṃ samācaret // NarP_1,26.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:4594: yajño dānaṃ tapo homaḥ svādhyāyaḥ pitṛtarpaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:4595: vṛthā bhavati tatsarvamūrddhapuṇḍraṃ vinā kṛtam // NarP_1,26.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:4596: urddhapuṇḍraṃ ca tulasīṃ śrāddhe necchanti kecana /
GP12nardp1_u:4600: sadā cāraparā ye tu teṣāṃ viṣṇuḥ prasīdati /
GP12nardp1_u:4601: viṣṇau prasannatāṃ yāte kimasādhyaṃ dvijottama // NarP_1,26.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:4602: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde smārttadhermaṣu vedādhyayanādikasya gṛhasthadharmasya ca nirupaṇaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:4606: yadrūtāṃ sarvapāpāni naśyantyeva na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,27.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:4614: tathā vṛkṣasya cchāyāyāṃ kāntāre vahnisannidhau // NarP_1,27.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:4616: brāhmaṇānāṃ samīpe ca tathā goguruyoṣitām // NarP_1,27.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:4618: evamādiṣu deśeṣu malamūtraṃ na kārayet // NarP_1,27.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:4619: śauce yatnaḥ sadā kāryaḥ śaucamūlo dvijaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4621: śaucaṃ tu dvividhaṃ proktaṃ brāhmamābhyāntaraṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:4624: na mūṣakādikhanitāṃ phaālotkṛṣṭāṃ tathaiva ca // NarP_1,27.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:4626: śaucaṃ kuryātprayatnena samādāya śubhāṃ mṛdam // NarP_1,27.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:4627: liṅge mṛdekā dātavyā tisro vā meḍhrayordvayoḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4629: ekā liṅge gude pañca daśa vāme tathobhayoḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4630: satpa tisraḥ pradātavyāḥ pādayormṛttikāḥ pṛthak // NarP_1,27.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:4635: āture niyamo nāsti mahāpadi tathaiva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4640: evaṃ śaucaṃ tu nirvartya paścādvai susamāhitaḥ // NarP_1,27.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:4653: āyurbalaṃ yaśo varcaḥ prajāḥ paśuvasūni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4654: brahma prajñāṃ ca medhāṃ ca tvanno dhehi vanaspate // NarP_1,27.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:4662: jihvāmullikhya tābhyāṃ tu dalubhyāṃ niyatendriyaḥ // NarP_1,27.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:4664: tataḥ snānaṃ prakurvīta nadyādau vimale jale // NarP_1,27.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:4666: praṇamya tatra tīrthāni āvāhya ravimaṇḍalāt // NarP_1,27.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:4669: gaṅge ca yamune caiva godāvari sarasvati /
GP12nardp1_u:4672: āgacchantu mahābhāgāḥ snānakāle sadā mama // NarP_1,27.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:4673: ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśīṃ kāñcī hyavantikā /
GP12nardp1_u:4674: purī dvārāvatī jñeyā satpaitā mokṣadāyikāḥ // NarP_1,27.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:4678: paridhāyāhataṃ dhautaṃ dvitīyaṃ parivīya ca // NarP_1,27.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:4680: īśānābhimukho vipra gāyatryācamya vai dvija // NarP_1,27.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:4682: tatastu vāriṇātmānaṃ veṣṭayitvā samukṣya ca // NarP_1,27.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:4686: vinyasya hṛdaye tāraṃ bhūḥ śirasyatha vinyaset // NarP_1,27.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:4688: bhūrbhuvaḥ svastathātrāstraṃ dikṣu tālatrayaṃ nyaset // NarP_1,27.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:4690: āgaccha varade devi tryakṣare brahmavādini // NarP_1,27.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:4696: tāraṃ ca vyāhṛtīḥ satpa tripadāṃ ca samuccaran // NarP_1,27.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:4697: śiraḥ śikhāṃ ca saṃpūrya kubhayitvā virecayet /
GP12nardp1_u:4700: āpaḥ punantu madhyāhne sāyamagniścameti ca // NarP_1,27.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:4702: sumutriyā na ityuktvā nāsāspṛṣṭajalena ca // NarP_1,27.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:4704: ṛtaṃ ca satyametena kṛtvā caivādhamarṣaṇam // NarP_1,27.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:4706: tataḥ sūryāya vidhivadgandhaṃ puṣpaṃ jalāñjalim // NarP_1,27.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:4713: brahmaṇī caturānanākṣavalayā kumbhaṃ karaiḥ srukstravau bibhrāṇā tvaruṇendukāntivadanā ṛgrūpiṇī bālikā /
GP12nardp1_u:4714: haṃsārohaṇakelikhaṇkhaṇmaṇerbibārcitā bhūṣitā gāyatrī paribhāvitā bhavatu naḥ saṃpatsamṛddhyai sadā // NarP_1,27.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:4715: rudrāṇī navayauvanā trinayanā vaiyāghnacarmāṃbarā khaṭvāṅgatraghiśikhākṣasūtravalayābhītiśriyai cāstu naḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4717: dhyeyā sā ca sarasvatī bhagavatī pītāṃbarālaṅkṛtā śyāmā śyāmatanurjaroparilasadgātrāñcitā vaiṣṇavī /
GP12nardp1_u:4718: tārkṣyasthā maṇinūpurāṅgadalasadgraiveyabhūṣojjvalā hastālaṅkṛtaśaṅkhacakrasugadāpahmāśriyai cāstu naḥ // NarP_1,27.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:4724: gṛhasthasya sattāraḥ syājjapya evaṃvidho mune // NarP_1,27.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:4725: tato japtvā yathāśakti savitre vinivedya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4726: gāyatryai ca savitre ca prakṣipedañjalidrūyam // NarP_1,27.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:4727: tato visṛjya tāṃ vipra uttare iti mantrataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4730: prātarādeḥ paraṃ karma kuryādapi vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,27.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:4733: āturāṇāṃ tu rogadyaiḥ pānthānāṃ ca sakṛnmatam /
GP12nardp1_u:4736: śarvaryāḥ prathame yāme tāni kuryādyathākramam // NarP_1,27.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:4738: pāṣaṇḍaḥ sa hi vijñeyaḥ sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtaḥ // NarP_1,27.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:4758: dvijānāṃ bhojyamaśrī yātpātraṃ naiva parityajet // NarP_1,27.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:4759: saṃsthāpya svāsame pādau vastrārddhaṃ paridhāya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4760: mukhena vamitaṃ bhuktvā surāpītyucyate budhaiḥ // NarP_1,27.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:4762: pratyakṣaṃ lavaṇaṃ caiva gomāṃsaśīti gadyate // NarP_1,27.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:4764: śabda na kārayedviprastaṃ kurvannārakī bhavet // NarP_1,27.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:4774: putreṣu bhāryāṃ niḥkṣipya vanaṃ gacchetsahaiva vā // NarP_1,27.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:4779: varjaye dgrāmajātāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4780: aṣṭau grāsāṃśca bhuñjīta na kuryādrātribhojanam // NarP_1,27.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:4782: vyavāyaṃ varjayeccaiva nidrālasye tathaiva ca // NarP_1,27.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:4786: yadā manasi vairāgyaṃ jātaṃ sarveṣu vastuṣu // NarP_1,27.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:4792: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāpamānayoḥ // NarP_1,27.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:4798: japecca praṇavaṃ nityaṃ jitātmā vijitendriyaḥ // NarP_1,27.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:4808: nirguṇaṃ paramaṃ dhyāyedātmānaṃ parataḥ param // NarP_1,27.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:4810: sahasraśīrṣaṃ devaṃ ca sadā dhyāyejjitendriyaḥ // NarP_1,27.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:4812: sa yāti paramānandaṃ paraṃ jyotiḥ sanātanam // NarP_1,27.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:4814: sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yatra gatvā na śocayati // NarP_1,27.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:4816: nārāyaṇaparā yānti tadviṣṇaḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,27.106 //
GP12nardp1_u:4817: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde sadācāreṣu gṛhasthaāvānaprasthayatidharmnirupaṇaṃ nāma satpaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:4821: yacchrutvā sarvapāpebhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,28.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:4823: adhaḥ śāyī brahmacārī niśi viprānnimantrayet // NarP_1,28.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:4826: adhvānaṃ kalahaṃ krodhaṃ vyavāyaṃ ca dhuraṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:4827: śrāddhakarttā ca bhoktā ca divāsvāpaṃ ca varjayet // NarP_1,28.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:4828: śrāddhe nimantrito yastu vyavāyaṃ kurute yadi /
GP12nardp1_u:4838: ete niyojitavyā vai śrāddhe viprā munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:4841: kuṣṭī ca kunakhī caiva laṃbakarṇaḥ kṣatavrataḥ // NarP_1,28.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:4843: kuvādī parirvattā ca tathā devalakaḥ khalaḥ // NarP_1,28.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:4847: kuṇḍaśca golakaścaiva hyayājyānāṃ ca yājakaḥ // NarP_1,28.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:4860: tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya prātaḥ kṛtyaṃ samāpya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4863: sa kālaḥ kutapastatra pitṝṇāṃ dattamakṣayam // NarP_1,28.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:4864: aparāhnaḥ pitṝṇāṃ tu dattaḥ kālaḥ svayaṃbhuvā /
GP12nardp1_u:4865: tatkāla eva dātavyaṃ kavyaṃ tasmāddvijottamaiḥ // NarP_1,28.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:4867: rākṣasaṃ taddhi vijñeyaṃ pitṝṇāṃ nopatiṣṭati // NarP_1,28.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:4868: kāvyaṃ prattaṃ tu sāyāhne rākṣasaṃ tadbhavedapi /
GP12nardp1_u:4869: dātā narakamānpoti bhoktā ca narakaṃ vrajet // NarP_1,28.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:4871: viddhāparāhni kāyāṃ tu śrāddhaṃ kāryaṃ vijānatā // NarP_1,28.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:4873: pūrvā kṣaye tu karttavyā vṛdvau kāryā tathottarā // NarP_1,28.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:4875: tithiḥ sāyāhnagā yatra parā kāvyasya viśrutā // NarP_1,28.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:4877: naitanmataṃ hi sarveṣāṃ kāvyadāne munīśvara // NarP_1,28.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:4881: ubhau ca viśvedevārthaṃ pighatrarthaṃ trīnyathāvidhi // NarP_1,28.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:4885: vaiśyasya vartulaṃ jñeyaṃ śūdrasyābhyābhyukṣaṇaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,28.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:4887: ātmānaṃ vā niyuñjīta na vipraṃ vedavarjitam // NarP_1,28.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:4890: brāhmaṇānāṃ tu madhye ca dvāradeśe tathaiva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4891: apahatā ityṛcā vai karttā tu vikirettilān // NarP_1,28.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:4893: dattveti bhūyo dadyacca daive kṣaṇapratīkṣaṇam // NarP_1,28.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:4895: annadāne caturthī syāccheṣāḥ saṃpuddhayaḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,28.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:4898: yavosīti ti yavān kṣitpvā gandhapuṣpe ca vāgyataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4900: yā divyā iti mantreṇa dadyādarghyaṃ samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4905: śannodevyā jalaṃ kṣiptvā tilosīti tilānkṣaghipet // NarP_1,28.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:4907: yā divyā iti mantreṇa dadyādarghyaṃ ca pūrvavat // NarP_1,28.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:4911: agnau kariṣya ityuktvā tebhyo 'nujñāṃ samāharet // NarP_1,28.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:4913: kuruṣva kriyatāṃ veti kurviti brūyureva ca // NarP_1,28.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:4915: sāmāya ca pitṛmate svadhā nama itīrayet // NarP_1,28.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:4916: agnaye kavyavāhanāya svadhā nama itīha vā /
GP12nardp1_u:4919: agnyabhāve tu viprasya pāṇau homo vidhīyate // NarP_1,28.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:4920: yathācāraṃ prakurvīta pāṇāvagnau ca vā dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:4922: saṃdhāyāgniṃ tataḥ kāryaṃ kṛtvā taṃ visṛjetkṛtī /
GP12nardp1_u:4925: kṣayāhe caiva saṃprātpe svasyāgnirdūrago yadi // NarP_1,28.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:4928: yadyagnau juhuyādvāpi pāṇau vā sa hi pātakī /
GP12nardp1_u:4929: upāsanāgnā dūrasthe kecidicchanti vai dvijāḥ // NarP_1,28.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:4934: ye yatra vihitāḥ śrāddhe sāvadhānāṃ bhavantu te /
GP12nardp1_u:4935: iti saṃprārthayeddevānye devāsa ṛcā nu vai // NarP_1,28.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:4937: amūrtānāṃ mūrtānāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ dītpatejasām // NarP_1,28.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:4941: tataste brāhmaṇāḥ sarve bhuñjīranvāgyatā dvijāḥ // NarP_1,28.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:4943: yathaācāra pradeyaṃ ca madhunāṃsādikaṃ tathā // NarP_1,28.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:4945: yadi pātraṃ tyajetko 'pi brāhmaṇaḥ śrāddhayojitaḥ // NarP_1,28.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:4947: bhañjāneṣu ca vipreṣu hyanyonyaṃ saṃspuśedyadi // NarP_1,28.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:4953: trimadhu trisuparṇaṃ ca pāvamānaṃ yajūṃṣi ca // NarP_1,28.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:4957: brāhmaṇeṣu ca bhukteṣu vikiraṃ vikṣipettathā // NarP_1,28.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:4958: śeṣamannaṃ vadeccaiva madhusūktaṃ ca vai japet /
GP12nardp1_u:4959: svayaṃ ca pādau prakṣaghālya samyagācamya nārada // NarP_1,28.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:4963: acālayitvā pātraṃ tu svasti kurvanti ye dvijāḥ // NarP_1,28.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:4967: dadyācca dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā tāṃbūlaṃ gandhasaṃyutam // NarP_1,28.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:4970: bhoktā ca śrāddhakṛttasyāṃ rajanyāṃ maithunaṃ tyajet /
GP12nardp1_u:4975: paitṛkena tu sūktena homaṃ kuryādvicakṣaṇaḥ // NarP_1,28.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:4977: snātvā ca vidhivadvipra kuryādvā tilataparṇam // NarP_1,28.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:4980: paredyuḥ śrāddhakṛnmartyo yo na tarpayate pitṝn /
GP12nardp1_u:4981: tatkulaṃ nāśamāyāti brahmahatyāṃ ca vindati // NarP_1,28.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:4982: śrāddhaṃ kurvanti ye martyāḥ śraddhāvanto munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:4983: na teṣāṃ saṃtaticchedaḥ saṃpannāste bhavanti ca // NarP_1,28.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:4984: pitṝnyañjati yeṃ śrāddhe taistu viṣṇuḥ prapūjitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4987: yakṣāśca siddhā manujā harireva sanātanaḥ // NarP_1,28.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:4989: tasmāddātā ca bhoktā ca sarvaṃ viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ // NarP_1,28.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:4990: yadasti vipra yannāsti dṛśyaṃ cādṛśyameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4991: sarvaṃ viṣṇumayaṃ jñeyaṃ tasmādanyanna vidyate // NarP_1,28.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:4995: karttā kārayitā caiva sarvaṃ viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ // NarP_1,28.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:4997: kathitaḥ kurvatāmevaṃ pāpaṃ sadyo vilīyate // NarP_1,28.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:4998: ya idaṃ paṭhate bhaktyā śrāddhakāle dvijottamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5000: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde śrāddhakriyāvarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:5005: śrautaṃ smārttaṃ vrataṃ dānaṃ yaccānyatkarma vaidikam /
GP12nardp1_u:5006: anirṇītāsu tithiṣu na kiñcitphalati dvija // NarP_1,29.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:5010: nāgaviddhā tu yā ṣaṣṭī śivaviddhā tu satpamī // NarP_1,29.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:5012: darśaṃ ca paurṇamāsīṃ ca satpamīṃ pitṛvāsaram // NarP_1,29.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:5014: kṛṣṇapakṣe pūrvaviddhāṃ satpamīṃ ca caturdaśīm // NarP_1,29.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:5016: vratādīnāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ śuklapakṣo viśiṣyate // NarP_1,29.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:5018: asaṃbhave vratādīnāṃ yadi paurvāhnikī tithiḥ // NarP_1,29.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:5024: arddharātrādadho yā tu nakṣatravyāpinī tithiḥ // NarP_1,29.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:5028: arddharātradvaye syātāṃ nakṣatraṃ ca tithiryadi // NarP_1,29.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:5029: kṣaye pūrvā praśastā syādrṛddhau kāryā tathottarā /
GP12nardp1_u:5034: tataḥ syustithayaḥ puṇyāḥ karmānuṣṭānato divā // NarP_1,29.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:5037: tasyāṃ tu tadvataṃ kāryaṃ saiva kāryā vicakṣaṇaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5044: vṛṣabhe vṛścike caiva siṃhe kumbhe tathaiva ca // NarP_1,29.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:5046: tulāyāṃ caiva meṣe ca pūrvataḥ paratastathā // NarP_1,29.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:5048: kanyāyāṃ mithune caiva mīne dhanuṣi ca dvija // NarP_1,29.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:5054: dṛṣṭacandrā sinīvālī naṣṭacandrā kuhūḥ smṛtā // NarP_1,29.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:5059: kṣaye pūrvā tu karttavyā vṛddhau kāryā tathottarā /
GP12nardp1_u:5071: tatrecchayā ca saṃgrāhyā pūrvā vātha parāthavā /
GP12nardp1_u:5077: paredyureva viprendra sadyaḥ kālo vidhīyate // NarP_1,29.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:5079: sadyaḥ kālaḥ paredyuḥ syājjñeyamevaṃ tithikṣaye // NarP_1,29.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:5083: dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāmasti cetsā parā smṛtā // NarP_1,29.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:5085: traghayodaśī ca rātryante tatra vakṣyāmi nirṇayam // NarP_1,29.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:5086: pūrvā gṛhasthaiḥ sā kāryyā hyuttarā yatibhistathā /
GP12nardp1_u:5087: gṛhasthāḥ siddhimicchanti yato mokṣaṃ yatīśvarāḥ // NarP_1,29.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:5088: dvādaśyāṃ tu kalāyāṃ vā yadi labhyeta pāraṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:5090: śulke vā yadi vā kṛṣṇe bhavedekādaśīdvayam /
GP12nardp1_u:5091: gṛhasthānāṃ tu pūrvoktā yatīnāmuttarā smṛtā // NarP_1,29.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:5094: viddhāpyekādaśī grāhyā parato dvādaśī na cet /
GP12nardp1_u:5095: aviddhāpi niṣiddhaiva parato dvādaśī yadi // NarP_1,29.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:5099: dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāṃ nāsti vā vidyate 'thavā // NarP_1,29.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:5103: dvādaśī ca trayodaśayāmasti tatra kathaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,29.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:5107: dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāmasti tatraiva cāpare // NarP_1,29.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:5108: upoṣyā dvādaśī śuddhā sarvaireva na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5109: kecidāhuśca pūrvāṃ tu tanmataṃ na samañjasam // NarP_1,29.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:5111: pāraṇaṃ copavāsaṃ ca na kuryātputravāngṛhī // NarP_1,29.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:5115: nādyādvai yadi bhuñjīta surāpena samo bhavet // NarP_1,29.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:5117: prāyaścittaṃ muniśreṣṭha karttavyaṃ tatra yājñikaiḥ // NarP_1,29.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:5119: āpyāyasva ṛcā caiva somapāsta iti dvija // NarP_1,29.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:5123: yaḥ karoti vratādīni tasya syādakṣayaṃ phalam // NarP_1,29.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:5125: tasmāddharmaparā yānti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,29.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:5128: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde tithyādinirṇayo nāma ekonatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:5134: tatsarvaṃ niṣphalaṃ proktaṃ rākṣasaiḥ parisevitam // NarP_1,30.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:5139: brahmahā ca surāpī ca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5146: taddravyaṃ dhvajadaṇḍe tu dhṛtvā vanacaro bhavet // NarP_1,30.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:5152: yadi vanyairna jīveta grāme bhikṣāṃ samācaret // NarP_1,30.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:5156: gonimittaṃ dvijārthaṃ vā prāṇānvāpi parityajet // NarP_1,30.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:5163: hatvā tu vipramātraṃ ca caretsaṃvatsaraṃ vratam /
GP12nardp1_u:5165: dviguṇaṃ kṣatriyasyoktaṃ triguṇaṃ tu viśaḥ smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:5166: brāhmaṇaṃ hṝnti yaḥ śūdrastaṃ muśalyaṃ virdurbudhāḥ // NarP_1,30.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:5167: rājñaiva śikṣā kartavyā iti śāsteṣu niścayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5168: brāhmaṇīnāṃ vadhe tvarddhaṃ pādaḥ syātkanyakāvadhe // NarP_1,30.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:5170: hatvā tu kṣatriyaṃ vipraḥ ṣaḍabdaṃ kucchramācaret // NarP_1,30.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:5171: saṃvatsaraṃ trayaṃ veśyaṃ śūrdraṃ hatvā tu vatsaram /
GP12nardp1_u:5172: dīkṣitasya striyaṃ hatvā brāhmaṇī cāṣṭavatsarān // NarP_1,30.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:5174: prāvaścittaṃ vidhānaṃ tu sarvatra munisattama // NarP_1,30.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:5176: gauḍī paiṣṭī ca mādhvī ca vijñeyā trividhā surā // NarP_1,30.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:5178: kṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ vā gomūtrameteṣvanyatamaṃ mune // NarP_1,30.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:5182: tāmreṇa vāthaṃ pātreṇa tatpītvā maraṇaṃ vrajet // NarP_1,30.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:5184: ajñānādātmabuddyā tu surāṃ pītvā dvijaścaret // NarP_1,30.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:5190: tālaṃ ca pānasaṃ caiva drākṣaṃ khārjūrasaṃbhavam // NarP_1,30.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:5192: gauḍī mādhvī surā madyamevamekādaśa smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,30.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:5196: samakṣaṃ vā parokṣaṃ vā balāccauyaṇa vā tathā // NarP_1,30.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:5198: suvarṇasya pramāṇaṃ tu manvādyaiḥ paribhāṣitam // NarP_1,30.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:5208: guruṇāṃ yajñakatṝṇāṃ dhārmiṣṭānāṃ tathaiva ca // NarP_1,30.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:5210: kṛtānutāpo dehe ca saṃpūrṇe lepayed dhṛtam // NarP_1,30.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:5212: brahmasvaṃ kṣatriyo hṛtvā paścāttāpamavāpya ca // NarP_1,30.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:5222: gaurasarṣapamānaṃ tu hṛtvā hema vicakṣaṇaḥ // NarP_1,30.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:5226: hema kṛṣṇalamātraṃ tu hṛtvā sāṃtapanaṃ caret // NarP_1,30.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:5234: hatvā ca rajataṃ vidvānkuryāccāndrāyaṇaṃ mune // NarP_1,30.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:5245: haste gṛhītvā muṣkaṃ tu gacchandvai naiṛtīṃ diśam /
GP12nardp1_u:5246: gacchanmārgai sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ na kadācidvicārayet // NarP_1,30.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:5252: kārīṣavahninā dagdhaḥ śuddhiṃ yāti dvijottama // NarP_1,30.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:5258: gatvā śūdvāṃ gurorbhāryāṃ trivarṣaṃ vratamācaret // NarP_1,30.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:5260: pitṛvyabhāryāmatha mātulānīṃ putrīṃ ca gacchedyadi kāmamugdhaḥ // NarP_1,30.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:5264: dinatraye gate vahnidagdhaḥ śudhyeta nānyathā // NarP_1,30.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:5265: cāñjālīṃ puṣkasīṃ caiva snuṣāṃ ca bhaginīṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:5266: mitrastriyaṃ śiṣyapatnīṃ yastu vai kāmato vrajet // NarP_1,30.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:5278: kṛtvā saṃgaṃ tu ṣaṇmāsaṃ careccāndrāyaṇadvayam // NarP_1,30.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:5280: etacca triguṇaṃ proktaṃ jñānātsaṃge yathākramam // NarP_1,30.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:5281: maṇḍūkaṃ nakulaṃ kākaṃ varāhaṃ mūṣakaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:5282: mārjārājāvikaṃ śvānaṃ hatvā kukkuṭakaṃ tathā // NarP_1,30.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:5284: jatpakṛcchraṃ karivadhe parākaṃ govadhe smṛtam // NarP_1,30.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:5288: śuṣkakāṣṭatṛṇānāṃ ca drumāṇāṃ ca guḍasya ca // NarP_1,30.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:5290: ṭiṭṭibhaṃ cakravākaṃ ca haṃsaṃ kāraṇḍavaṃ tathā // NarP_1,30.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:5292: śukaṃ cāṣaṃ balākaṃ ca śiśumāraṃ ca kacchapam // NarP_1,30.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:5296: rajasvalāṃ ca cāṇḍālaṃ mahāpātakinaṃ tathā // NarP_1,30.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:5298: spṛṣṭvā sacailaṃ snāyīta ghṛtaṃ saṃprāśeyattathā // NarP_1,30.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:5302: snānadānajapādau ca bhojanādau ca nārada // NarP_1,30.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:5311: prāyaścittaṃ tu teṣāṃ ca kuryādevaṃ yathāvidhi /
GP12nardp1_u:5316: mahāpātakayukto vā yukto vā sarvapātakaiḥ // NarP_1,30.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:5317: vimukta eva pāpebhyo jñeyo viṣṇuparo yataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5319: yastu saṃsmarate martyaḥ sa muktaḥ pāpakoṭibhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5320: smṛto vā pūjito vāpi dhyātaḥ praṇamito 'pi vā // NarP_1,30.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:5322: saṃparkādyadi vā mohādyastu pūjayate harim // NarP_1,30.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:5326: mānuṣaṃ durlabhaṃ janma prāpyate yairmunīśvara // NarP_1,30.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:5331: paraṃ mokṣaṃ labheścaiva pūjite tu janārdane /
GP12nardp1_u:5335: labdhvemāṃ mānuṣīṃ vṛttiṃ rere darpaṃ tu mā kṛthāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5336: saṃtyajya kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ mohaṃ madaṃ tathā // NarP_1,30.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:5337: parāpavādaṃ nindāṃ ca bhajadhvaṃ bhaktito harim /
GP12nardp1_u:5340: yāvannāyāti maraṇaṃ yāvannāyāti vai jarā // NarP_1,30.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:5348: bhaktyā yajati yo viṣṇuṃ mahāpātakavānapi // NarP_1,30.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:5349: so 'pi yāti paraṃ sthānaṃ yatragha gatvā na śocati /
GP12nardp1_u:5350: sarvatīrthāni yajñāśca sāṃgā vedāśca sattama // NarP_1,30.110 //
GP12nardp1_u:5352: kiṃ vai vedairmakhaiḥ śāstraiḥ kiṃvā tīrthaniṣevaṇaiḥ // NarP_1,30.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:5354: yajanti ye viṣṇumanantamṛrtiṃ nirīkṣya cākāragataṃ vareṇyam /
GP12nardp1_u:5355: vedāntavedyaṃ bhavarogavaidyaṃ te yānti martyāḥ padamacyutasya // NarP_1,30.113 //
GP12nardp1_u:5357: jyotiḥ svarupaṃ paramacyutākhyaṃ smṛtvā samabhyeti naraḥ sakhāyam // NarP_1,30.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:5358: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde prāyaścittavidhirnāma ghatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:5368: ye narā dānaśīlāstu te yānti sukhino dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:5369: dharmaśūnyā narā yānti duḥkhena bhṛśamarditāḥ // NarP_1,31.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:5371: kradanto vistaraṃ dīnāḥ pāpino yānti tatpathi // NarP_1,31.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:5375: kvacidvai dāvarupeṇaḥ tīkṣṇadhārāḥ śilāḥ kvacit // NarP_1,31.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:5379: śarkarāśca tathā loṣṭāḥ sūcītulyāśca kaṇṭakāḥ // NarP_1,31.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:5381: kvacivdyāvrāśca garjante vardhante ca kvacijjvarāḥ // NarP_1,31.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:5387: vahṝntaścāyasāṃ bhāraṃ śiśrāgreṇa prayānti vai // NarP_1,31.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:5389: karṇābhyāṃ ca tathā kecidvahṝnto yānti pāpinaḥ // NarP_1,31.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:5393: śocantaḥ svāni karmaṇi jñānājñānakṛtāni ca // NarP_1,31.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:5394: ye tu nārada dharmiṣṭhā dānaśīlā subuddhayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5396: annadāstu munuśreṣṭha bhuñjantaḥ svādu yānti vai /
GP12nardp1_u:5409: anaḍuddo muniśreṣṭha yānāruḍhaḥ prayāti vai // NarP_1,31.23 //

GP12nardp1_u:5825: mākaraṃ traipathaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ sthāṇuṃ vaikarṇikaṃ tathā // NarP_1,33.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:5833: prāṇāyāma iti prokto dvividhaḥ sa prakīrttitaḥ // NarP_1,33.118 //
GP12nardp1_u:5837: evaṃ caturvidhaḥ proktaḥ prāṇāyāmo manīṣibhiḥ // NarP_1,33.120 //
GP12nardp1_u:5843: atisūkṣmā guhyatamā jñeyā sā brahmadaivatā // NarP_1,33.123 //
GP12nardp1_u:5848: na gṛhṇāti na tyajati vāyumantarbahiḥ sthitam /
GP12nardp1_u:5849: viddhi tacchūnyakaṃ nāma prāṇāyāmaṃ yathāsthitam // NarP_1,33.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:5851: anyathā khalu jāyante mahārogā bhayaṅkarāḥ // NarP_1,33.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:5855: samāmāhṛtya nigṛhṇāti pratyāhārastu sa smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,33.129 //
GP12nardp1_u:5859: mūḍhātmānaṃ ca taṃ vidyāddhyānaṃ cāsya na sidhyati // NarP_1,33.131 //
GP12nardp1_u:5873: dhyānaṃ kṛtvā muhurttaṃ vā paraṃ mokṣaṃ labhennaraḥ // NarP_1,33.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:5877: tena dhyānena tuṣṭātmā harirmokṣaṃ dadāti vai // NarP_1,33.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:5879: dhyānaṃ dhyeyaṃ dhyātṛbhāvaṃ yathā naśyati nirbharam // NarP_1,33.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:5884: yogī samādhyavasthāyāṃ na śṛṇoti na paśyati /
GP12nardp1_u:5885: na jighrati na spṛśati na kiñcadvakti sattama // NarP_1,33.144 //
GP12nardp1_u:5891: tannāśe nirmalaṃ brahma prakāśayati paṇḍitaṃ // NarP_1,33.147 //
GP12nardp1_u:5895: paśyanti yajjñānavidāṃ variṣṭāḥ parātparasmātparamaṃ pavitram // NarP_1,33.149 //
GP12nardp1_u:5899: ānandaṃ nirmalaśāntaṃ paraṃ brahmeti gīyate // NarP_1,33.151 //
GP12nardp1_u:5901: avikāramajaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ brahmeti gīyate // NarP_1,33.152 //
GP12nardp1_u:5910: vācyaṃ tu paramaṃ brahma vācakaḥ praṇavaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5913: tadabhyāsena saṃyuktāḥ paraṃ mokṣaṃ labhanti ca // NarP_1,33.158 //
GP12nardp1_u:5922: iti śrībṛnnāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde yoganirupaṇaṃ nāma trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:5928: yasya tuṣyati sarveśastasya bhaktiśca śāśvatam // NarP_1,34.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:5933: bhaja sarvātmanā vipra yadi muktimabhīpsasi // NarP_1,34.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:5934: ripavastaṃ na hiṃsanti na bādhante grahāścatam /
GP12nardp1_u:5935: rākṣasāśca na cekṣante naraṃ viṣṇuparāyaṇam // NarP_1,34.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:5938: pādau tau saphalau puṃsāṃ yau viṣṇugṛhagāminau /
GP12nardp1_u:5939: tau karau laphalau jñeyau viṣṇupūjāparau tu yau // NarP_1,34.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:5940: te netre suphale puṃsāṃ paśyato ye danārdanam /
GP12nardp1_u:5941: sā jihvā procyate sadbhirharināmaparā tu yā // NarP_1,34.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:5943: tattvaṃ gurusamaṃ nārita nata devaḥ keśavātparaḥ // NarP_1,34.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:5944: satyaṃ vacmihitaṃ vācmi sāraṃ vacmi punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5948: tanmanaḥ saṃyutaṃ viṣṇau sā vāṇī yatparāyaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:5951: ākāśamadhyagaṃ devaṃ bhaja nārada saṃtatam // NarP_1,34.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:5952: sthānaṃ na śakyate yasya svarupaṃ vā kadācana /
GP12nardp1_u:5961: parabrahmamayo devaḥ suṣutpa iti gīyate // NarP_1,34.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:5965: vartate yasya tasyaiva tuṣyate jagatāṃ patiḥ // NarP_1,34.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:5968: satkathāyāṃ ca ramate satkathāṃ ca karoti yaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5969: satsaṅgo nirahaṃ kārastasya prīto ramāpatiḥ // NarP_1,34.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:5971: karoti satataṃ yastu tasya prīto hyadhokṣajaḥ // NarP_1,34.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:5973: tasyāstuṣṭo jagannātho dadāti svapadaṃ mune // NarP_1,34.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:5977: mā kuruṣva hyahaṅkāraṃ vidyullolaśriyā vṛthā // NarP_1,34.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:5980: kiṃ na paśyasi devarṣe hyāyuṣārddhaṃ tu nidrayā /
GP12nardp1_u:5981: hataṃ ca bhojanādyaiśca kiyadāyuḥ samāhṛtam // NarP_1,34.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:5986: mā vināśaṃ vraja mune magnaḥ saṃsāragahvare /
GP12nardp1_u:5989: kimarthaṃ śāśvatadhiyā kuryātpāpaṃ naro vṛthā // NarP_1,34.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:5991: viśvāso nātra karttavyo niścitaṃ mṛtyusaṃkule // NarP_1,34.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6000: mānuṣyaṃ durlabhaṃ prāpya yo hariṃ nārcayetsakṛt /
GP12nardp1_u:6002: durlabhaṃ prāpya mānuṣyaṃ nārcayanti ca ye harim /
GP12nardp1_u:6003: teṣāmatīva mūrkhāṇāṃ vivekaḥ kutra tiṣṭhati // NarP_1,34.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:6011: tathaḥā carācaraṃ viśvaṃ viṣṇāviva pralīyate // NarP_1,34.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:6014: janmano maraṇaṃ nṝṇāṃ janma vai mṛtyusādhanam /
GP12nardp1_u:6015: ubhe te nikaṭe viddhi tannāśo harisevayā // NarP_1,34.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:6016: dhyātaḥ smṛtaḥ pūjito vā praṇato vā janārdanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6019: yaṃ samabhyarcya viprarṣe mokṣabhāgī bhavennaraḥ // NarP_1,34.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:6021: harināmni sthite lokaḥ saṃsāre parivarttate // NarP_1,34.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:6033: bhūyo bhūyo hitaṃ vacmi bhujamuddhṛtya nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:6040: narakāṇāṃ sādhanaṃ ca tasmāttadapi saṃtyajet // NarP_1,34.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6044: viṣṇau sthite jagannāthe na bhajanti madoddhatāḥ // NarP_1,34.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:6046: saṃsārasāgare magnāḥ kathaṃ pāraṃ prayānti hi // NarP_1,34.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:6048: naśyanti sakalā rogāḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ vadāmyaham // NarP_1,34.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:6050: itīrayanti ye nityaṃ te vai sarvatra vanditāḥ // NarP_1,34.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:6051: adyāpi ca muniśreṣṭa brahmādyā api devatāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6052: yatprābhāvaṃ na jānanti taṃ yāhi śaraṇaṃ mune // NarP_1,34.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:6054: hṛtpadmasaṃsthitaṃ viṣṇuṃ na vijānanti nārada // NarP_1,34.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:6056: hariḥ śraddhāvatāṃ tuṣyenna dhanairna ca bāndhavaiḥ // NarP_1,34.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:6062: haripūjāratānāṃ tu bhavatyena na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,34.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:6070: cauryeṇa rakṣitamiva viddhi lokeṣu niścitam // NarP_1,34.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:6074: hari bhakti yutā daivī taddhīnā hyāsurī mahā // NarP_1,34.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:6076: śreṣṭhāḥ sarvatra vikhyātā yato bhaktiḥ sudurlabhā // NarP_1,34.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:6078: kāmādirahitā ye ca teṣāṃ tuṣyati keśavaḥ // NarP_1,34.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:6081: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde haribhaktilakṣaṇaṃ nāma catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6085: paṭhatāṃ śuṇvatāṃ sadyaḥ pāparāśiḥ praṇaśyati // NarP_1,35.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6096: karmaṇā manasā vācā yo yajedbhaktito harim /
GP12nardp1_u:6097: sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ sarvalokottamottamam // NarP_1,35.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6101: yasya śravaṇamātreṇa vācimedha phalaṃ labhet // NarP_1,35.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:6108: tapasāṃ vikrayaṃ cakre vratānāṃ vikrayaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:6110: kālena gacchatā vipra jātau tasya sutāvubho /
GP12nardp1_u:6124: jīryanti jīryataḥ keśāḥ dantā jīryanti jīryataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6125: cakṣuḥśrotre ca jīryete tṛṣṇekā taruṇāyate // NarP_1,35.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:6127: balaṃ hataṃ ca jarasā tṛṣṇā taruṇatāṃ gatā // NarP_1,35.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:6128: kaṣṭāśā varttate yasya sa vidrānatha paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6132: balaṃ tejoḥ yaśaśvaiva vidyāṃ mānaṃ ca vṛddhatām /
GP12nardp1_u:6133: tathaiva satkule janma āśā hatyativegataḥ // NarP_1,35.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:6137: avamānādikaṃ duḥkhaṃ na jānanti kadāpyaho // NarP_1,35.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:6139: śarīramapi jīrṇaṃ ca jarasāpahataṃ balam // NarP_1,35.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:6141: evaṃ niścitya viprendra dharmamārga rato 'bhavat // NarP_1,35.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:6143: svayaṃ tu bhāga dvitaya svārjitārthādapāharat // NarP_1,35.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6147: annādīnāṃ ca dānāni gaṅgātīre cakāra saḥ // NarP_1,35.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6149: nāranārāyaṇa sthānaṃ jagāma tapase vanam // NarP_1,35.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6154: śiṣyaiḥ parivṛtaṃ tatra muniṃ jānanti saṃjñakam /
GP12nardp1_u:6155: gṛṇantaṃ paramaṃ brahma tejorāśiṃ dadarśa ha // NarP_1,35.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:6161: vinayāvanato bhūtvā provāca vadatāṃ varam // NarP_1,35.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:6169: bhaja viṣṇuṃ paraṃ nityaṃ smara nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum /
GP12nardp1_u:6170: parāpavādaṃ paiśunyaṃ kadācidapi mā kṛthāḥ // NarP_1,35.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:6173: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca mohaṃ ca madamatsarau /
GP12nardp1_u:6175: asūyāṃ paranindāṃ ca kadācidapi mā kuru /
GP12nardp1_u:6177: dayāṃ kuruṣva bhuteṣu śuśrūṣāṃ ca tathā satām /
GP12nardp1_u:6178: tvayā kṛtāṃśca dharmānvai mā prakāśaya pucchatām // NarP_1,35.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:6188: mārgaśobhāṃ ca dīpaṃ ca viṣṇorāyatane kuru // NarP_1,35.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:6192: vedāntapaṭhanaṃ caiva pratyahaṃ kuru śaktitaḥ // NarP_1,35.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:6198: ko 'haṃ mama kriyā keti svayameva vyaktintayat // NarP_1,35.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6199: mama janma kathaṃ jātaṃ rūpaṃ kīdṛgvidhaṃ mama /
GP12nardp1_u:6205: ko 'haṃ mama kriyā kā ca mama janma kathaṃ vada // NarP_1,35.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:6207: satyaṃ satyaṃ mahābhāgaṃ cittaṃ bhrātaṃ suniścitam /
GP12nardp1_u:6210: ahṝṅkāro manodharma ātmano nahi paṇḍita // NarP_1,35.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:6211: punaśca ko 'hamityuktaṃ vedamāle tvayā tu yat /
GP12nardp1_u:6212: mama jātyādi śūnyasya kathaṃ nāma karomyaham // NarP_1,35.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:6216: avicchinnasvabhāvasya kathyate ca kathaṃ kriyā // NarP_1,35.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:6218: anantasya kriyā caiva kathaṃ janma ca kathyate // NarP_1,35.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:6222: jñāne tvanāhate siddhe sarvaṃ brahmamayaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,35.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:6228: guruṃ praṇamya jānanti sadā dhyānaparo 'bhavat // NarP_1,35.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:6233: iti śrībṛhannārādīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde jñānanirūpaṇa nāma pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6237: yajñamālī sumālī ca tayoḥ karmādhunocyata // NarP_1,36.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6239: dhanaṃ dvidhā kaniṣṭasya bhāgamekaṃ dadau tadā // NarP_1,36.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:6240: sumālī ca dhanaṃ sarvaṃ vyasanābhirakataḥ sadā /
GP12nardp1_u:6241: apādānā dibhiścaiva nāśayāmāsa bho dvija // NarP_1,36.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:6257: ādade svayamarddhaṃ ca dadāvarddhaṃ yavīyase // NarP_1,36.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:6262: bhrātrā dattaṃ dhanaṃ tañca sumālī nāśayanmune /
GP12nardp1_u:6265: rājñāpi bādhito vipraprapede nirjanaṃ vanam // NarP_1,36.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:6277: yajñamālī sumālī ca hyekakāle mṛtāvubhau // NarP_1,36.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:6279: hariḥ saṃpreṣayāmāsa vimānaṃ pārṣadā vṛtam // NarP_1,36.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:6289: krośantaṃ ca sudantaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā manasi vivyathe // NarP_1,36.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:6293: asau sumālī bhrātā te pāpātmeti samabruvan // NarP_1,36.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:6295: manasā duḥkhamāpannaḥ punaḥ papraccha nārada // NarP_1,36.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6297: tadupāyaṃbadadhvaṃ me yūyaṃ hi mamabāndhavāḥ // NarP_1,36.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:6299: satāṃ sāptapadī maitrī satsatāṃ tripadī tathā // NarP_1,36.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6300: satsatāmapi ye saṃtasteṣāṃ maitraghī pade pade // NarP_1,36.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6301: tasmānme bāndhavā yūyaṃ māṃ netuṃ samupāgatāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6302: yato 'yaṃ mama bhrātāpi mucyate tadihocyatām // NarP_1,36.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:6310: purā tvaṃ vaiśyajātīyo nāmnā viśvaṅghabharaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6311: tvayā kṛtāni pāpāni ahantyagaṇitāni vai // NarP_1,36.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:6315: tadā vṛṣṭirabhūttatra tatsthānaṃ paṅkilaṃ hyabhūta // NarP_1,36.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6319: daṃśitaścaiva sarpeṇa prāptaṃ pañcatvameva ca // NarP_1,36.42,1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6321: viprajanma tvayā prāptaṃ hari bhaktistathācalā // NarP_1,36.42,2 //
GP12nardp1_u:6323: vasādya jñānamāsādya paraṃ mokṣaṃ gamiṣyasi // NarP_1,36.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:6325: upāyaṃ tava vakṣyāmastaṃ nibodha mahāmate // NarP_1,36.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:6329: tatphalaṃ pradadau tasmai bhrātre pāpavimuktaye // NarP_1,36.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6331: babhūva yamadūtāstu taṃ tyaktvā prapalāyitāḥ // NarP_1,36.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:6333: tadā sumālī svaryānamāruhya mumude mune // NarP_1,36.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:6343: sthitvā bhūmiṃ punaḥ prāpya vipratvaṃ samupāgataḥ // NarP_1,36.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:6347: tatra snātaśca gaṅgāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā viśveśvaraṃ prabhum // NarP_1,36.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:6351: akāmādapi ye viṣṇoḥ sakṛtpūjāṃ prakurvate // NarP_1,36.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6358: śuśrūṣāniratā yānti pāpino 'pi parāṃ gatim // NarP_1,36.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:6359: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde viṣṇusevāprabhāvo nāma ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6363: kasya no jāyate prītiḥ śrotuṃ harikathāmṛtam // NarP_1,37.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6366: sakṛdvā na namedyastu viṣṇuṃ pāpaharaṃ nṛṇām /
GP12nardp1_u:6369: śmaśānasadṛśaṃ taddhi kadācidapi no viśet // NarP_1,37.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:6372: yo vā ko vāpi viprendra vipradveṣaparāyaṇaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6373: samarcayati govindaṃ tatpūjā viphalā bhavet // NarP_1,37.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:6375: sā pūjaiva mahābhāga pūjakānāśu hṝnti vai // NarP_1,37.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6381: dṛḍhabhaktimatāṃ viṣṇau pāpabuddhiḥ kathaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,37.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:6383: kṣayaṃ yāti kṣaṇādeva teṣāṃ syātpāpadhīḥ katham // NarP_1,37.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:6385: caṇḍālā api vai śreṣṭhā haribhaktiparāyaṇāḥ // NarP_1,37.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:6391: sa snātaḥ sarvatīrtheṣu viṣṇoḥ priyataro bhavet // NarP_1,37.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:6395: ye prapannā mahātmānasteṣāṃ muktirhi śāśvatī // NarP_1,37.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:6405: na teṣāṃ śakyate vaktuṃ saṃkhyā vatsarakoṭibhiḥ // NarP_1,37.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:6411: chaditaṃ hemakalaśairdṛṣṭvā vyādho mudaṃ yayau // NarP_1,37.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:6417: cauryāntarāyakartāraṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā lubdhako mune // NarP_1,37.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:6421: hṝntuṃ kṛtamatiṃ vyādhamuttaṅkaḥ prekṣya cābravīt // NarP_1,37.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6423: bho bho sādho vṛthā māṃ tvaṃ haniṣyasi nirāgasam /
GP12nardp1_u:6424: mayā kimaparāddhaṃ te tadvadasva mahāmatte // NarP_1,37.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:6426: nahi saumya vṛthā ghnanti sajjanā api pāpinaḥ // NarP_1,37.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6428: virodhaṃ nahi kurvanti sajjanāḥ śāntacetasaḥ // NarP_1,37.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6430: tamuttamaṃ naraṃ prāhurviṣṇoḥ priyataraṃ sadā // NarP_1,37.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:6432: chede 'pi candanataruḥ surabhayati mukhaṃ kuṭhārasya // NarP_1,37.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:6433: aho vidhiḥ subalavānbā dhate bahudhā janān /
GP12nardp1_u:6435: aho niṣkāraṇaṃ loke bādhante bahudhā janān /
GP12nardp1_u:6443: ante tatsarvamutsṛjya eka eva prayati vai // NarP_1,37.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6444: mama mātā mama pitā mama bhāryā mamātmajāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6445: mamedamiti jantūnāṃ mamatā bādhate vṛthā // NarP_1,37.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:6449: mṛtamagnimukhe hutvā ghṛtānnaṃ bhuñjate hi te // NarP_1,37.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:6450: gacchantaṃ paralokaṃ ca naraṃ tu hyanutiṣṭataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6451: dharmādharmauṃ na ca dhanaṃ na putrā na ca bāndhavāḥ // NarP_1,37.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:6454: vṛthaiva vyākulā lokā dhanādānāṃ sadārjane // NarP_1,37.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6456: iti niścitabuddhīnāṃ na cintā bādhate kvacit // NarP_1,37.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:6458: tasmājjanma ca mṛtyuṃ ca daivaṃ jānāti nāparaḥ // NarP_1,37.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:6459: yatra kutra sthitasyāpi yadbhāvyaṃ tadbhaved dhruvam /
GP12nardp1_u:6460: lokastu tatra vijñāya vṛthāyāsaṃ karoti hi // NarP_1,37.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:6463: arjitaṃ ca dhanaṃ sarvaṃ bhuñjate bāndhavāḥ sadā /
GP12nardp1_u:6466: gulikaḥ prāñjaliḥ prāha kṣamasveti punaḥ punaḥ // NarP_1,37.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:6469: mayā kṛtā ni pāpāni mahānti subahūni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:6470: tāni sarvāṇi naṣṭāni viprendra tava darśanāt // NarP_1,37.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:6472: kathaṃ me niṣkṛtir bhūyo yāmi kaṃ śaraṇaṃ vibhoḥ // NarP_1,37.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:6474: atrāpi pāpajālāni kṛtvā kāṃ gatimāpnuyām // NarP_1,37.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:6475: aho mamāyuḥ kṣayameti śīghraṃ pāpānyanekāni samarjjitāni /
GP12nardp1_u:6476: prātikriyā naiva kṛtā mayaiṣāṃ gatiśca kā syānmamajanma kiṃ vā // NarP_1,37.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6477: aho vidhiḥ pāpaśatā kulaṃ māṃ kiṃ sṛṣṭavānpāpataraṃ ca śaśvat /
GP12nardp1_u:6478: kathaṃ ca yatpāpaphalaṃ hi bhokṣye kiyatsu janmasvahamugrakarmā // NarP_1,37.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:6481: uttaṅkaḥ patitaṃ prekṣya lubagdhakaṃ taṃ dayāparaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6491: prāpito 'smi tvayā tasmāttadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,37.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:6493: tasmānnato 'smi te vidvanmatkṛtaṃ tatkṣamasva ca // NarP_1,37.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:6495: pradakṣiṇātrayaṃ kṛtvā namaskāraṃ cakāra saḥ // NarP_1,37.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:6501: vareṇa tenoktaṅko 'pi prapede paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,37.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:6509: pādodakasya māhātmyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭāva bhaktitaḥ // NarP_1,38.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:6512: cakrābjaśārṅgīsidharaṃ mahāntaṃ smṛtārtinighnaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye // NarP_1,38.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:6513: yannibhijābja prabhavo vidhātā sṛjatyamuṃ lokasamuñcayaṃ ca /
GP12nardp1_u:6514: yatkrodhajo hṝnti jagañca rudrastamādidevaṃ praṇato 'smi viṣṇum // NarP_1,38.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:6516: vedāntavedyaṃ pukuṣaṃ purāṇaṃ taijonidhiṃ viṣṇumahaṃ prapannaḥ // NarP_1,38.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:6518: jñānaikavedyo bhagavānanādiḥ prasīdatāṃ vyaṣṭisa praṣṭirupaḥ // NarP_1,38.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:6520: nityaḥ prapannārti haraḥ parātmā dayāṃbudhirme varadastu bhaghūyāt // NarP_1,38.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6522: tvameva tatsarvamanantasāraṃ tvattaḥ paraṃ nāsti yataḥ parātman // NarP_1,38.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:6524: nirañjanaṃ nirmalamaprameyaṃ paśyanti santaḥ paramārthasaṃjñam // NarP_1,38.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:6526: tathaiva sarveṣvara eka eva pradṛśyate bhinna ivārivalātmā // NarP_1,38.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:6528: ta eva māyārahitāstadeva pasaayanti sarvātmakamātmarupam // NarP_1,38.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:6540: indriyāṇi mano buddhiḥ sattvaṃ tejo balaṃ dhṛtiḥ // NarP_1,38.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:6544: ye prapannā mahātmānasteṣāṃ muktirhi śāśvatī // NarP_1,38.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:6545: varaṃ vareṇyaṃ varadaṃ purāṇaṃ sanātanaṃ sarvagataṃ samastam /
GP12nardp1_u:6546: nato 'smi bhūyo 'pi nato 'smi bhūyo 'pi nato 'smi bhūyaḥ // NarP_1,38.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:6548: yannāma duṣkarmanivāraṇāyacaya tamaprameyaṃ puruṣaṃ bhajāmi // NarP_1,38.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:6556: viṣṇusaṃjñaṃ jagaddhāma tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // NarP_1,38.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:6557: yaṃ bhajanti kriyāniṣṭāyaṃ paśyanti ca yoginaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6558: pūjyātpūjyataraṃ śāntaṃ gato 'smi śaraṇaṃ prabhum // NarP_1,38.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:6559: yaṃ na paśyanti vidvāṃso ya etadvyāvya tiṣṭati /
GP12nardp1_u:6565: sarvajñaṃ sarvagaṃ śāntaṃ sarvāntayā miṇaṃ harim /
GP12nardp1_u:6566: jñānātmakaṃ jñānanidhiṃ jñānasaṃsthaṃ vibhuṃ bhaje // NarP_1,38.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6572: yaḥ pāti lokānparipūrṇabhāvastamaprameyaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye // NarP_1,38.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6573: sahasraśīrṣaṃ ca sahasrapādaṃ sahasrabāhuḥ ca sahasranetram /
GP12nardp1_u:6578: vijñānabhedaṃ pratipannakalpaṃ na vāṅmayaṃ prāṇamayaṃ bhajāmi // NarP_1,38.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:6579: na yasya rūpaṃ na balaprabhāvo na yasya karmāṇi na yatpramāṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:6580: jānanti devā kamalodbhavādyastoṣyāmyahaṃ taṃ kathamātmarūpam // NarP_1,38.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:6581: saṃsārasidhau patitaṃ kadaryaṃ mohākulaṃ kāmaśatena baddham /
GP12nardp1_u:6582: akīrtibhājaṃ piśunaṃ kṛtaghnaṃ sadāśuciṃ pāparataṃ pramanyum /
GP12nardp1_u:6583: dayāṃbudhe pāhi bhayākulaṃ māṃ punaḥ punastvāṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye // NarP_1,38.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:6597: varaṃ vṛṇuṣva vatseti provāca munipuṅgavam // NarP_1,38.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:6598: asādhyaṃ nāsti kiñcitte prasanne mayi sattama /
GP12nardp1_u:6600: punaḥ praṇamya taṃ prāha devadevaṃ janārddanam // NarP_1,38.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6601: kiṃ māṃ mohayasīśa tvaṃ kimanyairdeva me varaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6603: kīṭeṣu pakṣiṣu mṛgeṣu sarīsṛpeṣu rakṣaḥ piśācamanujeṣvapi yatra tatrajajātasya me bhavatu keśava te prasāddāttvayyeva bhaktiracalāvyabhicāraṇī ca // NarP_1,38.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:6604: evamastviti lokeśaḥ śaṅkhaprāntena saṃspṛśan divyajñānaṃ dadau tasmai yogināmapidurlamabhagham // NarP_1,38.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:6605: puḥ stuvantaṃ viprendraṃ devadevo janārddanaḥ idamāha smitamukho hastaṃ tacchirasi nyasan // NarP_1,38.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:6608: tvayā kṛtamidaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ paṭhetsatataṃ naraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6617: āvāpa duravāpaṃ vai tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,38.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:6618: pūjito namito vāpi saṃsmṛto vāpi mokṣadaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6623: so 'pi sarvāghanirmuktaḥ prayāti bhavanaṃ hareḥ // NarP_1,38.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:6624: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde viṣṇumāhātmyaṃ nāmāṣṭatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6630: śṛṇvatāṃ vadatāṃ caiva tadbhaktānāṃ viśeṣataḥ // NarP_1,39.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:6634: durvṛttā vā suvṛttā vā tebhyo nityaṃ namonamaḥ // NarP_1,39.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:6637: dṛṣṭaḥ smṛtaḥ pūjito vā dhyātaḥ praṇamito 'pi vā /
GP12nardp1_u:6640: cintayedyo harernāma tasmai nityaṃ namo namaḥ // NarP_1,39.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6642: yeṣāṃ muktiḥ karasthaiva yogināmapi durlabhā // NarP_1,39.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:6644: vadatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva sarvapāpa praṇāśanam // NarP_1,39.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:6651: sa tatra nṛpaśārdūlaḥ sadā saṃmārjane rataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6663: tanme vada mahābhāga kiṃ tvayā viditaṃ phalam // NarP_1,39.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:6667: tathāpi kiṃ mahābhāga etayoḥ satatodyataḥ // NarP_1,39.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:6668: sarvātmanā mahāpuṇyaṃ nareśa vidita ca yat /
GP12nardp1_u:6669: tad brūhi me guhyatamaṃ prītirmayi tavāsti cet // NarP_1,39.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:6678: piśuno niṣṭhuraścaiva hyapaṇyānāṃ ca vikrayī // NarP_1,39.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:6681: sa kadāciddharthaṃ tu pṛthivyāṃ paryaṭan dvijaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6683: tasminmṛte tasya bhāryā nāmnā bandhumatī mune /
GP12nardp1_u:6684: kāmacāraparā sā tu parityaktā ca bandhubhiḥ // NarP_1,39.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:6688: gāvaśca viprā bahavo nihatā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ // NarP_1,39.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6692: kadācitkāmasaṃtapto gantu kāmo ratiṃ striyaḥ // NarP_1,39.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6693: śūnyaṃ viṣṇugṛhaṃ dṛṣṭvā praviṣṭaśca striyā saha /
GP12nardp1_u:6694: niśi rāmopabhogārthaṃ śayitaṃ tatra kāminā // NarP_1,39.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6700: evaṃ sthite viṣṇugṛhe hyāgatāḥ purapālakāḥ // NarP_1,39.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:6701: jāro 'yamiti māṃ tāṃ ca hatavantaḥ prasahya vai /
GP12nardp1_u:6702: āvāṃ nihatya te sarve nivṛttāḥ purakṣakāḥ // NarP_1,39.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:6708: tatra sthitvā brahmakalpaśataṃ sāgraṃ dvijottama // NarP_1,39.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6710: tataśca bhūmibhāgeṣu devayogeṣu vai kramāt // NarP_1,39.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:6714: bhaktyā kurvanti ye saṃtasteṣāṃ puṇyaṃ na vedyaham // NarP_1,39.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:6716: yatiṣye parayā bhaktyā hyahaṃ jātismaro yataḥ // NarP_1,39.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:6720: bhaktibhadbhiḥ praśāntaiśca kiṃ punaḥ samyagarcanāt // NarP_1,39.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6725: anityā bāndhavāḥ sarve vibhavo naiva śāśvataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6726: nityaṃ sannihito mṛtyuḥ kartavyo dharmasaṃgrahaḥ // NarP_1,39.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:6727: ajño loko vṛthā garvaṃ kariṣyati mahoddhataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6734: sarvabhūtadayā vāpi sulabhā yasya kasya cit // NarP_1,39.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:6736: durlabhaṃ prāpyaṃ mānuṣyaṃ na tathā gamayed budhaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6740: bhrātarāśraya govindaṃ mā vilaṃbaṃ kuru priya /
GP12nardp1_u:6741: āsannameva nagaraṃ kṛtāntasya hi dṛśyate // NarP_1,39.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6745: ye prapannā mahātmānaste kṛtārthā na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,39.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:6751: pānīyaṃ vā phalaṃ vāpi sa eva bhagavatpriyaḥ // NarP_1,39.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:6752: viṣṇubhaktiparāṇāṃ tu śuśrūṣāṃ kurvate tu ye /
GP12nardp1_u:6754: ye yañjati spṛhāśūnyā haribhaktān hariṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:6755: ta eva bhuvanaṃ sarvaṃ puṃnati svāṅghripāṃśunā // NarP_1,39.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:6758: pūjyamānā ca tulasī yasya tiṣṭati veśmani /
GP12nardp1_u:6761: na bādhante grahāstatra bhūtavetāla kādayaḥ // NarP_1,39.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:6767: sāṃgā vedāstathā sarve viṣṇorūpaṃ prakīrtitam // NarP_1,39.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:6769: te 'pi yānti paraṃ sthānaṃ sarvakarmanibarhaṇam // NarP_1,39.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:6770: iti bṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathama pāde viṣṇumāhātmyaṃ nāma ekonacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6773: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi vibhūtiṃ vaiṣṇavīṃ mune /
GP12nardp1_u:6774: yāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ kīrtayatāṃ sadyaḥ pāpakṣayo bhavet // NarP_1,40.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6781: atītabrahmaṇaḥ kalpe sṛṣṭiḥ kīdṛgvidhā prabho // NarP_1,40.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:6782: indrastu kīdṛśaḥ prokto vivudhāḥ kīdṛśāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6783: teṣāṃ ca kīdṛśaṃ karma yathāvadvaktumarhasi // NarP_1,40.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:6785: na jñāyate mayā śakra pūrvedyuścaritaṃ vidheḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6788: yo vijānāti taṃ te 'dya kathayāmi niśāmaya // NarP_1,40.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6789: sudharma iti vikhyātaḥ kaścidāste pure tava /
GP12nardp1_u:6791: sa vā eta dvijānāti kathayāmi niśāmaya /
GP12nardp1_u:6795: dṛṣṭvā yathārhaṃ devarṣe pūjayāmāsa sādaram // NarP_1,40.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:6804: dānena vā tapobhirvā kathametādṛśaḥ prabho // NarP_1,40.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:6809: ekasmin divase śakra manavaśca caturdaśa // NarP_1,40.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:6811: indrāṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ manvādīnāṃ ca vāsava // NarP_1,40.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:6812: tulyatā tejasā lakṣmyā prabhāveṇa balena ca /
GP12nardp1_u:6813: teṣāṃ nāmāni vakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva susamāhitaḥ // NarP_1,40.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:6820: bhautyaścaturdaśaḥ prokta ete hi manavaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6831: amitābhādayo devāḥ ṣaṣṭhe 'pi ca tathā śṛṇu /
GP12nardp1_u:6832: āryādyā vibudhāḥ proktāsteṣā mindro manojavaḥ // NarP_1,40.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:6840: vihṝṅgṝmādyā devāśca teṣāmindro vṛṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,40.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6842: krabhuvanāmā ca devendro harinābhāstathā surāḥ // NarP_1,40.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6845: caturdaśe cākṣupādyā devā indraḥ śuciḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6846: evaṃ te manavaḥ proktā indrā devāśca tattvataḥ // NarP_1,40.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:6849: karttāro bahavaḥ saṃti tatsaṃkhyāṃ vetti kovidaḥ // NarP_1,40.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:6850: mayi sthite brahmaloke brahmāṇāṃ bahavo gatāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6851: teṣāṃ saṃkhyā na saṃkhyātu śakto 'smyadya dvijottama // NarP_1,40.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:6855: tataḥ paraṃ gamiṣyāmi karmabhūmiṃ śṛṇuṣva me // NarP_1,40.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6856: mayā kṛtaṃ purā karma vakṣyāmi tava suvrata /
GP12nardp1_u:6858: ahamāṃsa purā śakra gṛdhraḥ pāpo viśeṣataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6865: gataḥ pradakṣiṇā kāraṃ viṣṇostanmandiraṃ prabho // NarP_1,40.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:6867: mama cāpi śunaścāpi dattāvanparamaṃ padam // NarP_1,40.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6869: saṃprāptaṃ vibudhaśreṣṭha kiṃ punaḥ samyagarcanāt // NarP_1,40.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:6876: kathaṃ bhavatyugrabhavasya bandhastatsaṅgalubdhā yadi muktibhājaḥ // NarP_1,40.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:6877: ye mānavāḥ pratidinaṃ parimuktasaṅgā nārāyaṇaṃ garuḍavāhanamarcayanti /
GP12nardp1_u:6878: te sarvapāpanikaraiḥ parito vimuktā viṣṇoḥ padaṃ śubhataraṃ pratiyānti hṛṣṭāḥ // NarP_1,40.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:6879: ye mānavā vigatarāgaparāvarajñā nārāyaṇaṃ suraguruṃ satataṃ smaranti /
GP12nardp1_u:6880: dhyānena tena hatakilbiṣacetanāste mātuḥ payodhararasaṃ na punaḥ pibanti // NarP_1,40.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:6882: te vā puṃnati ca jaganti śarīrasaṃgāt saṃbhāṣaṇādapi tato harireva pūjyaḥ // NarP_1,40.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:6884: tatraiva sakalaṃ bhadraṃ yathā nimne jalaṃ dvija // NarP_1,40.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:6888: pṛjyasya muniśreṣṭha paraṃ śreyo bhaviṣyati // NarP_1,40.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:6889: pūjayanti hariṃ ye tu niṣkāmāḥ śuddhamānasāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6890: teṣāṃ viṣṇuḥ prasannātmā sarvānkāmān prayacchati // NarP_1,40.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6895: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde viṣṇumāhātmye catvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6898: ākhyātaṃ bhavatā sarvaṃ mune tattvārtha kovida /
GP12nardp1_u:6904: tathā vināsamāyāti dharṃma eva mahītale // NarP_1,41.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:6905: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliśceti caturyugam /
GP12nardp1_u:6908: kālato veditavyāni ityuktaṃ tattvā darśibhiḥ // NarP_1,41.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:6910: tataśca dvāparaṃ prāhuḥ kalimantyaṃ viduḥ kramāt // NarP_1,41.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:6912: nāsankṛtayuge vipra sarve devasamāḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,41.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6913: sarve hṛṣṭāśca dharmiṣṭā na tatra krayavikrayau /
GP12nardp1_u:6914: vedānāṃ ca vibhāgaśca na yuge kṛtasaṃjñake // NarP_1,41.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:6926: haristu raktātāṃ yāti kiñcitkleśānvitā janāḥ // NarP_1,41.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:6929: dvipādo vartate dharmo dvāpare ca munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:6936: adharmasya prabhāveṇa kṣīyante ca prajāstathā // NarP_1,41.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:6938: kecitpuṇyaratān dṛṣṭvā asūyāṃ vipra kurvate // NarP_1,41.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:6940: dharmaḥ kaliyuge prāpte pādenaikena vartate // NarP_1,41.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:6942: yaḥ kaścidapi dharmātmā yajñācārānkaroti ca // NarP_1,41.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:6944: naraṃ dharmarataṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve 'sūyāṃ prakurvate // NarP_1,41.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:6948: prajāścālpāyuṣaḥ sarvā bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // NarP_1,41.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:6951: kaliṃ vistarato brūhi tvaṃ hi dharmavidāṃ varaḥ // NarP_1,41.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:6953: kimāhārāḥ kimācārāḥ bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // NarP_1,41.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:6960: ghore kaliyuge prāpte dvijā vedaparāṅmukhāḥ // NarP_1,41.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6964: adharmalolupāḥ sarvale tathā vaitaṃhikā narāḥ // NarP_1,41.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6965: ataḥ svalpāyuṣaḥ sarve bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge /
GP12nardp1_u:6968: vyātkrameṇa prajāḥ sarvā mniyante pāpatatparāḥ // NarP_1,41.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:6971: śūdratulyā bhaviṣyanti sarve varṇā kalau yuge /
GP12nardp1_u:6972: uttamā nīcatāṃ yānti nīcāścottamatāṃ tathā // NarP_1,41.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:6977: dviṣanti pitaraṃ putrā bhartāraṃ ca striyo 'khilāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6980: ghore kaliyuge vipra sarve pāparatā janāḥ // NarP_1,41.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6983: pṛthvī niṣphalatāṃ yāti bījaṃ puṣpaṃ vinaśyati /
GP12nardp1_u:6987: sādhūnāṃ vidhavānāṃ ca vittānya paharanti ca /
GP12nardp1_u:6988: na vratāni cariṣyanti brāhmaṇā dravyalolupāḥ // NarP_1,41.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:6990: dvijāḥ kurvanti daṃbhārthaṃ pitṛśrāddhādikāḥ kriyāḥ // NarP_1,41.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:6992: dugdhalobhanimittena goṣu prītiṃ ca kurvate // NarP_1,41.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6993: na kurvanti tathā viprāḥ snānaśaucādikāḥ kriyāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6996: na kasyāpi mano vipra viṣṇubhaktiparaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,41.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:6999: dānahīnā narāḥ sarve ghore kaliyuge mune /
GP12nardp1_u:7026: bhaviṣyanti narā vipra kalau cādharmabāndhavāḥ // NarP_1,41.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:7028: ghore kaliyuge vipra pañcavarṣā prasūyate // NarP_1,41.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:7034: nidāṃ kurvanti satataṃ pitṛmātṛsuteṣu ca // NarP_1,41.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:7038: prapuṣyanti vṛthaivāmī na vicārya ca duṣkṛtam // NarP_1,41.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:7040: dharmakārye rataṃ caiva vṛthāviśraṃbhiṇo janāḥ // NarP_1,41.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:7042: śūdrā bhaikṣyaratāścaiva teṣāṃ śuśrūṣaṇe dvijāḥ // NarP_1,41.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:7043: na śiṣyo na guruḥ kaścinna putro lana pitā tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:7044: na bhāryā na patiścaiva bhavitāro 'tra saṃkare // NarP_1,41.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:7045: kalau gate bhaviṣyanti dhanāḍhyā api yācakāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7050: śūdravṛttyaiva jīvanti narakārhā dvijā mune // NarP_1,41.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:7056: kalau sarve bhaviṣyanti svalpabhāgyā bahuprajāḥ // NarP_1,41.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:7064: nidhāya hṛdyakarmaṇi prerayanti vacaḥ śubham // NarP_1,41.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:7071: yadā dvijā bhaviṣyanti tadā vṛddhiṃ kalirvrajet // NarP_1,41.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:7072: yadā prajā na yakṣyanti na hoṣyanti dvijātayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7075: sarvadharmeṣu naṣṭeṣu yāti niḥśrīkatāṃ jagat // NarP_1,41.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:7076: evaṃ kaleḥ svarūpaṃ te kathitaṃ viprasattama /
GP12nardp1_u:7078: tataḥ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyuge tretāyāṃ dhyānameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7081: dvāpare yañca māsena hyahorātreṇa tatkalau // NarP_1,41.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:7083: yadāpnoti tadāpnoti kalau saṃkīrtya keśavam // NarP_1,41.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:7084: ahorātraṃ harernāma kīrtayanti ca ye narāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7085: kurvanti haripūjāṃ vā na kalirbādhate ca tān // NarP_1,41.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:7086: namo nārāyaṇāyeti kīrtayanti ca ye narāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7087: niṣkāmā vā sakāmā vā na kalirbādhate ca tān // NarP_1,41.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:7088: harināmaparā ye tu ghore kaliyuge dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:7089: ta eva kṛtakṛtyāśca na kalirbādhate hi tān // NarP_1,41.95//.
GP12nardp1_u:7091: ta eva śivatulyāśca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,41.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:7093: ghore kaliyuge prāpte viṣṇuṃ dhyāyanna sīdati // NarP_1,41.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:7099: itīrayanti ye nityaṃ nahi tānbādhate kaliḥ // NarP_1,41.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:7101: iti jalpanti ye vāpi kalistānnāpi bādhate // NarP_1,41.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:7103: itthaṃ vadanti ye vipra te kṛtārthā na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,41.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:7105: iti vāpyuñcarantīha na ca teṣāṃ kalerbhayam // NarP_1,41.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:7107: ghore kaliyuge vipra haribhaktastu durlabhā // NarP_1,41.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:7120: aho hariparā ye tu kalau ghore bhayaṅkare /
GP12nardp1_u:7121: te subhāgyā mahātmānaḥ satsaṃgara hitā api // NarP_1,41.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:7123: satyaṃ samastakarmāṇi yānti saṃpūrṇatāṃ dvija // NarP_1,41.112 //
GP12nardp1_u:7131: evaṃ sa nārado viprāḥ sanakena prabodhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7135: prakāśitaṃ jagajjyotiḥ paraṃ brahma sanātanam // NarP_1,41.117 //
GP12nardp1_u:7140: tasmādyena yathā brahma pratītaṃ bodhitena tu /
GP12nardp1_u:7145: brahmannahaṃ dhyānaparo bhaveyaṃ sanandanaṃ pṛccha yathābhilāṣam /
GP12nardp1_u:7153: pralaye ca kamabhyeti tanme brūhi sanandana // NarP_1,42.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:7155: sabhūmiḥ sāgnipavano loko 'yaṃ kena nirmitaḥ // NarP_1,42.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:7157: śaucāśaucaṃ kathaṃ teṣāṃ dharmādharmavidhiḥ katham // NarP_1,42.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:7158: kīdṛśo jīvatāṃ jīvaḥ kva vā gacchanti ye mṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7159: asmāllokādamuṃ lokaṃ sarvaṃ śaṃsatu me bhavān // NarP_1,42.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:7167: kathaṃ muktiśca saṃsārājjāyate tasya mānada // NarP_1,42.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:7169: sevyasevakabhāvena vartete iti tau sadā // NarP_1,42.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:7171: lokānāṃ ramaṇaḥ so 'yaṃ nirguṇaśca nirañjanaḥ // NarP_1,42.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:7175: jīvo jīvatvamullaṅghya kathaṃ brahma samanvayāt // NarP_1,42.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:7177: evaṃ sa bhagavānpṛṣṭo bharadvājena saṃśayam // NarP_1,42.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:7180: mānaso nāma yaḥ pūrvo viśruto ve maharṣibhiḥ // NarP_1,42.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:7183: yataḥ sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni jāyante ca mriyanti ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7184: so 'mṛjatprathamaṃ devo mahāntaṃ nāma nāmataḥ // NarP_1,42.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:7188: tatastejo mayaṃ divyaṃ padmaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃbhuvā // NarP_1,42.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:7191: brahmā vai sa mahātejā ya ete pañca dhātavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7192: śailāstasyāsthisaṃdhāstu medo masiṃ ca medinī // NarP_1,42.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:7195: agnīṣomau ca candrākārai nayane tasya viśrute /
GP12nardp1_u:7196: nabhaścordhvaśirastasya kṣitiḥ padau bhujau diśaḥ // NarP_1,42.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:7198: sa eṣa bhagavānviṣṇurananta iti viśrutaḥ // NarP_1,42.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:7201: tataḥ samabhavadviśvaṃ pṛṣṭo 'haṃ yadiha tvayā // NarP_1,42.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:7204: kānyatra parimāṇāni saṃśayaṃ chindhi tattvataḥ // NarP_1,42.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:7207: ramyaṃ nānāśrayākīrṇaṃ yasyāṃ to nādhigamyate // NarP_1,42.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:7209: tatra devāḥ svayaṃ dīptā bhāskarābhāgnivarcasaḥ // NarP_1,42.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:7210: te cāpyantaṃ na paśyanti nabhasaḥ prathitaujasaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7222: paṭhanti caiva munayaḥ śāstreṣu vividheṣu ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7223: trailokye sāgare caiva pramāṇaṃ vihitaṃ yathā // NarP_1,42.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:7224: adṛśyo yastvagamyo yaḥ kaḥ pramāṇa mudīrayet /
GP12nardp1_u:7225: siddhānāṃ devatānāṃ ca parimītā yadā gatiḥ // NarP_1,42.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:7228: yadā tu divyaṃ yadrūpaṃ hrasate varddhate punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7233: puṣkaro yadi saṃbhūto jyeṣṭaṃ bhavati puṣkaram /
GP12nardp1_u:7234: brahmāṇaṃ pūrvajaṃ cāha bhavānsaṃdeha eva me // NarP_1,42.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:7239: tasya madhye sthito lokānsṛjatyeṣa jagadvidhiḥ // NarP_1,42.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:7241: prajāvisargaṃ vividhaṃ kathaṃ sa sṛjati prabhuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7245: saṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ bhūtānāṃ sṛṣṭaṃ prathamato jalam // NarP_1,42.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:7247: yatprāṇāḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ varddhante yena ca prajāḥ // NarP_1,42.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:7249: pṛthivī parvatā meghā mūrtimantaśca ye pare /
GP12nardp1_u:7253: kathaṃ vā medinī sṛṣṭetyatra me saṃśayo mahān // NarP_1,42.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:7258: tyaktāhārāḥ sparddhamānā divyaṃ virṣaśataṃ dvijāḥ // NarP_1,42.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:7260: divyā sarasvatī tatra saṃbabhūva nabhastalāt // NarP_1,42.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:7278: bhūmiryo niriyaṃ jñeyā yasyāḥ sarvaṃ prasūyate // NarP_1,42.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:7280: ya ete dhātavaḥ pañca rakṣyā yānasṛjatprabhuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7288: pṛthivī cātra saṃghātaḥ śarīraṃ pāñcabhautikam // NarP_1,42.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:7290: śrotre ghrāṇo rasaḥ sparśo dṛṣṭiścendriyasaṃjñitāḥ // NarP_1,42.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:7293: sthāvarāṇāṃ na dṛśyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ // NarP_1,42.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:7295: vṛkṣāṇāṃ nopalabhyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ // NarP_1,42.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:7296: va śṛṇvanti na paśyanti na gandharasavedinaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7297: na ca sparśaṃ hi jānanti te kathaṃ pañca dhātavaḥ // NarP_1,42.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:7303: ūṣmato mlāyate parṇaṃ tvakphalaṃ puṣpameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7304: mlāyate śīryate cāpi sparśastenātra vidyate // NarP_1,42.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:7310: arogāḥ puṣpitāḥ saṃti tasmājjighranti pādapāḥ // NarP_1,42.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:7312: jīvaṃ paśyāmi vṛkṣāṇāmacaitanyaṃ na vidyate // NarP_1,42.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:7315: jaṅgamānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ śarīre paṃñca dhātavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7316: pratyekaśaḥ prabhidyante yaiḥ śarīraṃ viceṣṭate // NarP_1,42.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:7317: tvak ca māṃsaṃ tathāsthīni majjā snāyuśca pañcamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7321: śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ tathāsyaṃ ca hṛdayaṃ koṣṭameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7323: śleṣmā pittamatha svedo vasā śoṇitameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7324: ityāpaḥ pañcadhā dehe bhavanti prāṇināṃ sadā // NarP_1,42.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:7332: nirhārī saṃhataḥ snigdho rukṣo viśada eva ca // NarP_1,42.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:7334: jyotiḥ paśyati cakṣurbhyaḥ sparśaṃ vetti ca vāyunā // NarP_1,42.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:7335: śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaṃ ca rasaścāpi guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7336: rasajñānaṃ tu vakṣyāmi tanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu // NarP_1,42.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:7340: śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaśca triguṇaṃ jyotirucyate // NarP_1,42.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:7341: jyotiḥ paśyati rūpāṇi rūpaṃ ca bahudhā smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:7344: kaṭhinaścikkaṇaḥ ślakṣṇaḥ picchilo mṛdu dāruṇaḥ // NarP_1,42.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:7350: eṣa saptavidhaḥ prokto guṇa ākāśasaṃbhavaḥ // NarP_1,42.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:7354: vāyavyastu guṇaḥ sparśaḥ sparśaśca bahudhā smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,42.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:7355: uṣṇaḥ śītaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ snigdho viśada eva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7356: tathā kharo mṛduḥ ślakṣṇo lavurgurutaro 'pi ca // NarP_1,42.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:7361: āpyāyante ca te nityaṃ dhātavastaistu dhātubhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7364: pārthivaṃ dhātumāsādya yathā ceṣṭayate balī // NarP_1,42.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:7366: prāṇo mūrddhani vāgnau ca vartamāno viceṣṭate // NarP_1,42.99 //
GP12nardp1_u:7367: sa jantuḥ sarvabhūtātmā puruṣaḥ sa sanātanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7368: mano buddhirahṝṅkāro bhūtāni viṣayaśca saḥ // NarP_1,42.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:7369: evaṃ tviha sa sarvatra prāṇaistu paripālyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7370: pṛṣṭatastu samānena svāṃ svāṃ gatimupāśritaḥ // NarP_1,42.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:7384: ūṣmā cāgirīti jñeyo yo 'nnaṃ pacati dehinām // NarP_1,42.108 //
GP12nardp1_u:7386: sa ūrdhvamāgamya punaḥ samutkṣipati pāvakam // NarP_1,42.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:7388: nābhimūle śarīrasya sarve prāṇāśca saṃsthitāḥ // NarP_1,42.110 //
GP12nardp1_u:7391: eṣa mārgo 'pi yogānāṃ yena gacchanti tatpadam /
GP12nardp1_u:7395: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bhṛgubharadvājasaṃvāde jagadutpattivarṇanaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:7399: śvasityābhāṣate caiva tato jīvo nirarthakaḥ // NarP_1,43.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:7404: yadi vāthumayo jīvaḥ saṃśleṣo yadi vāyunā /
GP12nardp1_u:7406: saṃśleṣo yadi vā tena yadi tasmātpraṇaśyati /
GP12nardp1_u:7408: kṛpe vā salilaṃ dadyātpradīpaṃ vā hutāśane /
GP12nardp1_u:7409: kṣipraṃ praviśya naśyeta yathā naśyatyasau tathā // NarP_1,43.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:7415: pīḍite 'nyatare hyeṣāṃ saṃghāto yāti pañcatām // NarP_1,43.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:7417: kiṃ khedayati vā jīvaḥ kiṃ śṛṇoti bravīti ca // NarP_1,43.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:7419: yo dattvā mriyate jantuḥ sā gauḥ kaṃ tārayiṣyati // NarP_1,43.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:7420: gauścapratigrahītā ca dātā caiva samaṃ yadā /
GP12nardp1_u:7421: ihaiva vilayaṃ yānti kutasteṣāṃ samāgamaḥ // NarP_1,43.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:7423: agninā copayuktasya kutaḥ saṃjīvanaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,43.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:7424: chinnasya yadi vṛkṣasya na mūlaṃ pratirohati /
GP12nardp1_u:7425: jīvanyasya pravartante mṛtaḥ kva punareṣyati // NarP_1,43.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:7429: ta nivartaya sarvajña yatastvāmāśrito hyaham // NarP_1,43.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:7434: na prāṇāḥ santi jīvasya dattasya ca kṛtasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7435: yāti dehāntaraṃ prāṇī śarīraṃ tu viśīryate // NarP_1,43.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:7442: gatiryasya pramāṇaṃ vā saṃsthānaṃ vā na vidyate // NarP_1,43.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:7446: gatiryasya pramāṇaṃ vā saṃsthānaṃ vā na vidyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7451: prāṇāndhārayate hyagniḥ sa jīva upadhāryatām // NarP_1,43.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:7454: patitaṃ yāti bhūmitvamayanaṃ tasya hi kṣitiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7455: jagamānāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ tathaiva ca // NarP_1,43.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:7464: śarīre prāṇināṃ jīvaṃ vettubhicchāmi yādṛśam // NarP_1,43.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:7466: bhidyamāne śarīre tu jīvo naivopalabhyate // NarP_1,43.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:7468: śarīre mānase duḥkha kastāṃ vedayate rujam // NarP_1,43.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:7469: śṛṇoti kathitaṃ jīvaḥ karṇābhyāṃna śṛṇoti tat /
GP12nardp1_u:7470: maharṣe manasi vyagre tasmājjīvo nirarthakaḥ // NarP_1,43.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:7472: manasi vyākule cakṣuḥ paśyannapi na paśyati // NarP_1,43.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:7473: na paśyati na cāghrāti na śṛṇoti na bhāṣate /
GP12nardp1_u:7474: na ca smarśamasau vetti nidrāvaśagataḥ punaḥ // NarP_1,43.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:7475: hṛṣyati kruddhyate ko 'tra śocatyudvijate ca kaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7476: icchati dhyāyati dveṣṭi vākyaṃ vācayate ca kaḥ // NarP_1,43.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:7479: sa vetti gandhāṃśca rasāñchutīśca sparśaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca guṇāṃśca ye 'lye // NarP_1,43.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:7481: saveti duḥkhāni sukhāni cātra tadviprayogāttu na vetti deham // NarP_1,43.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:7482: yadā na rūpaṃ na sparśo noṣyabhavaśca pāvake /
GP12nardp1_u:7483: tadā śānte śarīrāgnau dehatyāgena naśyati // NarP_1,43.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:7485: tatrātmā mānaso brahmā sarvabhūteṣu lokakṛt // NarP_1,43.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:7487: tasminyaḥ saṃśrito dehe hyabbinduriva puṣkare // NarP_1,43.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:7489: tamorajaśca sattvaṃ ca viddhi jīvaguṇānimām // NarP_1,43.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:7490: acetanaṃ jīvaguṇaṃ vadanti sa ceṣṭate ceṣṭayate ca sarvam /
GP12nardp1_u:7491: ataḥ paraṃ kṣetravido vadanti prāvartayadyo bhuvanāni sapta // NarP_1,43.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:7492: na jīvanāśo 'sti hi dehabhede mithyaitadāhurmuna ityabuddhāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7493: jīvastu dehāntaritaḥ prayāti daśārddhatastasya śarīrabhedaḥ // NarP_1,43.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:7498: cittasya hi prasādena hitvā karma śubhāśubham /
GP12nardp1_u:7504: tataḥ satyaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca tathā brahma ca śāśvatam /
GP12nardp1_u:7505: ācāraṃ caiva śaucaṃ ca svargāya vidadhe prabhuḥ // NarP_1,43.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:7510: cāturvarṇyasya varṇena yadi varṇo vibhidyate // NarP_1,43.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:7512: tvantaḥ kṣarati sarveṣāṃ kasmādvarṇo vibhajyate // NarP_1,43.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:7516: na viśeṣo 'sti varṇānāṃ sarvaṃ brahmamayaṃ jagat /
GP12nardp1_u:7517: brahmaṇā pūrvasṛṣṭaṃ hi karmaṇā varṇatāṃ gatam // NarP_1,43.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:7521: svadharṃmannānutiṣṭanti te dvijā vaiśyatāṃ gatāḥ // NarP_1,43.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:7523: kṛṣṇāḥ śaucapāribhrāṣṭāste dvijāḥ śūdratāṃ gatāḥ // NarP_1,43.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:7527: brahma caiva purā sṛṣṭaṃ yena jānanti tadvidaḥ // NarP_1,43.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:7532: brāhmaṇaḥ kena bhavati kṣatriyo vā dvijottama /
GP12nardp1_u:7533: vaiśyaḥ śūdraśca viprarṣe tadbrūhi vadatāṃ vara // NarP_1,43.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:7538: nityavratī satyaparaḥ sa vai brāhmaṇa ucyate // NarP_1,43.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:7540: tapasyāṃ dṛśyate yatra sa brāhmaṇa iti smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,43.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:7542: dānādānaratiryastu sa vai kṣatriya ucyate // NarP_1,43.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:7544: vedādhyayanasaṃpannaḥ sa vaiśya iti saṃjñitaḥ // NarP_1,43.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:7546: tyaktavedastvanācāraḥ sa vai śūdra iti smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,43.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:7547: śūdre caitadbhavellakṣma dvije tacca na vidyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7548: na vai śūdro bhavecchūdro brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇo na ca // NarP_1,43.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:7555: tyāge yasya hutaṃ sarvaṃ sa tyāgī sa ca buddhimān // NarP_1,43.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:7565: nivedādeva nirvāṇaṃ na ca kiñcidviccitayet // NarP_1,43.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:7567: śauce tu satataṃ yuktaḥ sadācārasamanvitaḥ // NarP_1,43.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:7569: satyaṃvrataṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ satyaṃ visṛjate prajā // NarP_1,43.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:7570: satyena dhāryate lokaḥ svaḥ satyenaiva gacchati /
GP12nardp1_u:7571: anṛtaṃ tamaso rūpaṃ tamasā nīyate hyadhaḥ // NarP_1,43.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:7573: suduṣprakāśa ityāhurnarakaṃ tama eva ca // NarP_1,43.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:7575: tatrāpyevaṃvidhā loke vṛttiḥ satyānṛte bhavet // NarP_1,43.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:7580: sukhaṃ hyanityaṃ bhūtānāmiha loke paratra ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7581: rāhugrastasya somasya yathā jyotsnā na bhāsate // NarP_1,43.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:7582: tathā tamobhibhūtānāṃ bhūtānāṃ naśyate sukham // NarP_1,43.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:7583: tatkhalu dvividhaṃ sukhamucyacate śarīraṃ mānasaṃ ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7584: iha khalvamuṣmiṃśca loke vastupravṛttayaḥ sukhārthamabhidhīyante nahītaḥ paratrāparvagaphalādviśiṣṭataramasti /
GP12nardp1_u:7588: na tadupagṛhṇīmo na hyeṣāmṛṣīṇāṃ mahati sthitānām // NarP_1,43.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:7589: aprāpya eṣa kāmya guṇaviśeṣo na cainamabhiśīlayanti /
GP12nardp1_u:7590: tapasi śrūyate trilokakṛdbrahmā prabhurekākī tiṣṭati brahmacārī na kāmasukhoṣvātmānamavadadhāti // NarP_1,43.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:7591: api ca bhagavānviśveśvara umāpatiḥ kāmamabhivartamānamanaṅgatvena samamanayat // NarP_1,43.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:7592: tasmādbhūmau na tu mahātmabhirañjayati gṛhīto na tveṣa tāvadviśiṣṭo guṇaviśeṣa iti // NarP_1,43.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:7593: naitadbhagavataḥ pratyemi bhavatā tūktaṃ sukhānāṃ paramāḥ striya iti lokapravādo hi dvividhaḥ phalodayaḥ sukṛtātsukhamavāpyate 'nyathā duḥkhamiti // NarP_1,43.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:7595_0: atrocyate anṛtātkhalu tamaḥ prādurbhūtaṃ tatastamograstā adharmamevānuvartante na
GP12nardp1_u:7596: śārīraṃ mānasaṃ nāsti na jarā na ca pātakam /
GP12nardp1_u:7597: nityameva sukhaṃ svarge sukhaṃ duḥkhamihobhayam // NarP_1,43.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:7599: pṛthivī sarvabhūtānāṃ janitrī tadvidhāḥ striyaḥ // NarP_1,43.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:7603: hutena śāmyate pāpaṃ svādhyāye śāntiruttamā // NarP_1,43.99 //
GP12nardp1_u:7605: dānaṃ tu dvividhaṃ prāhuḥ paratrārthamihaiva ca // NarP_1,43.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:7608: yādṛśaṃ dīyate dānaṃ tādṛśaṃ phalamaśnute // NarP_1,43.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:7610: kiṃ kasya dharmacaraṇaṃ kiṃ vā dharmasya lakṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:7617: teṣāṃ sve sve samācārāstanme vaktumihārhasi // NarP_1,43.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:7619: pūrvameva bhagavatā brahmaṇā lokahitamanutiṣṭatā dharmasaṃrakṣaṇārthamāśramāścatvāro 'bhinirddiṣṭāḥ // NarP_1,43.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:7624: iti gārhasthyaṃ khalu dvitīyamāśramaṃ vadanti // NarP_1,43.107 //
GP12nardp1_u:7626: samāvṛtānāṃ sadācārāṇāṃ sahadharmacaryaphalārthināṃ gṛhāśramo vidhīyate // NarP_1,43.108 //
GP12nardp1_u:7627_1: vā brahmarṣinirmitena vā adbhiḥ sāgaragatena vā dravyaniyamābhyāsadaivataprasādopalabdhena
GP12nardp1_u:7627_2: vā dhanena gṛhastho gārhasthyaṃ vartayet // NarP_1,43.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:7628_0: taddhi sarvāśramaṇāṃ mūlamudāharanti gurukulanivāsinaḥ parivrājakā ye 'nye saṃkalpitavrataniyamadharmānuṣṭāninasteṣāmapyantarā
GP12nardp1_u:7629: vānaprasthānāṃ ca dravyopaskāra iti prāyaśaḥ khalvete sādhavaḥ sādhupathyodanāḥ svādhyāyaprasaṃginastīrthābhigamanadeśadarśanārthaṃ pṛthivīṃ paryaṭanti // NarP_1,43.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:7633: sa dattvā duṣkṛtaṃ tasmai puṇyamādāya gacchati // NarP_1,43.113 //
GP12nardp1_u:7634: api cātra yajñakriyābhirdevatāḥ prīyante nivāpena pitaro vidyābhyāsaśravaṇadhāraṇena ṛṣayaḥ apatyotpādanena prajāpatiriti // NarP_1,43.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:7646: vānaprasthāḥ khalvapi dharmamanusarantaḥ puṇyāni tīrthāni nadīprastravaṇāni svabhakteṣvaraṇyeṣu mṛgavarāhamahiṣa śārdūlavanagajākīrṇeṣu tapasyante anusaṃcaranti // NarP_1,43.120 //
GP12nardp1_u:7657: na tasya sarvabhūtebhyo bhayamutpadyate kvacit // NarP_1,43.125 //
GP12nardp1_u:7659: viprastu bhaikṣopagatairhavirbhiścitā gninā saṃvrajate hi sokān // NarP_1,43.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:7661: anindhanaṃ jyotiriva praśāntaṃ sa brahmalokaṃ śrayate dvijātiḥ // NarP_1,43.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:7662: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bhṛgubharadvājasaṃvāde brāhmaṇācāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:7669: puṇyaḥ kṣemyaśca kāmyaśca sa paro loka ucyate // NarP_1,44.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:7672: sa svargasadṛśo deśaḥ tatra hyuktāḥ śubhā guṇāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7673: kāle mṛtyuḥ prabavati spṛśanti vyādhayo na ca // NarP_1,44.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:7675: nānyo hi vadhyate tatra dravyeṣu ca na vismayaḥ // NarP_1,44.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:7676: paro hyadharmo naivāsti saṃdeho nāpi jāyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7677: kṛtasya tu phalaṃ tatra pratyakṣamupalabhyate // NarP_1,44.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:7683: sukhitā duḥkhitāḥ kecinnirdhanā dhanino pare // NarP_1,44.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:7684: iha śramo bhayaṃ mohaḥ kṣudhā tīvrā ca jāyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7686: yastadvedo bhayaṃ prājñaḥ pāpmanā na sa lipyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7691: iha cintā bahuvidhā dharmādharmasya karmaṇaḥ // NarP_1,44.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:7697: ihasthāstatra jāyante ye vai puṇyakṛto janāḥ // NarP_1,44.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:7701: ihaiva parivarttante na ca yāntyuttarāṃ diśam // NarP_1,44.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:7705: dharmādharmauṃ hi lokasya yo vai vetti sa buddhimān // NarP_1,44.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:7708: yadadhyātmaṃ yathā caitattanme brūhi tapodhana // NarP_1,44.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:7711: tadvyākhyāṃsyāmi te tāta śreyaskaratamaṃ sukham // NarP_1,44.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:7713: yajjñātvā puruṣo loke prītiṃ saukhyaṃ ca vindati // NarP_1,44.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:7717: yataḥ sṛṣṭāni tatraiva tāni yānti layaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,44.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:7719: prasārya ca yathāṅgāni kūrmaḥ saṃharate punaḥ // NarP_1,44.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:7720: tadvad bhūtāni bhūtātmā sṛṣṭāni harate punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7722: akarotteṣu vai samyak taṃ tu jīvo na paśyati /
GP12nardp1_u:7723: śabdaḥ śrotraṃ tathā khāni trayamākāśayonijam // NarP_1,44.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:7724: vāyoḥ sparsastathā ceṣṭā tvakcaiva tritayaṃ smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:7725: rūpaṃ cakṣustathā pākastrividhaṃ teja ucyate // NarP_1,44.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:7726: rasāḥ kledaśca jihvā ca trayo jalaguṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7727: ghreyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca ete bhūmiguṇāstrayaḥ // NarP_1,44.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:7728: mahābhūtāni pacaiva ṣaṣṭaṃ ca mana ucyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7731: śrotraṃ vai śravaṇārthāya sparśanāya ca tvak smṛtā // NarP_1,44.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:7738: tamo rajaśca sattvaṃ ca te 'pi bhāvāstadāśritāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7739: etāṃ buddhiṃ naro buddhā bhūtānāgatiṃ gatim // NarP_1,44.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:7745: yena paśyati tañcakṣuḥ śṛṇoti śrotramucyate // NarP_1,44.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:7747: tvacā sparśayati sparśaṃ buddhirvikriyate sakṛt // NarP_1,44.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:7751: puruṣe tiṣṭatī buddhistriṣu bhāveṣu vartate // NarP_1,44.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:7753: na sukhena na duḥkhena kadācidapi vartate // NarP_1,44.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:7754: evaṃ narāṇāṃ manasi triṣu bhāveṣu vartate /
GP12nardp1_u:7759: indriyāṇi hi sarvāṇi pravartayati sā sadā // NarP_1,44.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:7760: prītiḥ sattvaṃ rajaḥ śokastamaḥ krodhastu te trayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7761: ye ye ca bhāvā loke 'sminsarve pyeteṣu vai triṣu // NarP_1,44.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:7763: indriyāṇi ca sarvāṇi vijetavyāni dhīmatā // NarP_1,44.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:7766: sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti mānada /
GP12nardp1_u:7769: tava yatprītisaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet // NarP_1,44.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:7775: praharṣaḥ prītirānandaḥ sukhaṃ vā śāntacittatā // NarP_1,44.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:7777: atuṣṭiḥ paritāpaśca śoko lobhastathā kṣamā // NarP_1,44.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:7782: manaḥ svaniyataṃ yasya sa sukhī pretyaceha ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7784: sṛjatehi guṇāneka eko na sṛjate guṇān /
GP12nardp1_u:7785: maśakoduṃbarau vāpi saṃprayuktau yathā sadā // NarP_1,44.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:7787: pṛthagbhūtau prakṛtyā tau sapraṃyuktau ca sarvadā // NarP_1,44.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:7788: yathā matsyo jalaṃ caiva saṃprayukto tathaiva tau /
GP12nardp1_u:7789: na guṇā vidurātmānaṃ sa guṇānvetti sarvaśaḥ // NarP_1,44.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:7790: paridraṣṭā guṇānāṃ tu saṃstraṣṭā manyate tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:7793: sṛjate hi guṇānsattvaṃ kṣetrajñaḥ paripaśyati // NarP_1,44.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:7795: āśrayo nāsti sattvasya kṣetrajñasya ca kaścana // NarP_1,44.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:7796: sattvaṃ manaḥ saṃsṛjate na guṇānvai kadācana /
GP12nardp1_u:7797: raśmīṃsteṣāṃ sa manasā yadā samyaṅniyacchati // NarP_1,44.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:7799: tyaktvā yaḥ prākṛtaṃ karma nityamātmaratirmuniḥ // NarP_1,44.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:7801: yathā vāricaraḥ pakṣī salilena na lipyate // NarP_1,44.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:7805: bhāvayuktyā prayuktastu sa nityaṃ sṛjate guṇān // NarP_1,44.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:7813: malināḥ prāṇnuyuḥ śuddhiṃ yathā pūrṇāṃ nadīṃ narāḥ // NarP_1,44.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:7815: mahānadyā hi pārajñastapyate na taranyathā // NarP_1,44.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:7816: na tu tapyati tattvajñaḥ kulajñastu taratyuta /
GP12nardp1_u:7817: evaṃ ye viduradhyātmaṃ kaivalyaṃ jñānamuttamam // NarP_1,44.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:7818: evaṃ buddhā naraḥ sarvo bhūtānāmagatiṃ gatim /
GP12nardp1_u:7819: avekṣya ca śanairbuddhyā labhate ca śamaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,44.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:7820: trivargo yasya viditaḥ prekṣya yaśca vimuñcati /
GP12nardp1_u:7824: etad buddhā bhaved buddhaḥ kimanyad buddhalakṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:7825: vijñāya taddhi manyante katakṛtyā manīṣiṇaḥ // NarP_1,44.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:7826: na bhavati viduṣāṃ tato bhayaṃ yadaviduṣāṃ sumahadbhayaṃ bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:7827: nahi gatiradhikāsti kasyacitsati hi guṇepravadatyatulyatām // NarP_1,44.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:7829: nāpriyaṃ tadubhayaṃ kutaḥ priyaṃ tasya tajjanayatīha kurvataḥ // NarP_1,44.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:7831: tatra paśya kuśalānna śocate jāyate yadi bhayaṃ padaṃ sadā // NarP_1,44.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:7837: yaṃ jñātvā śāśvatīṃ siddhiṃ gacchantīha maharṣayaḥ // NarP_1,44.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:7838: yathā svanuṣṭitaṃ dhyānaṃ tathā kurvanti yoginaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7843: asaṃgānya vidhādīni manaḥ śāntikarāṇi ca // NarP_1,44.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:7846: śabdaṃ na vindecchrotreṇa tvacā sparśaṃ na vedayet /
GP12nardp1_u:7847: rūpaṃ na cakṣuṣā vindyājjihvayā na rasāṃstathā // NarP_1,44.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:7855: eṣa dhyānapathaḥ pūrvo bhayā samanuvarṇitaḥ // NarP_1,44.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:7859: evamevāsya cittaṃ ca bhavati dhyānavartmani // NarP_1,44.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:7861: punarvāyupathaṃ bhrāntaṃ mano bhavati vāyuvat // NarP_1,44.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:7869: sahasā vāriṇā siktā na yānti paribhāvanāḥ // NarP_1,44.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:7870: kiñcit snigdhaṃ yathā ca syācchuṣkaṃ cūrṇamabhāvitam /
GP12nardp1_u:7875: pūrvaṃ dhyānapathe sthāpya nityayogena śāmyati // NarP_1,44.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:7876: na tatpuruṣakāreṇa na ca daivena kenacit /
GP12nardp1_u:7879: gacchanti yogino hyovaṃ nirvāṇaṃ tu nirāmayam // NarP_1,44.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:7883: eṣa te prasavo vidvan jagataḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7884: nikhilena mahāprājña kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotumicchasi // NarP_1,44.107 //
