GP12nardp1_u:7892: na ca me jāyate tṛptirbhūyobhūyo 'pi śṛṇvataḥ // NarP_1,45.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:7894: tathā kathaya sarvajña mokṣadharmaṃ sadāśritam // NarP_1,45.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:7900: tasya śmaśāna mācāryā vasati satataṃ gṛhe /
GP12nardp1_u:7902: sa teṣāṃ pretyabhāve ca pretya jātau viniścaye /
GP12nardp1_u:7911: sa manye tena rūpeṇa vikhyāpayati hi svayam // NarP_1,45.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:7920: tasya pañcaśikhaḥ śiṣyo mānuṣyā payasā bhṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7922: tasyaḥ putratvamāgatya sriyāḥ sa pibagati stanau /
GP12nardp1_u:7923: tataśca kāpileyatvaṃ lebhe buddhiṃ ca naiṣṭikīm // NarP_1,45.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:7926: sāmātyo janako jñātvā dharmajño jñāninaṃ mune /
GP12nardp1_u:7934: yadarthaṃ dharmasaṃsargaḥ karmaṇāṃ ca phalo dayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7939: ātmānaṃ manyate mohāttadasamyak paraṃ matam // NarP_1,45.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:7945: pratyakṣo hyāgamo bhinnaḥ kṛtānto vā na kiñcana // NarP_1,45.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:7947: anyojīvaḥ śarīrasya nāstikānāṃ mate sthitaḥ // NarP_1,45.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:7953: amūtasya hi mūrtena sāmānyaṃ nopalabhyate // NarP_1,45.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:7954: avidyā karma tṛṣṇā ca kecidāhuḥ punarbhavam /
GP12nardp1_u:7955: tasminnaṣṭe ca dagdhe ca citte maraṇadharmiṇi // NarP_1,45.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:7959: evaṃ sati ca kā prīhirjñānavidyātapobalaiḥ // NarP_1,45.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:7963: yathā hi muśalairhanyuḥ śarīraṃ tatpunarbhavet // NarP_1,45.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:7969: indriyāṇi mano vāyuḥ śoṇitaṃ māṃsamasthi ca // NarP_1,45.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:7973: iti samyaṅ manasyete bahavaḥ saṃti hetavaḥ // NarP_1,45.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:7979: arthāstathā hṝnti sukhāvahāṃśca lihata ete bahavopaśuṣkāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7980: mahattaraṃ duḥkhamabhiprapannā hitvāmiṣaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ prayānti // NarP_1,45.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:7982: vihāya yo gacchati sarvameva kṣaṇena gatvā na nivartate ca // NarP_1,45.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:7984: itīdamālakṣya ratiḥ kuto bhavedvināśināpyasya na śama vidyate // NarP_1,45.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:7988: bhagavanyadi na pretya saṃjñā bhavati kasyacit /
GP12nardp1_u:7989: evaṃ sati kimajñānaṃ jñānaṃ vā kiṃ kariṣyati // NarP_1,45.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:7991: apramattaḥ pramatto vā kiṃ viśeṣaṃ kariṣyati // NarP_1,45.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:7992: asaṃsargo hi bhūteṣu saṃsargo vā vināśiṣu /
GP12nardp1_u:7993: kasmai kriyata kalpeta niścayaḥ ko 'tra tattvataḥ // NarP_1,45.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:8001: dhātavaḥ pañcadhā toyaṃ khe vāyurjyotiṣo dharā // NarP_1,45.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:8003: ākāśaṃ vāyurūṣmā ca sneho yaścāpi pārthivaḥ // NarP_1,45.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:8005: jñānamūṣmā ca vāyuśca trividhaḥ kāyasaṃgrahaḥ // NarP_1,45.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:8008: śravaṇaṃ sparśanaṃ jihvā dṛṣṭirnāsā tathaiva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:8012: śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaṃ ca mūrtyarthameva te trayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8015: tamāhuḥ paramaṃ śuddhiṃ buddhirityavyayaṃ mahat // NarP_1,45.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:8018: anātmeti ca yadṛṣṭaṃ tenāhaṃ na mametyapi /
GP12nardp1_u:8023: nityaṃ mithyāvinītānāṃ kleśo duḥkhāvaho tamaḥ // NarP_1,45.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:8024: dravyatyāge tu karmāṇi bhogatyāge vratāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:8025: sukhatyāgā tapo yogaṃ sarvatyāge samāpanā // NarP_1,45.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:8027: viprahāṇāya duḥkhasya durgatirhi tathā bhavet // NarP_1,45.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:8029: basaṣaṣṭāni vakṣyāmi pañca karmedriyāṇi tu // NarP_1,45.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:8034: karṇo śabdaśca cittaṃ ca trayaḥ śravaṇasaṃgrahe /
GP12nardp1_u:8035: tathā sparśe tathā rūpe tathaiva rasagandhayoḥ // NarP_1,45.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:8039: trividhā vedānā yeṣu prasṛtā sarvasādhinī // NarP_1,45.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:8046: imāṃ ca yo veda vimokṣabuddhimātmānamanvicchati cāpramattaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8047: na lipyate karmapalairaniṣṭaiḥ patraṃ viṣasyeva jalena siktam // NarP_1,45.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:8049: yadā hyasau duḥkhasaukhye jahāti muktastadāgryāṃ gatimetyaliṅgaḥ // NarP_1,45.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:8051: kṣīṇe ca puṇye vigate ca pāpe tanornimitte ca phale vinaṣṭe // NarP_1,45.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:8054: tathā vimuktaḥ prajahāti duḥkhaṃ vidhaavaṃsate loṣṭamivādimṛcchan /
GP12nardp1_u:8055: yathā ruruḥ śṛṅgamatho purāṇaṃ hitvā tvacaṃ vāpyurago yathā ca // NarP_1,45.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:8057: matsyaṃ yathā vāpyudake patantamutsṛjya pakṣī nipatatsaśaktaḥ // NarP_1,45.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:8058: tathā hyasau duḥkhasaukhye vihāya muktaḥ parārddhyā gatimetyaliṅgaḥ // NarP_1,45.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:8060: nikhilamabhisamīkṣya niścitārthaḥ paramasukhī vijahāra vītaśokaḥ // NarP_1,45.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:8061: api ca bhavati maithilena gītaṃ nagaramupāhitamagninābhivīkṣya /
GP12nardp1_u:8062: na khalu mama hi dahyate 'tra kiñcitsvayamidamāha kila sma bhūmipālaḥ // NarP_1,45.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:8063: imaṃ hi yaḥ paṭhati vimokṣaniścayaṃ mahāmune satatamavekṣate tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:8064: upadravānanubhaghavate hyaduḥ khitaḥ pramucyate kapilamivaitya maithilaḥ // NarP_1,45.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:8065: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde pañcacatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:8069: punaḥ papraccha taṃ prītyā sanandanamudāradhīḥ // NarP_1,46.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:8072: prabrūhi tanmune mahyaṃ prapannāya dayānidhe // NarP_1,46.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:8079: tatprāptihetujñānaṃ ca karma coktaṃ mahāmune // NarP_1,46.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:8084: dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat /
GP12nardp1_u:8086: dve vidye veditavye cetyāha cātharvaṇī śrutiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8091: vyāpyaṃ vyāptaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ taṃ vai paśyanti sūrayaḥ // NarP_1,46.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:8093: śrutivākyoditaṃ sūkṣmaṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,46.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:8103: tenāgamapitā sraṣṭā gakāro 'yaṃ tathā mune // NarP_1,46.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:8113: vetti vidyāmavidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavāniti // NarP_1,46.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:8118: khāṇḍikyaṃ janakaṃ prāha pṛṣṭaḥ keśidhvajaḥ purā /
GP12nardp1_u:8120: bhūteṣu vasate soṃ'tarvasaṃtyatra ca tāni yat /
GP12nardp1_u:8121: dhātā vidhātā jagatāṃ vāsudevastataḥ prabhuḥ // NarP_1,46.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:8122: sa sarvabhūtaprakṛtiṃ vikāraṃ guṇādidoṣāṃśca mune vyatītaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8127: paraḥ parāṇāṃ sakalā na yatra kleśādayaḥ saṃti parāvareśe // NarP_1,46.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:8130: sa jñāyate yena tadastadoṣaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ nirmalameva rūpam /
GP12nardp1_u:8137: na māṃsacakṣuṣā draṣṭuṃ brahmabhūtaḥ sa śakyate // NarP_1,46.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:8143: janakāya purā yogaṃ tathāhaṃ kathayāmi te // NarP_1,46.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:8157: ekadā vartamānasya yāge yogavidāṃ vara // NarP_1,46.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:8158: tasya dhenuṃ jaghānograḥ śārdūlo vijane vane /
GP12nardp1_u:8159: tato rājā hatāṃ jñātvā dhenuṃ vyāghreṇa cartvijaḥ // NarP_1,46.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:8163: śunakaṃ pṛccha rājendra veda sa vetsyati // NarP_1,46.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:8164: sa gatvā tamapṛcchañca so 'pyāha nṛpatiṃ mune /
GP12nardp1_u:8165: na kaśerurnacaivāhaṃ na cānyaḥ sāṃprataṃ bhuvi // NarP_1,46.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:8166: vettyeka eva tvacchatruḥ khāṇḍikyo yo jitastvayā /
GP12nardp1_u:8167: sa cāha taṃ vrajāmyeṣa praṣṭumātmaripuṃ mune // NarP_1,46.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:8168: prāpta eva mayā yajñe yadi māṃ sa haniṣyati /
GP12nardp1_u:8169: prāyaścittaṃ sa cetpṛṣṭo vadiṣyati ripurmama // NarP_1,46.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:8172: vanaṃ jagāma yatrāste khāṇḍikyaḥ sa mahīpatiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8178: mṛgānāṃ vada pṛṣṭeṣu mūḍha kṛṣṇājinaṃ na kim // NarP_1,46.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:8179: yeṣāṃ matvā vṛthā cogrāḥ prahitāḥ śitasāyakāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8180: sa tvāmahaṃ haniṣyāmi na me jīvanvimokṣyase // NarP_1,46.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:8184: na tvāṃ hṝntuṃ vicāryataitkopaṃ bāṇaṃ ca muñca vā /
GP12nardp1_u:8185: tataḥ sa mantribhiḥ sārddhamekānte sapurohitaḥ // NarP_1,46.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:8188: hate 'tra pṛthivī sarvā tava vaśyā bhaviṣyati /
GP12nardp1_u:8189: khāṇḍikyaścāha tānsarvāneva meva na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,46.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:8190: hate tu pṛthivī sarvā mama vaśyā bhaviṣyati /
GP12nardp1_u:8196: praṣṭavyaṃ yattvayā sarvaṃ tatpṛccha tvaṃ vadāmyaham /
GP12nardp1_u:8197: tataḥ prāha yathāvṛttaṃ homadhenuvadhaṃ mune // NarP_1,46.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:8198: tataśca taṃ sa papraccha prāyaścittaṃ hi tadrūtam /
GP12nardp1_u:8199: sa cācaṣṭa yathānyāyaṃ mune keśidhvajāya tat // NarP_1,46.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:8205: pūjitā ṛtvijaḥ sarve sadasyā mānitā mayā // NarP_1,46.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:8207: yathāhaṃ martyalokasya mayā sarvaṃ vicaṣṭitam // NarP_1,46.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:8208: aniṣpannakriyaṃ cetastathā na mama kiṃ yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:8209: itthaṃ tu cintayanneva saṃmāra sa mahīpatiḥ // NarP_1,46.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:8211: sa jagāma tato bhūyo rathamāruhya pārthivaḥ // NarP_1,46.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:8215: ahaṃ tu nāpakārāya prāptaḥ khāṇḍikya mā krudhaḥ // NarP_1,46.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:8217: niṣpādito mayā yāgaḥ samyak tvadupadeśataḥ // NarP_1,46.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:8219: ityukto mantrayāmāsa sa bhūyo mantribhiḥ saha // NarP_1,46.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:8223: prāhasya tānāha nṛpaḥ sa khāṇḍikyo mahāpatiḥ // NarP_1,46.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:8226: paramārthaḥ kathaṃ ko 'tra yūyaṃ nātra vicakṣaṇāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8227: ityuktvā samupetyaiṃnaṃ sa tu keśidhvajaṃ nṛpam // NarP_1,46.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:8231: yadi ceddīyate mahyaṃ bhavatā guruniṣkrayaḥ // NarP_1,46.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:8234: na prārthitaṃ tvayā kasmānmama rājyamakaṇṭakam // NarP_1,46.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:8237: keśidhvaja nibodha tvaṃ mayā na prārthitaṃ yataḥ // NarP_1,46.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:8241: yatrāśaktasya me doṣo naivāstyapakṛte tvayā // NarP_1,46.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:8245: na yācñā kṣatrabandhūnāṃ dharmāyaitatsatāṃ matam // NarP_1,46.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:8250: ahaṃ ca vidyayā mṛtyuṃ tartukāmaḥ karomi vai // NarP_1,46.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:8252: tadidaṃ te mano diṣṭyā vivekaiścaryatāṃ gatam // NarP_1,46.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:8260: kalevaropabhogyaṃ hi gṛhakṣetrādikaṃ ca yat // NarP_1,46.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:8262: itthaṃ ca putrapautreṣu taddehotpāditeṣu ca // NarP_1,46.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:8266: mṛṇmayaṃ hi yathā gehaṃ lipyate vai mṛdaṃ bhasā // NarP_1,46.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:8269: āpyāyate yadi tataḥ puṃso garvo 'tra kiṅkṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8274: mohaśrame śamaṃ yāte svacchāntaḥkaraṇaḥ pumān // NarP_1,46.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:8278: jalasya nāgninā saṃgaḥ sthālīsaṃgāttathāpi hi // NarP_1,46.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:8283: kleśānāṃ ca kṣayakaraṃ yogādanyanna vidyate // NarP_1,46.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:8284: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde ṣaṭcatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:8290: tad brūhi tvaṃ mahābhāga yogaṃ yogaviduttama /
GP12nardp1_u:8294: yatra sthito na cyavate prāpya brahmalayaṃ muniḥ // NarP_1,47.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:8302: tasyā brahmaṇi saṃyogo yoga ityabhidhīyate // NarP_1,47.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:8304: yasya yogaḥ sa vai yogī mumukṣuramidhīyate // NarP_1,47.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:8312: seveta yogī niṣkāmo yigitāṃ svamano nayan // NarP_1,47.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:8314: kurvvīta brahmaṇi tathā parisminpravaṇaṃ manaḥ // NarP_1,47.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:8320: prāṇāyāmaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ sabījo 'bīja eva ca // NarP_1,47.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:8327: vaśyatā paramā tena jāyate niścalā tmanām /
GP12nardp1_u:8332: kathyatāṃ me mahābhāga cetaso yaḥ śubhāśrayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8336: rūpaṃ mūrtamamūrtaṃ ca paraṃ cāparameva ca // NarP_1,47.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:8338: brahmākhyā karmasaṃjñā ca tathā caivobhayātmikā // NarP_1,47.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:8351: na tadyogayujā śakyaṃ nṛpa cintayituṃ yataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8352: tataḥ sthūlaṃ hare rūpaṃ cintyaṃ yañcakṣugocaram // NarP_1,47.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:8354: maruto vasavo rudrā bhāskārāstārakā grahāḥ // NarP_1,47.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:8356: manuṣyāḥ paśavaḥ śailāsamudrāḥ sarito drumāḥ // NarP_1,47.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:8357: bhūpa bhūtānyaśeṣāṇi bhūtānāṃ ye ca hetavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8365: yeyaṃ kṣetrajñaśaktiḥ sā ceṣṭitā nṛpa karmajā /
GP12nardp1_u:8366: asārabhūte saṃsāre proktā tatra mahāmate // NarP_1,47.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:8368: tayā tirohitatvāttu śaktiḥ kṣetrajña saṃjñitā // NarP_1,47.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:8380: amṛrtaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ yatsadityucyate budhaiḥ // NarP_1,47.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:8387: tadrūpaṃ viśvarūpāya cintyaṃ yoga yujā nṛpa /
GP12nardp1_u:8392: kurvīta saṃsthitaṃ sādhu vijñeyā śuddhalakṣaṇā // NarP_1,47.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:8395: anye tu puruṣavyāghra cetaso ye vyāpā8yāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8398: eṣā vai dhāraṇā jñeyā yañcitaṃ tatra dhāryate // NarP_1,47.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:8399: tatra mūrttaṃ hare rūpaṃ yādṛk cintyaṃ narādhipa /
GP12nardp1_u:8412: tāvadyāvad dṛḍhībhūtā tatraiva nṛpa dhāraṇā // NarP_1,47.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:8414: nāpayāti yadā cittātsiddhāṃ manyeta tāṃ tadā // NarP_1,47.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:8425: vijñānaṃ prāpakaṃ prāpye paraṃ brahmaṇi pārthiva /
GP12nardp1_u:8428: niṣpādya muktikāryaṃ vai kṛtakṛtyo nivartate // NarP_1,47.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:8432: ātmano brahmaṇābhedaṃ saṃmataṃ kaḥ kariṣyati // NarP_1,47.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:8441: paramārthastva saṃlāpyo vacasāṃ gocaro na yaḥ // NarP_1,47.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:8446: ājagāma puraṃ brahmaṃstataḥ keśidhvajo nṛpaḥ // NarP_1,47.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:8455: etatte kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yanmāṃ tvaṃ paripṛṣṭavān /
GP12nardp1_u:8461: tathāpi me mano bhrāntaṃ na sthitiṃ labhateṃ'jasā // NarP_1,48.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:8469: yaṃ śrutvā tvanmano bhrāntamāsthānaṃ labhate bhūśam // NarP_1,48.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:8471: ārṣabho yasya nāmnedaṃ bhārataṃ khaṇḍamucyate // NarP_1,48.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:8479: tatrāsau tāpaso tāpaso bhūtvā viṣṇorārādhanaṃ mune // NarP_1,48.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:8481: nityaṃ prātaḥ samāplutya nirmale 'bhali nārada // NarP_1,48.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:8487: sacaikadā mahābhāgaḥ snātvā prātaḥ samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,48.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:8489: athājagāma tattīraṃ jalaṃ pātuṃ pipāsitā // NarP_1,48.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:8491: tataḥ samabhavattatra pītaprāye jale tayā // NarP_1,48.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:8498: munīndra sā tu hariṇī nipapāta mamāra ca /
GP12nardp1_u:8499: hariṇīṃ tāṃ vilokyātha vipannāṃ nṛpatāpasaḥ // NarP_1,48.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:8501: cakārānudinaṃ cāsau mṛgapotasya vai nṛpaḥ // NarP_1,48.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:8502: poṣaṇaṃ puṣyamāṇaśca sa tena vavṛdhe mune /
GP12nardp1_u:8508: āsīñcetaḥ samāsaktaṃ na tathā hyacyute mune /
GP12nardp1_u:8511: kiṃ vṛkaibhakṣito vyāghnaiḥ kiṃ siṃhena nipātitaḥ // NarP_1,48.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:8515: kālena gacchatā so 'tha kālaṃ cakre mahīpatiḥ // NarP_1,48.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:8518: mṛgo babhūva sa mune tādṛśīṃ bhāvanāṃ gataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8523: tatra cotsṛṣṭadeho 'sau jajñe jātismaro dvijaḥ // NarP_1,48.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:8529: na papāṭha guruproktaṃ kṛtopanayanaḥ śrutam // NarP_1,48.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:8530: na dadarśa ca karmāṇi śāstrāṇi jagṛhe na ca /
GP12nardp1_u:8535: saṃmānena parāṃ hāniṃ yogarddheḥ kurute yataḥ // NarP_1,48.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:8537: tasmāñcareta vai yogī satāṃ dharmamadūṣayan // NarP_1,48.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:8541: bhuṅkte kulmāṣavaṭakān śākaṃ tranyaphalaṃ kaṇān // NarP_1,48.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:8549: sa rājā śibikārūḍho gantuṃ kṛtamatirdvija // NarP_1,48.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:8551: śreyaḥ kimatra saṃsāre duḥkhaprāye nṛṇāmiti // NarP_1,48.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:8559: vilokya nṛpatiḥ so 'tha viṣamaṃ śibikāgatam // NarP_1,48.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:8561: punastathaiva śibikāṃ vilokya viṣamāṃ hasan // NarP_1,48.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:8567: kimāyāsasaho na tvaṃ pīvā nāsi nirīkṣyase // NarP_1,48.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:8569: nāhaṃ pīvā na caivoḍhā śibikā bhavato mayā /
GP12nardp1_u:8570: na śrānto 'smi na cāyāso voḍhānyo 'sti mahīpate // NarP_1,48.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:8573: śramaśca bhāro dvahane bhavatyeva hi dehinām // NarP_1,48.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:8575: pratyakṣaṃ bhavatā bhūpa yaddṛṣṭaṃ mama tadvada /
GP12nardp1_u:8577: tvayoḍhā śibikā ceti tvayyadyāpi ca saṃsthitā /
GP12nardp1_u:8578: mithyā tadapyatra bhavān śṛṇotu vacanaṃ mama // NarP_1,48.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:8579: bhūmau pādayugaṃ cātha jaṅghe pādadvaye sthite /
GP12nardp1_u:8585: ahaṃ tvaṃ ca tathānye ca bhūtairuhyāśca pārthiva /
GP12nardp1_u:8589: ātmā śuddho 'kṣaraḥ śānto nirguṇaḥ prakṛte paraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8592: tadāpi bāliśo 'si tvaṃ kayā yuktyā tvayeritam // NarP_1,48.63/
GP12nardp1_u:8594: śibikeyaṃ yadā skandhe tadā bhāraḥ samastvayā // NarP_1,48.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:8598: soḍhavyaḥ sumahānbhāraḥ katamo nṛpa te mayā // NarP_1,48.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:8603: so 'pi rājāvatīryorvyāṃ tatpādau jagṛhe tvaran // NarP_1,48.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:8605: bho bho visṛjya śibikāṃ prasādaṃ kuru me dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:8606: kathyatāṃ ko bhavānatra jālmarupadharaḥ sthitaḥ // NarP_1,48.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:8608: tatsarvaṃ kathyatāṃ vidvanmahyaṃ śuśrūṣave tvayā // NarP_1,48.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:8614: sarvasyaiva hi bhūpāla jantoḥ sarvatra kāraṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:8620: vaktuṃ na śakyate śrotuṃ tanmameccā pravartate // NarP_1,48.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:8621: yo 'sti yo 'hamiti brahmankathaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GP12nardp1_u:8622: ātmanyeva na doṣāya śabdo 'hamiti yo dvijā // NarP_1,48.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:8635: tadadā hi ko bhavānko 'hamityetadviphalaṃ vacaḥ // NarP_1,48.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:8636: tvaṃ rājā śibikā ceyaṃ vayaṃ vāhāḥ puraḥ sarāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8637: ayaṃ ca bhavato loko na sadetannṛpocyate // NarP_1,48.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:8639: kva vṛkṣasaṃjñā vai tasyā dārusaṃjñāthavā nṛpa // NarP_1,48.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:8640: vṛkṣārūḍho mahārājo nāyaṃ vadati te janaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8641: na ca dāruṇi sarvastvāṃ bravīti śibikāgatam // NarP_1,48.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:8645: kva jātaṃ chatramityeṣa nyāyastvayi tathā mayi // NarP_1,48.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:8648: pumānna devo na naro na paśurna ca pādapaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8651: tathānyaśca nṛpetthaṃ tanna satyaṃ kalpanāmayam // NarP_1,48.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:8653: pariṇāmādisaṃbhūtaṃ tadvastu nṛpa tañca kim // NarP_1,48.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:8654: tvaṃ rājā sarvasokasya pituḥ putro ripo ripuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8655: patnyāḥ patiḥ pitā sūnoḥ kastvaṃ bhūpa vadāmyaham // NarP_1,48.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:8656: tvaṃ kimetacciraḥ kiṃ tu śirastava tatho daram /
GP12nardp1_u:8657: kimu pādādikaṃ tvetannaiva kiṃ te mahīpate // NarP_1,48.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:8659: ko 'hamityatra nipuṇaṃ bhūtvā cintaya pārthiva // NarP_1,48.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:8661: pṛthakūcaraṇaniṣpādyaṃ śakyaṃ tu nṛpate katham // NarP_1,48.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:8669: śrute tasminbhramantīva manaso mama vṛttayaḥ // NarP_1,49.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:8671: bhavatā darśitaṃ vipra tatparaṃ prakṛtermahat // NarP_1,49.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:8672: nāhaṃ vahāmi śibikāṃ śibikā mayi na sthitā /
GP12nardp1_u:8675: pravartante guṇāścaite kiṃ mameti tvayoditam // NarP_1,49.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:8679: praṣṭumabhyudyato gatvā śreyaḥ kintvatra saṃśaye // NarP_1,49.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:8681: tenaiva paramārthārthaṃ tvayi cetaḥ pradhāvati // NarP_1,49.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:8689: bhūyaḥ pṛcchasi kiṃ śreyaḥ paramārthena pṛcchasi /
GP12nardp1_u:8692: putrānicchati rājyaṃ ca śreyastasyaiva tannṛpa // NarP_1,49.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:8696: ātmā dhyeyaḥ sadā bhūpa yogayuktaistathā paraiḥ // NarP_1,49.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:8697: śreya stasyaiva saṃyogaḥ śreyo yaḥ paramātmanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8699: saṃtyatra paramārthāstu na tvete śrūyatāṃ ca me /
GP12nardp1_u:8700: dharmo 'yaṃ tyajate kiṃ tu paramārtho dhanaṃ yadi // NarP_1,49.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:8703: paramārthabhūtaḥ so 'nyasya paramārtho hi naḥ pitā /
GP12nardp1_u:8704: evaṃ na paramārtho 'sti jagatyatra carācare // NarP_1,49.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:8707: paramārthā bhavantyatra na bhavanti ca vai tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8710: yattu niṣpādyate kāryaṃ mṛdā kāraṇabhūtayā // NarP_1,49.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:8713: niṣpādyate kriyā yā tu sā bhavitrī vināśinī /
GP12nardp1_u:8716: tadevāpaladaṃ karma paramārtho mato mama // NarP_1,49.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:8724: eko vyāpī samaḥ śuddho nirguṇa prakṛteḥ paraḥ // NarP_1,49.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:8734: śṛṇvatra bhūpa prāgvṛttaṃ yadgītamṛbhuṇā bhavet // NarP_1,49.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:8742: devikāyāstaṭe vīra nāgaraṃ nāma vai puram // NarP_1,49.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:8746: divye varṣasahasre tu samatīte 'sya tatpuram // NarP_1,49.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:8753: bho vipravarya bhoktavyaṃ yadatra bhavato gṛhe // NarP_1,49.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:8754: tatkathyatāṃ kadanneṣu na prītiḥ satataṃ mama /
GP12nardp1_u:8759: kadannāni dijaitāni miṣṭamannaṃ prayaccha me // NarP_1,49.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:8762: gṛhe śālini madgehe yatkiñcidati śobhanam // NarP_1,49.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:8764: ityuktā tena sā patnī miṣṭamannaṃ dvijasya tat // NarP_1,49.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:8769: api te paramā tṛptirutpannā puṣṭireva // NarP_1,49.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:8770: api te mānasaṃ svasthamāhāreṇa kṛtaṃ dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:8771: kva nivāsī bhavānvipra kva vā gantuṃ samudyataḥ // NarP_1,49.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:8775: na me kṣudhā bhavettṝptiḥ kasmānmāṃ dvija pṛcchati /
GP12nardp1_u:8776: vahninā pārthivenādau dagdhe vai kṣurāpīśvaḥ // NarP_1,49.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:8778: kṣuttṛṣṇe dehadharmākhye na mamaite yato dvija // NarP_1,49.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:8782: kva nivāsastavetyuktaṃ kva gantāsi ca yattvayā // NarP_1,49.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:8786: so 'haṃ gantā na cāgantā naikadeśaniketanaḥ // NarP_1,49.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:8787: tvaṃ cānye ca na ca tvaṃ tvaṃ nānye naivāhamapyaham /
GP12nardp1_u:8788: miṣṭanne miṣṭamityeṣā jihvā sā me kṛtā tava // NarP_1,49.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:8793: mṛṇmayaṃ hi mṛdā yadvadgṛhaṃ liptaṃ sthirībhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:8794: pārthivo 'yaṃ tathā dehaḥ pārthivaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ // NarP_1,49.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:8796: guḍaḥ phalānīti tathā pārthivāḥ paramāṇavaḥ // NarP_1,49.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:8798: tanmanaḥ śamanālabi kāryaṃ prāpyaṃ hi muktaye // NarP_1,49.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:8802: naṣṭo mohastavākarṇya vacāṃsyetāni me dvija // NarP_1,49.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:8806: eka evamidaṃ viddhi na bhedi sakalaṃ jagat /
GP12nardp1_u:8810: pūjitaḥ parayā bhaktyānicchitaḥ prayayau vibhuḥ // NarP_1,49.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:8813: nagarasya bahiḥ so 'tha nidāghaṃ dṛṣṭavān munim /
GP12nardp1_u:8818: uvāca kasmādekāntaṃ sthīyata bhavatā dvija // NarP_1,49.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:8821: pravivakṣau pure ramye tenātra sthīyate mayā // NarP_1,49.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:8824: kathyatāṃ me dvijaśreṣṭha tvamabhijño mato mama // NarP_1,49.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:8829: etau hi gajarājānau dṛṣṭau hi yugapanmayā /
GP12nardp1_u:8832: jñātumicchāmyahaṃ ko 'tra gajaḥ ko vā narādhipaḥ // NarP_1,49.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:8835: vāhyavāhakasaṃbandhaṃ ko na jānāti vai dvija // NarP_1,49.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:8838: adhaḥ sattvavibhāgaṃ kiṃ kiṃ corddhamabhidhīyate // NarP_1,49.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:8840: ityuktvā sahasāruhya nidāghaḥ prāha taṃ ṛbhum /
GP12nardp1_u:8841: śrayatāṃ kathayāmyeṣa yanmāṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi // NarP_1,49.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:8843: avabodhāya te brahmandṛṣṭānto darśito mayā // NarP_1,49.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:8846: tadevaṃ tvaṃ samācakṣva katamastvamahaṃ tathā // NarP_1,49.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:8851: yathācāryasya tena tvāṃ manye prāptamahaṃ gurum // NarP_1,49.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:8858: evamuktvā dadau vidyāṃ nidāghaṃ sa ṛbhurguruḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8866: ekaḥ samastaṃ yadihāsti kiñcittadacyuto nāsti paraṃ tato 'nyat /
GP12nardp1_u:8867: so 'haṃ sa ca tvaṃ sa ca sarvametadātmāṃsvayaṃ bhātyapabhedamohaḥ // NarP_1,49.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:8873: yathā pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā brahmaṃstathā te gaditaṃ mayā /
GP12nardp1_u:8879: asaṃtuṣṭa iva prāha bhrātaraṃ taṃ sanandanam // NarP_1,50.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:8882: tathāpi nātmā prīyeta śṛṇvanharikathāṃ muhuḥ // NarP_1,50.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:8884: siddhiṃ sumahatīṃ prāpto nirviṇṇo 'vāntaraṃ bahiḥ // NarP_1,50.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:8886: na jāyate kathaṃ prāpto jñānaṃ vyāsātmajaḥ śiśuḥ // NarP_1,50.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:8891: yāṃ śrutvā brahmatattvajño jāyate mānavo mune // NarP_1,50.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:8892: na hāyanairna palitairna vittena na bandhubhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8893: ṛṣayaścakrire dharmaṃ yo 'nūcānaḥ sa no mahān // NarP_1,50.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:8896: tanme karma samācakṣva śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ mama // NarP_1,50.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:8900: śikṣā kalpo vyākaraṇaṃ niruktaṃ jyotiṣaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:8907: aṅgānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brūhi vedānāṃ cāpi vistarāt /
GP12nardp1_u:8913: vedānāṃ vedavidbhistu tacchṛṇuṣva vadāmi te // NarP_1,50.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:8914: ārcikaṃ gāthikaṃ caiva sāmikaṃ ca svarāntaram /
GP12nardp1_u:8920: mantro hīnaḥ svarato varṇato vā mithyāprayukto na tamarthamāha /
GP12nardp1_u:8921: sa vāgvajro yajamānaṃ hirnāsti yathendraśatruḥ svarato 'parādhāt // NarP_1,50.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:8922: uraḥ kaṇṭhaḥ śiraścaiva sthānāni trīṇi vāṅkye /
GP12nardp1_u:8925: na ca śakto 'si vyaktastu tathā prāvacanā vidhiḥ // NarP_1,50.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:8927: ṛgvede sāmavede ca vaktavyaḥ prathamaḥ svaraḥ // NarP_1,50.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:8933: mandraḥ kruṣṭo munīśvara etānkurvanti sāmagāḥ // NarP_1,50.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:8936: ete viśeṣataḥ proktāḥ svarā vai sārvavaidikāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8938: sāmavede tu vakṣyāmi svarāṇāṃ caritaṃ yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:8941: pavitraṃ pāvanaṃ puṇyaṃ yathā tubhyaṃ prakīrtitam // NarP_1,50.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:8949: svargābhrāñcaiva gāndhāro grāmasthānāni trīṇi hi // NarP_1,50.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:8950: svarāṇāṃ ca viśeṣeṇa grāmarāgā iti smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8953: nadī viśālā sumukhī citrā citravatī mukhā // NarP_1,50.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:8954: balā cāpyatha vijñeyā devānāṃ sapta mūrchanāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8955: āpyāyinī viśvabhṛtā candrā hemā kapardinī // NarP_1,50.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:8956: maitrī ca bārhatī caiva pitṝṇāṃ sapta mūrchanāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8958: aśvakrāntā tu gāndhāre tṛtīyā mūrcchanā smṛtā /
GP12nardp1_u:8959: madhyame khalu sauvīrā hṛṣikā pañcame svare // NarP_1,50.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:8960: dhaivate cāpi vijñeyā mūrchanā tūttarā matā /
GP12nardp1_u:8961: niṣāde rajanīṃ vidyādṛṣīṇāṃ sapta mūrchanāḥ // NarP_1,50.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:8963: pitṝṇāṃ mūrcchānāḥ sapta tathā yakṣā na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,50.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:8964: ṛṣīṇāṃ mūrchanāḥ sapta yāstvimā laukikāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8965: ṣaṅjaḥ prīṇāti vai devānṛṣīnprīṇāti carṣabhaḥ // NarP_1,50.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:8969: gānasya tu daśavidhā guṇavṛttistu tadyathā // NarP_1,50.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:8970_0: raktaṃ pūrṇamalaṅkṛtaṃ prasannaṃ vyaktaṃ vikruṣṭaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ samaṃ sukumāraṃ madhuramiti
GP12nardp1_u:8970_1: guṇāstatra raktaṃ nāma veṇuvīṇāsvarāṇāmekībhāvaṃ raktamityucyate pūrṇaṃ nāma svaraśrutipūraṇācchandaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:8970_2: pādākṣaraṃ saṃyogātpūrṇamityucyate alaṅkṛtaṃ nāmorasi śirasi kaṇṭhayuktamityalaṅkṛtaṃ
GP12nardp1_u:8970_6: ślakṣṇamityucyate samaṃ nāmāvāpanirvāpapradeśe pratyantarasthānānāṃ samāsaḥ samamityucyate
GP12nardp1_u:8970_7: sukumāraṃ nāma mṛdupadavarṇasvarakuhagaraṇayuktaṃ sukumāramityucyate madhuraṃ nāma
GP12nardp1_u:8982: pacamo madhyamaḥ ṣaṅja ityete brāhmaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8987: nipatati madhyamarāge sa niṣādaṃ ṣāṅjavaṃ vidyāt // NarP_1,50.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:8993: dhaivataḥ kaṃpito yatra sa ṣaṅgayāma īritaḥ // NarP_1,50.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:8995: taṃ tu sādhāritaṃ vidyātpañcamasthaṃ tu kaiśikam // NarP_1,50.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:8996: kaiśikaṃ bhāvayitvā tu svaraiḥ sarvaiḥ samantataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9000: geti geyaṃ viduḥ prājñā dheti kārupravādanam /
GP12nardp1_u:9001: veti vādyasya saṃjñeyaṃ gandharvasya prarocanam // NarP_1,50.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:9002: yaḥ sāmagānāṃ prathamaḥ sa veṇormadhyamaḥ svaraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9003: yo dvitīyaḥ sa gāndhārastṛtīyastvṛṣabhaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,50.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:9004: caturthaḥ ṣaṅja ityāhuḥ pañcamo dhaivato bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:9005: ṣaṣṭho niṣādo vijñeyaḥ saptamaḥ pañcamaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,50.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:9006: ṣaṅjaṃ mayūro vadati gāvo raṃbhanti carṣabham /
GP12nardp1_u:9007: ajāvike tu gāndhāraṃ kraiñco vadati madhyamam // NarP_1,50.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:9009: aśvastu dhaivataṃ vakti niṣaādaṃ vakti kuñjaraḥ // NarP_1,50.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:9015: ṣaṅbhiḥ saṃ jāyate yasmāttasmātṣaṅja iti smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,50.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:9019: vāti gandhavahaḥ puṇyo gāndhārastena hetunā // NarP_1,50.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:9024: dhaivataṃ ca niṣādaṃ ca varjayitvā tu tāvubhau /
GP12nardp1_u:9028: somena gīto gāndhāro viṣṇunā madhyamaḥ svaraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9031: ādyaṃsya daivataṃ brahmā ṣaṅjasyāpyucyate budhaiḥ // NarP_1,50.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:9033: gāvaḥ praṇīte tuṣyanti gāndhārastena hetunā // NarP_1,50.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:9041: dāravī gātravīṇā ca dve vīṇe gānajātiṣu // NarP_1,50.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:9042: sāmanī gātravīṇā tu tasyāstvaṃ śṛṇu lakṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:9043: gātravīṇā tu sā proktā yasyāṃ gāyanti sāmaṅgāḥ // NarP_1,50.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:9045: hastau tu saṃyatau dhāryauṃ jānubhyāmuparisthitau // NarP_1,50.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:9051: viralā nāṅgulīḥ kuryānmūle caitāṃ na saṃspṛśet // NarP_1,50.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:9052: aṅguṣṭhāgreṇa tā nityaṃ madhyame parvaṇi spṛśet /
GP12nardp1_u:9055: trirekhā yasya dṛśyate siddhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet // NarP_1,50.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:9057: parvāntaraṃ sāmasu ca ṛkṣu kuryāttilāntaram // NarP_1,50.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:9063: kūrmo 'gāni ca saṃhṛtya cetodṛṣṭiṃ diśanmanaḥ // NarP_1,50.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:9067: samyakpracārayedvākyaṃ hastena ca mukhena ca // NarP_1,50.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:9070: samaṃ sāmāni gāyeta vyomni svena gātiryathā /
GP12nardp1_u:9071: yathā sucaratāṃ mārgo mīnānāṃ nopalabhyate // NarP_1,50.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:9073: yathā dadhini sarpiḥ syātkāṣṭastho vā yathānalaḥ // NarP_1,50.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:9079: svaraḥ sthānāccyuto yastu svaṃ sthānamativartate // NarP_1,50.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:9081: abhyāsārthe drutāṃ vṛttiṃ prayogārthe tu madhyamām // NarP_1,50.99 //
GP12nardp1_u:9085: kruṣṭasya mūrddhani sthānaṃ lalāṭe prathamasya tu // NarP_1,50.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:9089: aṅguṣṭasyottame vruṣṭo hyaṅguṣṭaṃ prathamaḥ svaraḥ // NarP_1,50.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:9091: anāmikāyāṃ ṣaṅgastu kaniṣṭāyāṃ tu dhaivataḥ // NarP_1,50.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:9094: mandro hi mandībhūtastu parisvāra iti smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9095: kruṣṭena devā jīvanti prathamena tu mānuṣāḥ // NarP_1,50.106 //
GP12nardp1_u:9100: sarvāṇi khalu bhūtāni dhāryante sāmikaiḥ svaraiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9102: śrutīnāṃ yo viśeṣajño na sa ācārya ucyate /
GP12nardp1_u:9103: dīptā mandre dvitīya ca pracaturthe tathaiva ca // NarP_1,50.110 //
GP12nardp1_u:9104: atisvare tṛtīye ca kruṣṭe tu karuṇā śrutiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9105: śrutayo yā dvitīyasya mṛdumadhyāyatāḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,50.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:9106: tāsāmapi tu vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇāni pṛthak pṛthak /
GP12nardp1_u:9107: āyatātvaṃ bhavennīce mṛdutā tu viparyaye // NarP_1,50.112 //
GP12nardp1_u:9108: sve svare madhyamātvaṃ tu tatsamīkṣya prayojayet /
GP12nardp1_u:9109: dvitīye viratā yā tu kruṣṭaśca parato bhavet // NarP_1,50.113 //
GP12nardp1_u:9110: dīptāṃ tāṃ tu vijānīyātprāthamyena mṛduḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9111: atraiva viratā yā tu caturthena pravartate // NarP_1,50.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:9114: taṃ ca hrasve ca dīrghe ca na cāpi ghuṭisajñake /
GP12nardp1_u:9119: dīptāmudātte jānīyāddīptāṃ ca svarite viduḥ // NarP_1,50.118 //
GP12nardp1_u:9123: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi ācikasya svaratrayam // NarP_1,50.120 //
GP12nardp1_u:9125: ya evodātta ityuktaḥ sa eva svaritātparaḥ // NarP_1,50.121 //
GP12nardp1_u:9129: sa tu saptavidho jñeyaḥ svaraḥ pratyayadarśanāt // NarP_1,50.123 //
GP12nardp1_u:9130: padena tu sa vijñeyo bhavedyo yatra yādṛśaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9141: jātyaḥ kṣaipro 'bhinihita stairavyañjana eva ca // NarP_1,50.129 //
GP12nardp1_u:9145: sapakāraṃ savaṃ vāpi hyakṣaraṃ svaritaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,50.131 //
GP12nardp1_u:9146: na codāttaṃ puro yasya jātyaḥ svāraḥ sa ucyate /
GP12nardp1_u:9157: svare cetsvaritaṃ yatra vivṛtā yatra saṃhitā // NarP_1,50.137 //
GP12nardp1_u:9159: tānyaḥ svāraḥ sa jātyena śrutyagre kṣaipra ucyate // NarP_1,50.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:9167: ikārānte pade pūrva ukāre parataḥ sthite // NarP_1,50.142 //
GP12nardp1_u:9169: ikārānte pade caivokāradvayaṃ pare pade // NarP_1,50.143 //
GP12nardp1_u:9171: trayo dīrghāstu vijñeyā ye ca saṃdhyakṣareṣu vai // NarP_1,50.144 //
GP12nardp1_u:9172: manyā yathā na indrābhyāṃ śeṣā hrasvāḥ prakīrtitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9177: na rephe vā hakāre vā dvirbhāvo jāyate kvacit // NarP_1,50.147 //
GP12nardp1_u:9178: na ca vargadvitīyeṣu na caturthe kadācana /
GP12nardp1_u:9179: caturthaṃ tu tṛtīyena dvitīyaḥ prathamena tu // NarP_1,50.148 //
GP12nardp1_u:9180: ādyamantyaṃ ca madhyaṃ ca svārākṣareṇa pīḍayet /
GP12nardp1_u:9181: anantyaśca bhavetpūrvo hyantaśca parato yadi // NarP_1,50.149 //
GP12nardp1_u:9189: saṃyogo yatra dṛśyeta rvyañjanaṃ virate pade // NarP_1,50.153 //
GP12nardp1_u:9191: saṃyoge svaritaṃ yatra udvātaḥ pratanaṃ tathā // NarP_1,50.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:9195: anusvāraḥ padāntaśca kramajaṃ pratyaye svake // NarP_1,50.156 //
GP12nardp1_u:9198: yaśabda iti vijñeyo yo 'nyaḥsaya iti smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9204: yannīcaṃ nīcameva tadyatpracayasthaṃ tadapi nīcam // NarP_1,50.160 //
GP12nardp1_u:9206: priyaṃ dūtaṃ ghṛtaṃ cittamatiśabdastu nīcataḥ // NarP_1,50.161 //
GP12nardp1_u:9211: dvau varuṇau vasvarata uduttamantvaṃ varuṇadhāra caurudhārāmurudhāresvadohate /
GP12nardp1_u:9212: mātrikaṃ vā dvimātraṃ vā svaryate yadihākṣaram /
GP12nardp1_u:9213: tasyāditor'ddhamātraṃ vai śeṣaṃ tu parato bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:9222: svarayupuvodevayavaścāritaṃ devatātape ) cikitiśca dhacaiva nāvagṛhṇanti paṇḍitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9223: vivṛtayaścatasro vai vijñeyā iti me matam // NarP_1,50.168 //
GP12nardp1_u:9224: akṣarāṇāṃ niyogena tāsāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu /
GP12nardp1_u:9227: catasṛṇāṃ vivṛtīnā mantaraṃ mātrikaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,50.170 //
GP12nardp1_u:9231: nakārānte padā pūrve svare ca parataḥ sthite /
GP12nardp1_u:9234: arddhamātrā tu pūrvasya rajyate tvaṇumātrayā // NarP_1,50.174 //
GP12nardp1_u:9236: repho raṅgaśca lopaśca sānusvaro 'pi vā kvacit // NarP_1,50.175 //
GP12nardp1_u:9238: mṛduścaiva dvimātraśca dadhanvāṃ iti nidarśanam // NarP_1,50.176 //
GP12nardp1_u:9240: evaṃ raṅgaḥ prayoktavyo nāradaitanmataṃ mama // NarP_1,50.177 //
GP12nardp1_u:9242: caturṇāṃ padajātīnāṃ padāntā daśa kīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,50.178 //
GP12nardp1_u:9243: svara uccaḥ svaro nīcaḥ svaraḥ svarita eva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:9244: vyañjanā na tu vartante yatra tiṣṭati sa svaraḥ // NarP_1,50.179 //
GP12nardp1_u:9246: maṇivadvyañjanaṃ vidyātsūtra vañca svaraṃ viduḥ // NarP_1,50.180 //
GP12nardp1_u:9253: saṃdhyakṣare pare saṃdhau prāptasuptau yavau yadi /
GP12nardp1_u:9255: ūṣmāntaṃ virate yatra saṃbhāvo bhavati kvacit /
GP12nardp1_u:9256: vivṛttiryā bhavettatra svarākhyāṃ tāṃ vinirddiśet // NarP_1,50.185 //
GP12nardp1_u:9263: chandomānaṃ ca vṛttaṃ ca pādasthānaṃ trikāraṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:9267: ṛvarṇe tu pṛthagrephaḥ pratyayastu vṛthā bhaveta /
GP12nardp1_u:9269: ūṣmaṇaiva hi saṃyukta ṛkāro yatra pīḍyate /
GP12nardp1_u:9270: guruvarṇaḥ sa vijñeyastṛcaṃ cātra nidarśanam // NarP_1,50.192 //
GP12nardp1_u:9271: ṛṣabhaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ ca bṛhaspatiṃ pṛthivyāṃ ca /
GP12nardp1_u:9272: nirṛtipañcamā hyatra ṛkārā nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,50.193 //
GP12nardp1_u:9278: śaṣaseṣu vivṛtāṃ tu hakāre saṃvṛtāṃ viduḥ // NarP_1,50.196 //
GP12nardp1_u:9280: ikāraṃ cāpyukāraṃ grastadoṣaṃ tathaiva ca // NarP_1,50.197 //
GP12nardp1_u:9282: atha sāntika ca naṅmasānusvāraṃ ghuṭataṃ ca // NarP_1,50.198 //
GP12nardp1_u:9285: yasyā lakṣaṇamuktaṃ yā tvanyā sā smṛtā vipulā // NarP_1,50.199 //
GP12nardp1_u:9288: vivṛttir yatra dṛśyate svārasyaivāgrataḥ sthitaḥ // NarP_1,50.201 //
GP12nardp1_u:9292: madhyodāttaṃ svaritaṃ dvirudāttamityetā aṣṭau padasaṃjñāḥ // NarP_1,50.203 //
GP12nardp1_u:9293: agniḥ somaḥ pravo vīryaṃ haviṣā svarvanaspatiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9294: antarmadhyamayotāmyudamanunipātya ādyātsvaritamupasarge dvirnnīcamākhyāta iti svaritātparāṇi yāni syurddhārāpakṣarāṇi tu /
GP12nardp1_u:9296: pracayo yatra dṛśyeta tatra hanyātsvaraṃ budhaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9297: svaritaḥ kevalo yatra mṛdustatra nipātayet // NarP_1,50.205 //
GP12nardp1_u:9298: pañcavidhamācāryakaṃ nāma sukhaṃ nyāsaḥ karaṇaṃ pratijñoccāraṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:9299: atrocyate śreyaḥ khalu vaiśyāḥ pratijñātoccāraṇā yasya kasyacidvarṇasya karaṇaṃ nopalabhyate pratijñā tatra voḍhavyākaraṇaṃ hi tadātmakam // NarP_1,50.206 //
GP12nardp1_u:9301: sāmasu nibhṛtaṃ karaṇaṃ svarasaukṣmyānnaiva jānīyuḥ // NarP_1,50.207 //
GP12nardp1_u:9303: jīrṇo hāraḥ prabuddhaḥ khalūṣasinbrahma cintayet // NarP_1,50.208 //
GP12nardp1_u:9309: sarve kaṇṭakinaḥ puṇyāḥ kṣīriṇaśca yaśasvinaḥ // NarP_1,50.211 //
GP12nardp1_u:9310: tenāsya karaṇe saukṣmyaṃ mādhuryaṃ copa jāyate /
GP12nardp1_u:9315: pītvā madhuṃ ghṛtaṃ caiva śucirbhūtvā tato vadet // NarP_1,50.214 //
GP12nardp1_u:9322: na tasya parimokṣo 'sti pāpāheriva kilbiṣāt // NarP_1,50.217 //
GP12nardp1_u:9324: susvareṇa svavakreṇa prayuktaṃ brahma rājati // NarP_1,50.218 //
GP12nardp1_u:9325: na takālo na laṃboṣṭo na ca sarvānunāsikaḥ // NarP_1,50.218 //
GP12nardp1_u:9328: sa tu varṇānprayuñjīta detoṣṭhaṃ yasya śobhanam // NarP_1,50.220 //
GP12nardp1_u:9329: pañcavidyāṃ na gṛhṇanti caṇḍā stabdhāśca ye narāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9330: alasāśca sarogāśca yeṣāṃ ca visṛtaṃ manaḥ // NarP_1,50.221 //
GP12nardp1_u:9332: śanairadhvasu varteta yojanānna paraṃ vrajet // NarP_1,50.222 //
GP12nardp1_u:9341: añjanasya kṣayaṃ dṛṣṭvā valmīkasya tu saṃcayam /
GP12nardp1_u:9348: nahi vādyārthināṃ nidrā ciraṃ netreṣu tiṣṭati // NarP_1,50.230 //
GP12nardp1_u:9352: rākṣasībhya iva sribhyaḥ sa vidyāmadhigacchati // NarP_1,50.232 //
GP12nardp1_u:9353: na śaṭhāḥ prānpuvantyarthānna klibā na ca māninaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9354: na ca lokaravā dīnā na ca svasvapratīkṣakāḥ // NarP_1,50.233 //
GP12nardp1_u:9358: athavā vidyayā vidyā hyanyathā nopapadyate // NarP_1,50.235 //
GP12nardp1_u:9360: vandhyeva yauvanavatī na tasya sāphalyavati bhavati // NarP_1,50.236 //
GP12nardp1_u:9362: jñātvā vedāṅgamādyaṃ tu brahmabhūyāya kalpate // NarP_1,50.237 //
GP12nardp1_u:9363: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde pañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:9370: nakṣatrakalpe nirdiṣṭaṃ jñātavyaṃ tadihāpi ca // NarP_1,51.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:9371: vedakalpe vidhānaṃ tu ṛgādī nāṃ munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:9380: viśeṣaḥ pṛthageteṣāṃ sthitaḥ śaṅkhāntareṣu ca // NarP_1,51.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:9382: vakṣyāmi te dvijaśreṣṭha sāvadhānatayā śṛṇu // NarP_1,51.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:9385: kṛtvā proktāni karmāṇi tadvarddhvāni karoti yaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9391: rekhāḥ proktāśca yāstisraḥ kartavyāstāḥ samā dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:9392: nyūnādhikā na karttavyā ityeva paribhāṣitam // NarP_1,51.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:9395: vandhyā duṣṭā ca dīnāṅgī mṛtavatsā ca yā bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:9396: yajñārthaṃ gomayaṃ tasyā nāharediti bhāṣitam // NarP_1,51.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:9398: taṣāṃ praharaṇārthāya mataṃ proddharaṇaṃ dvija // NarP_1,51.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:9401: āpo devagaṇāḥ sarve tathā pitṛgaṇā dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:9404: śubhade mṛṇmaye pātre prokṣyādbhistaṃ nidhāyapayet // NarP_1,51.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:9408: tebhyaḥ saṃrakṣaṇārthāya brahmāṇaṃ taddiśi nyaset // NarP_1,51.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:9410: yajamānaḥ pūrvataḥ syurdvijāḥ sarve 'pi nārada // NarP_1,51.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:9411: dyūte ca vyavahāre ca yajñakarmaṇi cedbhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:9414: ṛtvijāṃ niyamo nāsti yathālābhaṃ samarcayet // NarP_1,51.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:9415: dve paritre tryaṅgule staḥ prokṣiṇī caturaṅgulā /
GP12nardp1_u:9418: sruvaṃ ṣaḍaṅgula proktaṃ srucaṃ sārddhatrayāṅgulam // NarP_1,51.27 //

GP12nardp1_u:9889: bhramarāduṣu śabdeṣu jñeyo yogo hi pañcamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9892: paraṃ vyavahitāścāpi gatisaṃjñāstathā hi ā // NarP_1,53.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:9893: vibhaktīnāṃ viparyāso yathā dadhanā juhoti hi /
GP12nardp1_u:9897: vyatyayamicchati śāsrakṛdeṣāṃ so 'pi ca siddhyati bāhulakena // NarP_1,53.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:9898: rātrī vimbī ca kadrūścāviṣṭvau vājasaneyinaḥ // NarP_1,53.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:9904: hiraṇyayena naraṃ ca parame vyomanityapi // NarP_1,53.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:9906: yajadhvainamemasi ca snātvī gatvā pacāsthabhauḥ // NarP_1,53.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:9910: dadhartyādyā svavadbhiśca sasūveti ca dhiṣva ca // NarP_1,53.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:9936: anudātteta akhyātā bhādyutāttā itaḥ syamāt // NarP_1,53.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:9938: sadasraya udāttetaḥ kucādvedā udātta it // NarP_1,53.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:9950: bhvādyā ete ṣaḍadhikaṃ sahasraṃ dhātavo matāḥ // NarP_1,53.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:9952: svariteto dviṣādyāstu catvāro dhātavo matāḥ // NarP_1,53.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:9956: parasmaipadinaḥ proktā ṣumukhāḥ sapta dhātavaḥ // NarP_1,53.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:9959: ṣṭuñekastu samā khyātaḥ smṛte nārada śābdikaiḥ // NarP_1,53.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:9969: dādayo dhātavo vedāḥ parasmaipadino matāḥ // NarP_1,53.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:9973: ghṛmukhā dvādaśa tathā parasmaipatino matāḥ // NarP_1,53.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:9977: oditaḥ pūṅmukhāḥ sapta ātmanedapino matāḥ // NarP_1,53.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:9981: mṛṣādyāḥ svaritetastu dhātavaḥ pañca kīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,53.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:9983: rādhoḥ karmaka evātra vṛddhau svādicurādike // NarP_1,53.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:9987: catvāriśacchataṃ cāpi divādau dhātavo matāḥ // NarP_1,53.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:9995: vraścādaya udāttetaḥ proktāḥ pañcādhikaṃ śatam // NarP_1,53.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:9999: pṛṅ mṛṅ cātmanebhāṣau ṣaṭ parasmaipade ripeḥ // NarP_1,53.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:10002: svaritetaḥ ṣaṭ tataśca proktā milamukhā mune /
GP12nardp1_u:10010: tato dvau kīrtitau vipra dhātavo daśa śābdikaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10017: curādyā dhātavo ñyantā ṣaṭrtriṃśadadhikaḥ śatam // NarP_1,53.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:10019: carcādyā ādhṛṣīyāstu pyantā vā parikīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,53.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:10021: padādyāstu daśa proktā dhātavo hyātmanepade // NarP_1,53.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:10022: sūtrādyā aṣṭa cāpyatra ñyantā proktā manīṣibhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10027: stomādyāḥ ṣoḍaśa tathā andatasyaṃ nidarśanam // NarP_1,53.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:10032: saṃkṣepo 'yaṃ samuddiṣṭo vistarastatra tatra ca // NarP_1,53.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:10034: vṛṅvṛñbhyāṃ ca vinaikāco 'janteṣu nihatāḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,53.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:10046: cādyā nipātā gavayaḥ prādyā digdeśakālajāḥ // NarP_1,53.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:10047: śabdāḥ proktā hyanekārthāḥ sarvaliṅgā api dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:10050: śabdāḥ siddhā vaidikāstu laukikāścāpi nārada // NarP_1,53.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:10056: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇa pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde niruktalakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma tripañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:10082: ekaṃ daśa śataṃ caiva sahasrāyutalakṣakam // NarP_1,54.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:10084: niravarva ca mahāpadmaṃ śaṅkurjaladhireva ca // NarP_1,54.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:10085: atyaṃ madhyaṃ parārddhaṃ ca saṃjñā daśaguṇottarāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10086: kramādutkramato vāpi yogaḥ kāryottaraṃ tathā // NarP_1,54.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:10092: tatkṛtiṃ ca tyajedvipra mūlena vibhajetpunaḥ // NarP_1,54.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:10095: procyate viṣamaṃ tvādyaṃ same dve ca tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:10101: lavā lavaghnāśca harā haraghnā hi savarṇanam /
GP12nardp1_u:10109: chedaṃ cāpi lavaṃ vidvanparivartya harasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:10110: śeṣaḥ kāryo bhāgahāre kartavyo guṇanāvidhiḥ // NarP_1,54.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:10111: hārāṃśayoḥ kṛtī varge ghanau ghanavidhau mune /
GP12nardp1_u:10112: padasiddhyai pade kuryādathoravaṃ sarvataśca ravam // NarP_1,54.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:10113: chedaṃ guṇaṃ guṇaṃ chedaṃ vargaṃ mūlaṃ padaṃ kṛtim /
GP12nardp1_u:10114: ṛṇaṃ svaṃ svamṛṇaṃ kuryādṛśye rāśiprasiddhaye // NarP_1,54.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:10115: atha svāṃśādhikone tu lavāḍhyo no haro haraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10122: eko 'sya vargo dalitaḥ saiko rāśiḥ paro mataḥ // NarP_1,54.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:10126: eṣīsyānāmubhe vyakte gaṇite vyaktameva ca // NarP_1,54.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:10128: dṛṣṭasya ca guṇārddho na yutaṃ vargīkṛtaṃ guṇaḥ // NarP_1,54.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:10130: bhaktaṃ tathā mūlaguṇaṃ tābhyāṃ sādhyotha vyaktavat // NarP_1,54.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:10134: bahurāśivadhaṃ bhakte phalaṃ svalpavadhena ca // NarP_1,54.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:10140: kṣepā miśrahatāḥ kṣepoyogabhaktāḥ phalāni ca // NarP_1,54.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:10143: vyastaṃ gacchataṃ phalaṃ yadguṇavargaṃ bhacahi tat /
GP12nardp1_u:10144: vyekaṃ vyekaguṇāptaṃ ca prādhnaṃ mānaṃ guṇottare // NarP_1,54.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:10148: rāśyorantaravargeṇa dvighne ghāte yute tayoḥ // NarP_1,54.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:10157: vyāsadhnaṃ prabhajedvipra jyā kāśaṃ jāyate sphuṭā /
GP12nardp1_u:10184: tāvatyeva niśā tasya viprendra parikīrtitā // NarP_1,54.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:10224: yojanāni śatānyaṣṭau bhūkarṇauṃ dviguṇāḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,54.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:10234: iṣṭanāḍīguṇā bhuktiḥ ṣaṣṭyā bhaktā kalādikam // NarP_1,54.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:10235: gate śoddhyaṃ tathā yojyaṃ gamye tātkāliko grahaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10246: grahaṃ saṃśodhya mandoñcattathā śīghnādviśodhya ca // NarP_1,54.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:10258: jyāṃ prohya śeṣaṃ tattvatāśvi hṝntaṃ tadvivaroddhṛm // NarP_1,54.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:10272: śai'yakoṭiphalaṃ kendre makarādau dhanaṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,54.107 //
GP12nardp1_u:10273: saṃśodhyaṃ tu trijīvāyāṃ karkādau koṭijaṃ phalam /
GP12nardp1_u:10276: saṃśodhyaṃ tu trijīvāyāṃ karkādau koṭijaṃ phalam // NarP_1,54.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:10279: labdhasya cāpaṃ liptādi phalaṃ śaidhryamidaṃ smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:10280: etadādau kujādīnāṃ caturthe caiva karmaṇi // NarP_1,54.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:10282: śairdhyaṃ mādyaṃ punarmāndyaṃ śairghyaṃ catvāryanukramāt // NarP_1,54.112 //
GP12nardp1_u:10283: ajā dikendre sarveṣāṃ māndye śairghye ca karmaṇi /
GP12nardp1_u:10284: dhanaṃ grahāṇāṃ liptādi tulādāvṛṇameva tat // NarP_1,54.113 //
GP12nardp1_u:10288: karkādau taddhanaṃ tatra makarādāvṛṇaṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,54.115 //
GP12nardp1_u:10309: tithayaḥ śuklapratipado dvighnāḥ saikā na gāhatāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10310: śeṣaṃ bavo bālavaśca kaulavastaitilo garaḥ // NarP_1,54.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:10318: tanmadhye timinā rekhā kartavyā dakṣiṇottata // NarP_1,54.130 //
GP12nardp1_u:10328: prohya śaṅkukṛte mūlaṃ chāyā śekuviparyayāt // NarP_1,54.135 //
GP12nardp1_u:10334: laṃbākṣajye tayośchāye laṃbākṣau dakṣimau sadā // NarP_1,54.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:10340: digbhedopakramaḥ śeṣastasya jyā trijyayā hatā // NarP_1,54.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:10359: bhāgayuktaṃ ca hīnaṃ ca vyayanāṃśaṃ tanuḥ kuje /
GP12nardp1_u:10361: bhānau kṣayadhane kṛtvā madhyalagnaṃ tadā bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:10366: arkaṃ vidhurvidhuṃ bhūbhā chādayatyathā channakam // NarP_1,54.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:10391: dṛṣṭvā hyādau kheṭabiṃbaṃ dṛgauñcye laṃbamīkṣya ca // NarP_1,54.166 //
GP12nardp1_u:10393: aste sāvayavā jñeyā gataiṣyāstithayo budhaiḥ // NarP_1,54.167 //
GP12nardp1_u:10407: tayute maṇḍale krāntyau tulyatve vai dhṛtābhidhaḥ // NarP_1,54.174 //
GP12nardp1_u:10413: yadi syādadhikā bhānoḥ krānteḥ pāto gatastadā // NarP_1,54.177 //
GP12nardp1_u:10414: nyūnā cetsyāttadā bhāvī vāmaṃ yugmapadasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:10415: yadānyatvaṃ vidhoḥ krāntiḥ kṣepāccedyadi śuddhyati // NarP_1,54.178 //
GP12nardp1_u:10434: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde jyotiṣavarṇanaṃ nāma catuḥpañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:10448: śeṣā dinākhyāstūbhayaṃ timiḥ krūraḥ saumyaḥ pumān // NarP_1,55.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:10458: nṛpādaḥ kīṭapaśavo balāḍhyāḥ kendragāḥ kramāt // NarP_1,55.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:10460: raktaḥ śvetaḥ śukanibhaḥ pāṭalo dhūmrapāṇḍurau // NarP_1,55.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:10461: citraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pītapiṅgau babhruḥ svacchaḥ prabhākriyāt /
GP12nardp1_u:10464: jīvo jñānaṃ sukhaṃ śukraḥ kāmo duḥkhaṃ dineśajaḥ // NarP_1,55.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:10465: nṛpau ravīndū netāsṛk kumāro jñaḥ kavījyakau /
GP12nardp1_u:10466: sacivo sūryajaḥ preṣyo mato jyotirvidāṃ varaiḥ // NarP_1,55.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:10471: klibau budhārkī śukrendū sriyau śeṣā narāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10473: kavījyau kujasūryauṃ ca vedo jño varṇapāḥ kramāt /
GP12nardp1_u:10477: vasraṃ sthalaṃ navaṃ vahnikahataṃ madyadaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:10486: jīvo jīvajñau sitajñau vyarkā vyārāḥ kramādamī // NarP_1,55.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:10492: dikṣu saumyejyayoḥ sūryārayoḥ saure sitābjayoḥ // NarP_1,55.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:10496: krūrāḥ kṛṣṇe site saumyāḥ mataṃ kālabalaṃ budhaiḥ // NarP_1,55.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:10498: pāpāstu balinaḥ saumyā vivakṣāḥ kaṇṭakopage // NarP_1,55.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:10500: svāṃśe pāpāḥ parāṃśasthāḥ saumyālagnaṃ viyonijam // NarP_1,55.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:10503: pārśve kukṣī tvapānāṅghrī meḍhramuṣkau tathā sphijau /
GP12nardp1_u:10504: pucchaṃ catuṣpadāṅgeṣu meṣādyā rāśayaḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,55.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:10511: sthalāṃbu ca patiḥ kheṭo lagnādyāvanmite gṛhe /
GP12nardp1_u:10512: tāvanta eva takhaḥ sthalajā jalajāstathā // NarP_1,55.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:10513: antaḥsārā ravau saure durbhagāḥ kṣīriṇo vidhau /
GP12nardp1_u:10514: bhaume kaṇṭakino vṛkṣā ījye jñe saphalāphalau // NarP_1,55.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:10516: aśubharkṣe śubhaḥ kheṭaḥ śubhaṃ vṛkṣaṃ kubhūmijam // NarP_1,55.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:10520: pāpayuktekṣite dyūne ruṣā prītyā śubhagrahaiḥ // NarP_1,55.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:10524: vyayakhago yuktau caikadṛṣṭyā nṛtyupradau tayoḥ // NarP_1,55.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:10526: mātṛṣvasṛpitṛvyākhyau vā padmeji same śubhau // NarP_1,55.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:10527: pāpadṛṣṭe śubhe kṣīṇe tuṅge vā lagnageyame /
GP12nardp1_u:10530: yadā tadā garbhayutā nārī mṛtyumavāpnuyāt // NarP_1,55.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:10538: gurvakārai viṣamasthau vā yuñjanma pravadettadā // NarP_1,55.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:10543: mitho ravīndūrjñārkī vā paśyataḥ samagaṃ raviḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10544: vakro vāṅgavidhū oje jajñau yugmaujasaṃsthitau // NarP_1,55.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:10546: same sitendū ojasthā jñārāṅgojyā nṛvīkṣitau // NarP_1,55.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:10565: vyayejo vāmanayanaṃ dakṣaṃ sūryo vināśayet // NarP_1,55.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:10566: neṣṭā yogāḥ śubhairdṛṣṭāḥ pāpāḥ syurnātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10573: mandeṅgasthe kujeste ca jñosphuji madhyage vidhau // NarP_1,55.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:10575: sūryastaddṛṣṭigo vāpi jñeyo jyotirvidāṃ varaiḥ // NarP_1,55.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:10577: kośādatau tu yamalau jāyete munisattama // NarP_1,55.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:10579: lagnaminduṃ ca sārkenduṃ na paśyati yadā guruḥ // NarP_1,55.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:10583: pūrṇa iṇḍhau svabheśejñe śubhe muvyaṃvuje tanau // NarP_1,55.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:10584: dyūnasthe vā vidhau yāteṅganā nārī prasūyate /
GP12nardp1_u:10585: abdhāṅgamanbhagaḥ pūrṇe jyo vā paśyati nārada // NarP_1,55.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:10594: bhāsamāne sare mārge sthire svarkṣāṃśage gṛhe /
GP12nardp1_u:10596: gurudṛṣṭe tu dīrghāyuḥ paraṃ ca prāpyate punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10601: tarugehe śubhe nīce naikasthadṛṣṭau lagnenduḥ // NarP_1,55.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:10603: mandarkṣāṃśe vidhau turye mandadṛṣṭe 'bjage 'pi vā // NarP_1,55.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:10605: śīrṣe pṛṣṭodaye janma tadvadeva vinirdiśet // NarP_1,55.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:10607: jīrṇoddhṛtaṃ gṛhaṃ mande sṛji dagdhaṃ na vā vidhau // NarP_1,55.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:10609: citrayuktaṃ navaṃ śukre dṛḍhe ramye gurau gṛham // NarP_1,55.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:10611: vṛṣe paścānmṛge siṃhe dakṣiṇe vasatirbhavet // NarP_1,55.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:10620: śiṃśnāpāte ca vṛṣaṇau jaghane jānunī tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:10623: svarkṣāṃśe sthirayukte tu naija āgantuko 'nyathā // NarP_1,55.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:10629: caturasraḥ piṅgadṛk ca paittiko 'lpakaco raviḥ // NarP_1,55.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:10630: vṛto vātakaphī prājño mandavāk śubhadṛk śaśī /
GP12nardp1_u:10641: na ceddṛṣṭastadā mṛtyurjātasya bhavati dhruvam // NarP_1,55.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:10642: kṣīṇe 'bje vyayage pāpairlagnāṣṭasthaiḥ śubhā na cet /
GP12nardp1_u:10653: lagne ravau tu śasreṇa savīryāsadbhiraṣṭagaiḥ // NarP_1,55.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:10654: karkendvījyayute lagne kendre saumye ca bhārgave /
GP12nardp1_u:10659: svaccobje svarkṣagaiḥ saumyaiḥ savīryeṅgādhipe tanau // NarP_1,55.112 //
GP12nardp1_u:10671: kavījyayoge saumyābjau lagne mṛtyau ca sveṣavaḥ // NarP_1,55.118 //
GP12nardp1_u:10673: sūryādhika bale paiṇḍaṃ nisargāñca vidhorbale // NarP_1,55.119 //
GP12nardp1_u:10675: gobjāstattvatithī sūryāstithiḥ svargā nakhāḥ kramāt // NarP_1,55.120 //
GP12nardp1_u:10677: piṇḍe nisarge ravocce no grahaḥ ṣaṭbhālpako yadā /
GP12nardp1_u:10679: aṃśonāḥ śantrubhe kāryā grahaṃ vakragatiṃ vinā /
GP12nardp1_u:10688: śeṣe ṣaṣṭyā hate bhakte hāreṇa ghaṭikādikam // NarP_1,55.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:10690: bhajedvarṣāṇi śeṣe tu guṇite dvādaśādibhiḥ // NarP_1,55.128 //
GP12nardp1_u:10696: yadaikālyaṃ tadāstāṃśāḥ svāgryāptonā ca bhūrguṇaḥ // NarP_1,55.131 //
GP12nardp1_u:10700: śeṣaṃ dviśatabhaktaṃ syurmāsāḥ śeṣā dinādikam // NarP_1,55.133 //
GP12nardp1_u:10706: lagnārkacandramadhye tu yo balī taddaśā purā // NarP_1,55.136 //
GP12nardp1_u:10707: tataḥ kendrādigānāṃ tu dvitryādau sabalasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:10714: turyāṣṭagasya tu svargā guṇakāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,55.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:10722: jīvikādiphalaṃ sarvaṃ daśāyāṃ tasya yojayet // NarP_1,55.144 //
GP12nardp1_u:10726: yasyāṣṭavargajaṃ cāpi phalaṃ pūrṇaśubhaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,55.146 //
GP12nardp1_u:10730: neṣṭamutkaṭamiṣṭaṃ tu svalpaṃ jñātvā balaṃ vadet // NarP_1,55.148 //
GP12nardp1_u:10732: sthire neṣṭaṣṭamadhyā ca horāyāstryaṃ śakaiḥ phalam // NarP_1,55.149 //
GP12nardp1_u:10735: prāgdhvāṅkṣā bandhu mṛtyāya tayordyūne raviḥ svabhāt /
GP12nardp1_u:10742: kendrāṣṭāyāntya ijyādvā jñajyāyāstatra sve kaveḥ // NarP_1,55.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:10752: sātryaṅke san raveḥ śukrāddhīkhago digbhavārigaḥ // NarP_1,55.159 //
GP12nardp1_u:10778: sitāsṛjo gurau karke sārāje lagnage nṛpāḥ // NarP_1,55.172 //
GP12nardp1_u:10786: dhīsthau gurvidukavayo bhūmau ratryage budhairnṛpaḥ // NarP_1,55.176 //
GP12nardp1_u:10788: kavikṣau tulayuramasthau vai bhūpaḥ kīrtimānbhavent // NarP_1,55.177 //
GP12nardp1_u:10792: siṃher'ke meṣalagne 'je mṛge bhaume ghaṭe 'ṣṭame // NarP_1,55.179 //
GP12nardp1_u:10794: pātālage dharmage 'bje śubhadṛṣṭe yute mune // NarP_1,55.180 //
GP12nardp1_u:10801: sukhe guruḥ kheravīndūyamo lagne bhave karai /
GP12nardp1_u:10820: bhālā kendrasthitaiḥ saumyaiḥ pāpaiḥsarpa udāhṛtaḥ // NarP_1,55.193 //
GP12nardp1_u:10824: dātā samṛddho dāmāsthaḥ pāśajo dhanaśīlayuk // NarP_1,55.195 //
GP12nardp1_u:10830: taujaḥ sakīrtiḥ sukhabhāk mānavo bhavati dhruvam // NarP_1,55.198 //
GP12nardp1_u:10831: tyāgī yajvātmavān yūthe hiṃsro guhyādhipaḥ śaraiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10832: śaktau nīco 'laso niḥsvo daṇḍe priyaviyogabhāk // NarP_1,55.199 //
GP12nardp1_u:10834: durudharā caiva vidhau jñeyaḥ kemudrumo 'nyathā // NarP_1,55.200 //
GP12nardp1_u:10842: samando dhātukuśalaṃ tathā bhāḍaṃvidaṃ mune // NarP_1,55.204 //
GP12nardp1_u:10848: saśukre dyūtakrarheyo nṛtī dyūti samandake // NarP_1,55.207 //
GP12nardp1_u:10850: sabhārgavesamande lubdhakaḥ krūro naro bhavati nārada // NarP_1,55.208 //
GP12nardp1_u:10852: kavau sa mandamandākṣā va vaniśrayavittavān // NarP_1,55.209 //
GP12nardp1_u:10859: mando vā janmapaṃ naṣṭaṃ tathā ca mandakāgaṇe /
GP12nardp1_u:10860: bhaumārkāṃśe sauradṛṣṭe candre vā dīkṣito bhavet // NarP_1,55.213 //
GP12nardp1_u:10863: brāhmo dhanīmṛge bhogī raudre hiṃstraḥ śaṭho 'ghakṛt /
GP12nardp1_u:10864: dānto rogī śubho 'dityāṃ puṣyaryajanmā kaviḥ sukhī // NarP_1,55.215 //
GP12nardp1_u:10865: dhūrtaḥ śaṭhaḥ kṛtaghno 'hau pāpaḥ sarvāśano bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:10866: patre bhogī dhanī bhakto dātā priyavacā bhage // NarP_1,55.216 //
GP12nardp1_u:10867: dhanī bhogīnaroryamarkṣe steno dhṛṣṭo ghṛṇī kare /
GP12nardp1_u:10868: citrāṃbaraḥ sudṛktvāṣṭre na ca dharmadayāparaḥ // NarP_1,55.217 //
GP12nardp1_u:10869: dvīśe lubdhaḥ paṭuḥ krodhī maḍhaiyo āṭhanovideśagaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10870: śākre dharmaparastuṣṭo mūle mānī dhanī sukhī // NarP_1,55.218 //
GP12nardp1_u:10871: āpye mānī dṛṣṭo vaiśve namraśca dhārmikaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10872: karṇe dhanī sukhī khyāto dātā śūro dhanī vasau // NarP_1,55.219 //
GP12nardp1_u:10874: budhne vaktā sukhī kāntaḥ pauṣṇe śūro dhanī śuciḥ // NarP_1,55.220 //
GP12nardp1_u:10875: kāmī śūraḥ kṛtajño 'je kāntastyāgī kṣamī vṛṣe /
GP12nardp1_u:10876: yugme srīdyūtaśāsrajñaḥ sraiṇo hrasvaḥ svabhe vidhau // NarP_1,55.221 //
GP12nardp1_u:10877: srīdviṭ krodhī harau mānī vikrāntaḥ sthiradhīḥ sukhī /
GP12nardp1_u:10878: dharmī ślakṣṇaḥ sudhīḥ ṣaṣṭe prājñaḥ prāṃśurdhanī ghaṭe // NarP_1,55.222 //
GP12nardp1_u:10879: rogī pūjyaḥ kṣatī kārairpye kaviḥ śilpījyabhe dhanī /
GP12nardp1_u:10883: khyātaḥ srīdviṭ dhanī tīkṣṇojñaḥ kaviḥ śaiṇḍiko dhanī /
GP12nardp1_u:10884: pūjyo lubdho 'dhanasakho meṣādau bhāskare janau // NarP_1,55.224 //
GP12nardp1_u:10885: niḥsvor'kabhe bhūmiputre bhūmiputre dhanī cāndre svabhedanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10886: baudhe kṛtajño jaive tu khyātaḥ śaukre 'nyadārikaḥ // NarP_1,55.225 //
GP12nardp1_u:10893: sārthaḥ prājñaḥ samaḥ khyātiḥ srīji'torkādibhe mṛgau /
GP12nardp1_u:10912: kaviḥ sukhī budhāṃśe tu naṭacaurajñaśilpinaḥ // NarP_1,55.238 //
GP12nardp1_u:10914: krodhī nidhīśo mātyo vā nṛpo hiṃsro suto hareḥ // NarP_1,55.239 //
GP12nardp1_u:10915: jīvāṃśe hāsyavidyodhā balī mantrī ca dhārmikaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10918: vargottame khe parabhe pala muktaṃ śubhaṃ kramāt // NarP_1,55.241 //
GP12nardp1_u:10919: puṣṭaṃ madhyaṃ laghu jñeyaṃ yadi cāṃśapatirbalī /
GP12nardp1_u:10922: meṣe dhanī taimirakaḥ siṃhe rātryandha eva ca // NarP_1,55.243 //
GP12nardp1_u:10925: trige budho vikramī ca vimukhaḥ pīḍito bhuvi /
GP12nardp1_u:10929: lābhe bahudhano mānī patito kho 'vyaye ravau /.
GP12nardp1_u:10930: mūkodho badhiraḥ preṣyo jege khāñcājage dhanī // NarP_1,55.247 //
GP12nardp1_u:10936: kṣudrāeṃ'gahīno vyayage candre proktaṃ phalaṃ budhaiḥ // NarP_1,55.250 //
GP12nardp1_u:10939: vidvān dhanī ca pravaraḥ paṇḍitaḥ sacivoriyuk /
GP12nardp1_u:10946: alaso lagnage mande dharmātsvoñcagate nṛpaḥ // NarP_1,55.255 //
GP12nardp1_u:10954: nṛpaśca mitrabhāstheṣu kheṭe vrekādiṣu kramāt // NarP_1,55.259 //
GP12nardp1_u:10956: khyāto mahodyamī cātitejā dhīmāndhanī balī // NarP_1,55.260 //
GP12nardp1_u:10969: tejasvī ca naraḥ khāye triṃśāṃse sṛjisaṃsthite /
GP12nardp1_u:10970: āmayī vā svabhāryāyāṃ viṣamaḥ pāradārikaḥ // NarP_1,55.267 //
GP12nardp1_u:10979: sukhejño cāru ceṣṭāṅgau candrārkkaucetkujādigau mūlatrikoṇasvarkṣocce kaṇṭhasthāstu ca ye grahāḥ // NarP_1,55.272 //
GP12nardp1_u:10981: śubhaṃ vargottame janma vesisthāne vasadgṛhaiḥ // NarP_1,55.273 //
GP12nardp1_u:10985: praveśe bhāskarakujau bhṛgvījyo madhyagau tathā // NarP_1,55.275 //
GP12nardp1_u:10986: candrārkī phala dāvantye sadā jñaḥ phaladāyakaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10989: ravau bhīner'kajaḥ srīghnaḥ putrasthastu tathā kujaḥ // NarP_1,55.277 //
GP12nardp1_u:10997: pāpe dhīsthe vidhau kṣīṇajanmā sutakalatriṇaḥ // NarP_1,55.281 //
GP12nardp1_u:10999: tau cetseṃdusriyā sārddhaṃ puṃścalo jāyate naraḥ // NarP_1,55.282 //
GP12nardp1_u:11001: nṛsriyo stu śubhairdṛṣṭau tau dvau pariṇatāṅgakau // NarP_1,55.283 //
GP12nardp1_u:11007: karkālyaṃ śagate kendre pāpayukte tu guhyaruk // NarP_1,55.286 //
GP12nardp1_u:11009: candre khe 'stāṅgate bhaume vikalo veśiger'kaje // NarP_1,55.287 //
GP12nardp1_u:11013: saumyā dṛṣṭā na vāyatridhīgatāḥ pāpakhecarāḥ // NarP_1,55.289 //
GP12nardp1_u:11015: lagne gurau dyune mande vātarogādito bhavet // NarP_1,55.290 //
GP12nardp1_u:11016: sukhe 'ste vā kuje jīve lagne vārkiyutodaye /
GP12nardp1_u:11017: kujena vātmaje dyūne saṃjñeṃ'tye 'bje ca sonmadaḥ // NarP_1,55.291 //
GP12nardp1_u:11023: puñjanau tu phalaṃ puṇyasrīṇāṃ yogyaṃ vadecca tat // NarP_1,55.294 //
GP12nardp1_u:11031: bālyaduṣṭā tathā dāsī sādhvī māyāvatī tvarā // NarP_1,55.298 //
GP12nardp1_u:11034: duṣṇavāk punarbhūḥ saguṇā vijñā khyātā sphujidgrṛhe /
GP12nardp1_u:11035: baudhe samā yā klīvā ca satī guṇavatī calā // NarP_1,55.300 //
GP12nardp1_u:11037: vācāṭā kulaṭā siṃhe rāgī pundhīragamyatā // NarP_1,55.301 //
GP12nardp1_u:11039: dāsī nīcaratā sādhvī mānde duṣṭā napatyakā // NarP_1,55.302 //
GP12nardp1_u:11041: dṛggaiḥ mithoṃśe śukrārkī śaukre cedvā ghaṭāṃśake // NarP_1,55.303 //
GP12nardp1_u:11043: śūnye kāpuruṣo dyūne bale klīvo na sadṛśi // NarP_1,55.304 //
GP12nardp1_u:11045: tatsṛṣṭā madage sūrye strībālavidhavā kuje // NarP_1,55.305 //
GP12nardp1_u:11049: mithoṃśagaiḥ sitārau tu kuruto 'nyaratāṃ striyam // NarP_1,55.307 //
GP12nardp1_u:11051: saurārarkṣe lagnagate seṃduśukre tu vandhakī // NarP_1,55.308 //
GP12nardp1_u:11054: mandarkṣe vāṃśake dyūne vṛddhau mūrkhaḥ patiḥ striyāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11055: strīlolaḥ krodhanaḥ kauje baudhe vidvāṃśca naipuṇaḥ // NarP_1,55.310 //
GP12nardp1_u:11059: jñedvoḥ kalāsu nipuṇā sukhitā ca guṇānvitā // NarP_1,55.312 //
GP12nardp1_u:11063: vaidhavyaṃ ca mṛtistasyā svayaṃsatsvarthageṣu tu // NarP_1,55.314 //
GP12nardp1_u:11081: mṛtyuścātha mṛge candre karke mande jalodarāt // NarP_1,55.323 //
GP12nardp1_u:11085: striyāṃ sapāpe 'bje dyūne site meṣe ravau tanau // NarP_1,55.325 //
GP12nardp1_u:11086: maraṇaṃ strīkṛte gehe hyatha turye kuje ravau /
GP12nardp1_u:11115: svoccasthoṃ'ge vyaye saumyabhāge mokṣo balānyataḥ // NarP_1,55.340 //
GP12nardp1_u:11116: ādhāne janmā jñāne tu vṛkṣatāṃ lagnato vadet /
GP12nardp1_u:11143: cipiṭāsyo hi saṃvīto nausthaḥ ratryarthaṃvrajañjale // NarP_1,55.354 //
GP12nardp1_u:11144: śvā naro jaṃbukaṃ gṛdhraṃ gṛhītvā rauti śālmalau /
GP12nardp1_u:11161: bhāṇḍī romaścavāḥ śyāmaḥ kirīṭī phalayantradhṛk // NarP_1,55.363 //
GP12nardp1_u:11168: iti śrīnāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bṛhadupākhyāne jātakanirūpaṇannāma pañcapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:11172: caitraśuklapratipadi yo vāraḥ sa nṛpaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,56.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:11176: adhamo ravijo vācyo jñātvā caiṣāṃ balābalam // NarP_1,56.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:11186: śubhor'kaḥ śiśire tāmraḥ kuṅkumābhā vasaṃtike // NarP_1,56.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:11192: śaśaraktanibhe bhānau saṃgrāmo na cirādbhuvi // NarP_1,56.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:11195: arke śyāme kīṭabhayaṃ bhasmābhe rāṣṭrajaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:11218: yāmyaśṛṅgonnato neṣṭaḥ śubhaḥ śukle pipīlikā // NarP_1,56.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:11222: kujādyairnihate śṛṅge maṇḍale vā yathākramam // NarP_1,56.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:11228: kuje trayodaśe ṛkṣe vakrite vā caturdaśe // NarP_1,56.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:11242: triṣūttarāsu rohiṇyāṃ nairṛte śravaṇe mṛge // NarP_1,56.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:11275: dvibhāṭajodimāstasya pañcamaikādaśāstrimādhavaḥ śubhado jyeṣṭo nṛṇāṃ madhyaphalapradaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11276: śucirmadhyo nabhaḥ śreṣṭho bhādraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kvacinnaraḥ // NarP_1,56.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:11278: śubhapradau pauṣamādhau madhyamau phaālguno madhuḥ // NarP_1,56.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:11280: śucirmadhyo nabhaḥ śreṣṭho bhādraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kvacinnara // NarP_1,56.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:11292: hṛdayeśasya nidhanaṃ śubhaṃ syātsaṃyutaiḥ śubhaiḥ // NarP_1,56.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:11294: iti dvijātimadhyāṃ tu gonṛpastrīsukhaṃ mahat // NarP_1,56.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:11303: saumya mārge ca tisṛṣu caranvīthiṣu bhārgavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11306: pūrvasyāṃ diśi meghastu śubhadaḥ pitṛpañcake // NarP_1,56.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:11310: undayāstamanaṃ yāti tadā jalamayī mahī // NarP_1,56.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:11319: mukhe caikaṃ gude dve ca trīṇi ke nayane dvayam /
GP12nardp1_u:11320: hṛdaye pañca ṛkṣāṇi vāmahaste catuṣṭayam // NarP_1,56.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:11321: vāmapāde tathā trīṇi dakṣiṇe trīṇe bhāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:11323: rogo lābhastathā hānirlābhaḥ saukhyaṃ ca bandhanam /
GP12nardp1_u:11324: āyāsaḥ śreṣṭhayātrā ca dhanalābhaḥ kramātphalam // NarP_1,56.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:11328: amṛtyutāṃ gatastatra kheṭastatra kheṭatve parikalpitaḥ // NarP_1,56.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:11332: parveśāstu tathā satyadevā khyāditaḥ kramāt // NarP_1,56.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:11335: tadvadeva phalaṃ saumye śleṣmapīḍā ca parvaṇi /
GP12nardp1_u:11350: no śaktā lakṣituṃ devāḥ kiṃ punaḥ prākṛtā janāḥ // NarP_1,56.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:11352: śubhāśubhānyaiḥ kālasya grāhayāmo hi lakṣaṇam // NarP_1,56.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:11358: nakṣatrasaṃsthitā divyā bhaumā ye bhūmisaṃsthitāḥ // NarP_1,56.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:11377: vikacākhyā gurusutā veṣṭā yāmye sthitā api /
GP12nardp1_u:11382: śukrajā ṛkṣasadṛśāḥ ke tavaḥ śubhadāyakāḥ // NarP_1,56.106 //
GP12nardp1_u:11388: cāndramārkṣaṃ gurormānamiti mānāni vai navaḥ // NarP_1,56.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:11400: aṅgirāḥ śrīmukho bhāvo yuvā dhātā tathaiva ca // NarP_1,56.115 //
GP12nardp1_u:11408: paribhāvī pramādī ca ānando rākṣaso 'nalaḥ // NarP_1,56.119 //
GP12nardp1_u:11418: tatkālaṃ grahacāraṃ ca samyak jñātvā phalaṃ padet // NarP_1,56.124 //
GP12nardp1_u:11420: ahaḥ surāṇāṃ tadrātriḥ karkādyaṃ dakṣiṇāyanam // NarP_1,56.125 //
GP12nardp1_u:11422: madhādau maṅgalaṃ karma vidheyaṃ cottarāyaṇe // NarP_1,56.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:11424: mādhādi māsau dvau dvau ca ṛtavaḥ śiśirādayaḥ // NarP_1,56.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:11426: varṣā śaraśca hemantaḥ karkādvai dakṣiṇāyane // NarP_1,56.128 //
GP12nardp1_u:11427: cāndro darśīvadhiḥ sauraḥ saṃkrātyā sāvano dineḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11430: nabhasya iṣa ūrjaśca sahāścaiva sahasyakaḥ // NarP_1,56.130 //
GP12nardp1_u:11432: yasminmāse paurṇamāsī yena dhiṣṇena saṃyutā // NarP_1,56.131 //
GP12nardp1_u:11434: tatpakṣau daiva pitrākhyau śuklakṛṣṇau tathāpare // NarP_1,56.132 //
GP12nardp1_u:11435: śubhāśubhe karmaṇi ca praśastau bhavataḥ sadā /
GP12nardp1_u:11444: aṣṭamī dvādaśī ṣaṣṭī caturthī ca caturdaśī // NarP_1,56.137 //
GP12nardp1_u:11447: tyājyāḥ syustāsu tithiṣu kramātpañca ca sarvadā /
GP12nardp1_u:11448: amāvāsyā ca navamī hitvā viṣamasaṃjñikā // NarP_1,56.139 //
GP12nardp1_u:11450: ṣaṣaaṭyāṃ tailaṃ tathāṣṭamyāṃ māsaṃ kṣauraṃ kalestithau // NarP_1,56.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:11452: derśe ṣaṣṭyāṃ pratipadi dvādaśyāṃ pratiparvasu // NarP_1,56.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:11454: vyatīpāte ca saṃkrāntāvekādaśyāṃ ca parvasu // NarP_1,56.142 //
GP12nardp1_u:11456: yaḥ karoti daśamyāṃ ca snānamāmalakairnaraḥ // NarP_1,56.143 //
GP12nardp1_u:11459: amāyāṃ ca navamyāṃ ca saptamyāṃ ca kulakṣayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11460: yā paurṇimā divā candramatī sānumatī smṛtā // NarP_1,56.145 //
GP12nardp1_u:11468: caitre bhādrapade caiva tṛtīyā śuklasaṃjñitā // NarP_1,56.149 //
GP12nardp1_u:11470: māghe ca saptamī śuklā nabhasye tvasitāṣṭamī // NarP_1,56.150 //
GP12nardp1_u:11472: āṣāḍhe kārtike māsi jyaṣṭe caitre ca paurṇimā // NarP_1,56.151 //
GP12nardp1_u:11474: bhādre kṛṣṇatrayodaśyāṃ maghāminduḥ kare raviḥ // NarP_1,56.152 //
GP12nardp1_u:11477: tithirvāratraye tvekā hyadhikā dve ca nindite /
GP12nardp1_u:11478: sūryāstamanaparyantaṃ yasminvāre tu yā tithiḥ // NarP_1,56.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:11482: raviḥ sthiraścaraścandraḥ krūro vakrokhilo budhaḥ // NarP_1,56.156 //
GP12nardp1_u:11484: abhyakto bhānuvāre yaḥ sa naraḥ kleśavānbhavet // NarP_1,56.157 //
GP12nardp1_u:11486: jīve naivaṃ site hānirmande sarvasamṛddhayaḥ // NarP_1,56.158 //
GP12nardp1_u:11490: tatkarma balahīnasya duḥkhenāpi na siddhyāti // NarP_1,56.160 //
GP12nardp1_u:11494: dūrvāvarṇo vudho jīvaḥ pītaśvetastu bhārgavaḥ // NarP_1,56.162 //
GP12nardp1_u:11512: adhomukhaṃ tu navakaṃ bhānau tatra vidhīyate // NarP_1,56.171 //
GP12nardp1_u:11516: tiryaṅmukhākhyaṃ navakaṃ bhānau tatra vidhīyate // NarP_1,56.173 //
GP12nardp1_u:11520: ūrddhāsyaṃ navakaṃ bhānāṃ proktamatra vidhīyate // NarP_1,56.175 //
GP12nardp1_u:11524: sādhāraṇaṃ dvidaivatyaṃ vahnibhaṃ ca prakīrtitam // NarP_1,56.177//
GP12nardp1_u:11534: darśāṣṭabhyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ paśūnāṃ na kadācana // NarP_1,56.182 //
GP12nardp1_u:11538: agre vṛddhyai trayaṃ lakṣmye saumyapārśve ca pañcakam // NarP_1,56.184 //
GP12nardp1_u:11540: śriyai puṣṭyai trayaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ syāccakre lāṅgalāhvaye // NarP_1,56.185 //
GP12nardp1_u:11544: gale trayaṃ kajjalāya vṛddhyai ca dvādaśodare // NarP_1,56.187 //
GP12nardp1_u:11546: nābhau vahniḥ pañcakaṃ yadvījoptāviti cintayet // NarP_1,56.188 //
GP12nardp1_u:11570: krūraviddho yuto vāpipuṣyo yadi balānvitaḥ // NarP_1,56.200 //
GP12nardp1_u:11576: yā dṛśyante dīptatārāḥ svagaṇe yogatārakāḥ // NarP_1,56.203 //
GP12nardp1_u:11599: vyāgaghāte nava śūle tu pañca nāḍyo hi garhitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11603: tatra ravārjūrike cakre kathitaṃ mūrdhni bhaṃ nyaset /
GP12nardp1_u:11611: parītā viparītā vā viṣyirneṣṭā tu maṅgale /
GP12nardp1_u:11612: mukhe pañcagale caikā vakṣasyekādaśa smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,56.221 //
GP12nardp1_u:11613: nābhau catasraḥ ṣaṭ kaṭyāṃ tisraḥ pucchākhyanājikāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11615: kaṭyāmunmattatā nābhau cyutiḥ pucche dhruvaṃ jayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11619: aryamā bhagasaṃjñaśca vijñeyā daśa pañca ca /
GP12nardp1_u:11627: yeṣu ṛkṣeṣu yatkarma kathitaṃ nikhilaṃ ca tat /
GP12nardp1_u:11628: taddaivatye muhūrte 'pi kāryaṃ yātrādikaṃ sadā // NarP_1,56.229 //
GP12nardp1_u:11630: śūlo 'ṣṭame ca daśame śāniraṣṭādaśe tataḥ // NarP_1,56.230 //
GP12nardp1_u:11638: dhiṣṇye tāvati satyatra duṣṭayogaḥ patatyasau // NarP_1,56.234 //
GP12nardp1_u:11653: hastarkṣaṃ ca khārvidau candrabhaṃ dasrabhaṃ kuje /
GP12nardp1_u:11654: saumye mitrabhamācāryaṃ tiṣyaḥ pauṣṇaṃ bhṛgoḥ sute // NarP_1,56.242/
GP12nardp1_u:11657: jayāsaumye gurau riktā śanaupūrṇeti no śubhāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11658: nandā tithiḥ śukravāre saumye bhadrā kuje jayā // NarP_1,56.244 //
GP12nardp1_u:11659: riktā mande gurorvāre pūrṇā siddhāhvayā amī /
GP12nardp1_u:11661: ṣaṣṭī gurau tṛtīyā jñe 'ṣṭamī śukre śanaiścare /
GP12nardp1_u:11662: navamī pañcamī bhaume dagdhayogāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,56.246 //
GP12nardp1_u:11664: budhe śraviṣṭāryamabhe gurau jyeṣṭā bhṛgordine // NarP_1,56.247 //
GP12nardp1_u:11673: anuktānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ ghorādyāḥ sukhadāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11682: bhuśuḍī ca gadākhaḍgau daṇḍa iṣaavāsatomarau // NarP_1,56.256 //
GP12nardp1_u:11684: annaṃ ca pāyasaṃ bhaikṣyaṃ sayūṣaṃ ca payo dadhi // NarP_1,56.257 //
GP12nardp1_u:11688: catuḥ pāde tilenāge suptaḥ krāntiṃ karoti hi // NarP_1,56.259 //
GP12nardp1_u:11689: dharmāyurvṛṣṭiṣu samaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ naṣṭaṃ phalaṃ kramāt /
GP12nardp1_u:11690: āyudhaṃ vāhanāhārau yajjātīyaṃ janasya ca // NarP_1,56.260 //
GP12nardp1_u:11692: andhakaṃ mandasaṃjñaṃ ca madhyasaṃjñaṃ sulocanam // NarP_1,56.261 //
GP12nardp1_u:11698: medhyā viṣuvati proktāḥ puṇyanāḍyastu ṣoḍaśa // NarP_1,56.264 //
GP12nardp1_u:11702: naraḥ prāpnoti tadrāśau śītāṃśoḥ sādhvasādhu ca // NarP_1,56.266 //
GP12nardp1_u:11706: vratodvāhādikeṣveva dvayaṃ neṣṭaṃ tu tatkramāt // NarP_1,56.268 //
GP12nardp1_u:11715: tryāyāriṣu kujaḥ śreṣṭho janmanā cenna vidhyate /
GP12nardp1_u:11727: niṣphalau tau grahau svena śatruṇā ca vilokitau /
GP12nardp1_u:11728: nīcarāśigataḥ svasya śatroḥ kṣetragato 'pi vā // NarP_1,56.279 //
GP12nardp1_u:11732: maṇirmuktāphalaṃ vidrumākhyaṃ maraka taṃ tathā // NarP_1,56.281 //
GP12nardp1_u:11734: dūryyaṃ bhāskarādīnāṃ tuṣṭya dhāryaṃ yathākramam // NarP_1,56.282 //
GP12nardp1_u:11739: janma saṃpadvipat kṣema pratyariḥ sādhako vadhaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11740: mitraṃ paramamitraṃ ca janmabhāttu punaḥ puna // NarP_1,56.285 //
GP12nardp1_u:11742: śākaṃ guḍaṃ ca lavaṇaṃ satilaṃ kāñcanaṃ kramāt // NarP_1,56.286 //
GP12nardp1_u:11744: kṛṣṇe balavatī tārā śuklapakṣe balū śaśī /
GP12nardp1_u:11762: kanyā lagne vidheyaṃ ca pauṣṭikākhilamaṅgalam // NarP_1,56.295 //
GP12nardp1_u:11764: tulāyāmakhilaṃ karma tulābhārāśrite ca yat // NarP_1,56.296 //
GP12nardp1_u:11782: ante tucchaphale lagne sarvasminnevameva hi // NarP_1,56.305 //
GP12nardp1_u:11784: kalpyāmadindau balini saptame balino grahāḥ // NarP_1,56.306 //
GP12nardp1_u:11790: lagnodbhavaṃ phalaṃ dhatte dhanātīto dvitīyakam // NarP_1,56.309 //
GP12nardp1_u:11794: doṣādduṣṭo hi kālastamapi mārṣṭuṃ pitāmahaḥ // NarP_1,56.311 //
GP12nardp1_u:11799: rugṇā patipriyā duḥkhī putriṇī bhogamī tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:11802: tārakā na hitā māsā madhūrjaśucipauṣakāḥ // NarP_1,56.315 //
GP12nardp1_u:11807: ādyā niśaścatasrastu tyājyā hyapi samāḥ paraiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11811: prasiddhe prathame garbhe tṛtīye vā dvitīyake /
GP12nardp1_u:11812: māse puṃsavanaṃ kāryaṃ sīmantaṃ ca yathā tathā // NarP_1,56.320 //
GP12nardp1_u:11813: caturthe māsi ṣaṣṭe vāpyaṣṭame vā tadīśvare /
GP12nardp1_u:11822: sīmantinīṃ vā tadgarbhaṃ balī hṝnti na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,56.325 //
GP12nardp1_u:11830: candrātārābalopete divase ca śiśoḥ pituḥ // NarP_1,56.329 //
GP12nardp1_u:11832: ṣaṣṭe māsyaṣṭame vāpi puṃsāṃ strīṇāṃ tu pañcame // NarP_1,56.330 //
GP12nardp1_u:11833: saptame māsi vā kāryaṃ navānnapraśanaṃ śubham /
GP12nardp1_u:11838: pūrvārddhe saumyakheṭena saṃyukte vīkṣitepi vā // NarP_1,56.333 //
GP12nardp1_u:11852: abhyakte sandhyayornāre niśi bhuktvā na vāhave // NarP_1,56.340 //
GP12nardp1_u:11853: notkaṭe bhūṣite naiva yāne na navame 'hni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:11859: navame saptame vāpi pañcame divase 'pi vā /
GP12nardp1_u:11862: āśiṣo vācanaṃ kāryaṃ puṇyaṃ puṇyāṅganādibhiḥ // NarP_1,56.345 //
GP12nardp1_u:11868: rājñā mekādaśe maiñjībandhanaṃ dvādaśe viśām // NarP_1,56.348 //
GP12nardp1_u:11880: upanīto balāḍhyaśca jyeṣṭhe vidhividāṃ varaḥ // NarP_1,56.354 //
GP12nardp1_u:11881: śuklapakṣe dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā pañcamī tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:11882: trayodaśī ca daśamī saptamī vratabandhane // NarP_1,56.355 //
GP12nardp1_u:11891: vārau tu madhyamau caiva vrate 'nyau ninditau matau /
GP12nardp1_u:11892: tridhā vibhajya divasaṃ tatrādau karma daivikam // NarP_1,56.360 //
GP12nardp1_u:11893: dvitīye mānuṣaṃ kāryaṃ tṛtīye ḥṃśe ca paitṛkam /
GP12nardp1_u:11894: svanīcage tadaṃśe vā svāribhe vā tadaṃśake // NarP_1,56.361 //
GP12nardp1_u:11896: svādhiśatrugṛhasthe vā tadaṃśasthe 'tha vā vratī // NarP_1,56.362 //
GP12nardp1_u:11898: svoccasaṃsthe tadaṃśe vā svarāśau rāśige gaṇe // NarP_1,56.363 //
GP12nardp1_u:11899: śākheśe vā gurau śukre kendrage vā trikoṇage /
GP12nardp1_u:11901: paramoccagate jīve śākheśe vātha vā sate /
GP12nardp1_u:11904: gurau bhṛgau vā śākheśe vidyādhanasamanvitaḥ // NarP_1,56.366 //
GP12nardp1_u:11906: śaākhādhipatilagnaṃ ca durlabhaṃ tritayaṃ vrate // NarP_1,56.367 //
GP12nardp1_u:11912: lagne tu nidhane saumyaiḥ saṃyute vā nirīkṣite // NarP_1,56.370 //
GP12nardp1_u:11924: na karoti śiśuṃ niḥsvaṃ sarvataḥ kṣayarogiṇam // NarP_1,56.376 //
GP12nardp1_u:11930: caturthī vā śubhāḥ proktā aṣṭāvete galagrahāḥ // NarP_1,56.379 //
GP12nardp1_u:11943: ghūmrāye maraṇaṃ siṃhe jayaḥ śuni ca rogitā /
GP12nardp1_u:11944: dhanalābho vṛṣe 'tyantaṃ duḥkhī bhavati gardabhe // NarP_1,56.386 //
GP12nardp1_u:11951: sthito dhvaje vṛṣāye vā naṣṭācetpūrvato vraṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:11958: pratipatparvariktā mā cāṣṭamī ca dinatrayam // NarP_1,56.393 //
GP12nardp1_u:11961: sukhaṃ tatrāpi bhāminyāṃ śīlavatyāṃ sthitaṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11962: tasyāḥ sacchīlarlā dhastu sulagnavaśataḥ khalu // NarP_1,56.395 //
GP12nardp1_u:11972: mṛtaputrātha vā kanyā kulaṭā vā na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,56.400 //
GP12nardp1_u:11976: vīkṣitāḥ pṛcchatāṃ nṝṇāṃ kanyālābho bhavettadā // NarP_1,56.402 //
GP12nardp1_u:11982: pāpadṛṣṭo 'tha vā randhre na saṃbandho bhavettadā // NarP_1,56.405 //
GP12nardp1_u:11990: tadā kuryātpitā tasyāḥ pradānaṃ prītipūrvakam // NarP_1,56.409 //
GP12nardp1_u:11992: varāya ca rūpavatīṃ kanyāṃ dadyādyavīyasīm // NarP_1,56.410 //
GP12nardp1_u:11993: saṃpūjya prārthayitvā ca śacīṃ devīṃ guṇāśrayām /
GP12nardp1_u:11998: evaṃvidhāṃ kumārīṃ tāṃ pūjānte prārthayediti // NarP_1,56.413 //
GP12nardp1_u:12000: vivāhe bhāgyamārogyaṃ putralābhaṃ ca dehi me // NarP_1,56.414 //
GP12nardp1_u:12004: madhyamā kārtiko mārgaśīrṣo vai ninditāḥ pare // NarP_1,56.416 //
GP12nardp1_u:12006: vivāho devatānāṃ ca pratiṣṭāṃ copanāyanam // NarP_1,56.417 //
GP12nardp1_u:12008: na gurau siṃharāśisthe siṃhāṃśakagatepi vā // NarP_1,56.418 //
GP12nardp1_u:12010: buddhaḥ pañcadinaṃ pakṣaṃ guruḥ pakṣaṃ ca sarvataḥ // NarP_1,56.419 //
GP12nardp1_u:12013: na janmamāse janmarkṣe na janmadivase 'pi ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12018: nākhile tridinaṃ neṣṭaṃ tridyuspṛk ca kṣayaṃ tathā // NarP_1,56.423 //
GP12nardp1_u:12020: saṃdhyāyāṃ tridinaṃ tadvanniśīthe sapta eva ca // NarP_1,56.424 //
GP12nardp1_u:12022: vyatīpātaṃ vaidhṛtiṃ ca saṃpūrṇaṃ parighārddhakam // NarP_1,56.425 //
GP12nardp1_u:12026: cetpūjā yatnataḥ kāryā durbala grahayostayoḥ // NarP_1,56.427 //
GP12nardp1_u:12030: tithirekaguṇā vāro dviguṇastriguṇaṃ ca bham // NarP_1,56.429 //
GP12nardp1_u:12032: tato manahūrto balavāṃstato lagnaṃ balādhikam // NarP_1,56.430 //
GP12nardp1_u:12034: tato navāṃśo balavāndvādaśāṃśo balī tataḥ // NarP_1,56.431 //
GP12nardp1_u:12044: tṛtīyaḥ pāpaṣaḍvargo bhṛguḥ ṣaṣṭaḥ kujo 'ṣṭamaḥ // NarP_1,56.436 //
GP12nardp1_u:12057: evaṃ tau na yutau dṛṣṭau mutyurvadhvāḥ karagrahe /
GP12nardp1_u:12058: tyājyāḥ sūryasya saṃkrānteḥ pūrvataḥ paratastathā // NarP_1,56.443 //
GP12nardp1_u:12062: uccage śubhasaṃyukte tallagnaṃ sarvadā tyajet // NarP_1,56.445 //
GP12nardp1_u:12064: śubhatrayayutaṃ lagnaṃ na tyajettuṅgago yadi // NarP_1,56.446 //
GP12nardp1_u:12071: ugraṃ ca saṃdhitritayaṃ gaṇḍātaṃ trividhaṃ mahat /
GP12nardp1_u:12078: uccage nīcage vāpi mitrabhe śatrurāśige // NarP_1,56.453 //
GP12nardp1_u:12082: sūryeṇa saṃyute candre dāridyaṃ bhavati sphuṭam // NarP_1,56.455 //
GP12nardp1_u:12084: daurbhāgyaṃ guruṇā yukte sāpatyaṃ bhārgaveṇa tu // NarP_1,56.456 //
GP12nardp1_u:12086: ketunā saṃyute candre nityaṃ kaṣṭaṃ daridratā // NarP_1,56.457 //
GP12nardp1_u:12090: svoccago vā svarkṣago vā mitra kṣetragatopi vā // NarP_1,56.459 //
GP12nardp1_u:12094: sa rāśiḥ śubhasaṃyukto lagnaṃ vā śubhasaṃyutam // NarP_1,56.461 //
GP12nardp1_u:12096: daṃpatyordvādaśaṃ lagnaṃ rāśirvā yadi lagnagaḥ // NarP_1,56.462 //
GP12nardp1_u:12116: yāvacca śaśinā bhuktvā muktabhaṃ dagdhakāṣṭavat // NarP_1,56.472 //
GP12nardp1_u:12120: krūraviddhaṃ yutaṃ dhiṣṇyaṃ nikhilaṃ naiva maṅgalam // NarP_1,56.474 //
GP12nardp1_u:12122: ete navāṃśāḥ śubhadā vṛṣabhasyāṃśakāḥ khalu // NarP_1,56.475 //
GP12nardp1_u:12124: anye navāṃśā na grāhyā yataste kunavāṃśakāḥ // NarP_1,56.476 //
GP12nardp1_u:12135: bṛhaspatiḥ kendragataḥ śukro vā yadi vā budhaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12136: eko 'pi doṣanicayaṃ haratyeva na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,56.482 //
GP12nardp1_u:12137: tiryakpañcorddhūgāḥ pañca rekhā dve dve ca koṇayoḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12140: purataḥ pṛṣṭator'kādyā dinarkṣaṃ lattayanti yat // NarP_1,56.484 //
GP12nardp1_u:12144: saurāṣṭre sālvadeśe tu lattitaṃ bhaṃ vivarjayet // NarP_1,56.486 //
GP12nardp1_u:12146: bāhlike kurudeśe cānyasmindeśe na dūṣaṇam // NarP_1,56.487 //
GP12nardp1_u:12148: madhyadeśe vivarjyāni na dṛṣṭānītareṣu ca // NarP_1,56.488 //
GP12nardp1_u:12151: doṣaduṣṭaṃ sadā kālaṃ sannimārṣṭuṃ na śakyate /
GP12nardp1_u:12152: api dhāturato grāhyaṃ doṣālpatvaṃ guṇādhikam // NarP_1,56.490 //
GP12nardp1_u:12166: uttamaṃ madhyamaṃ bhinnaṃ rāśyaikatvaṃ yayostayoḥ // NarP_1,56.497 //
GP12nardp1_u:12169: dvitīye madhyamaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tṛtīye navake nṛbham /
GP12nardp1_u:12180: dvirdādaśe trikoṇe ca na kadācitṣaḍaṣṭake // NarP_1,56.504 //
GP12nardp1_u:12197: prācyā na ca kaliṅgānāṃ mukhyaṃ godhūlikaṃ smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:12206: na caikajanyayoḥ puṃsorekajanye tu kanyake // NarP_1,56.517 //
GP12nardp1_u:12208: divājātastu pitaraṃ rātrau tu jananīṃ tathā // NarP_1,56.518 //
GP12nardp1_u:12210: sutaḥ sutā vā niyataṃ śvasuraṃ hṝnti mūlajaḥ // NarP_1,56.519 //
GP12nardp1_u:12212: jyeṣṭāntyapādajau jyeṣṭaṃ bālo hṝnti na bālikā // NarP_1,56.520 //
GP12nardp1_u:12214: saindrī dhavāgrajaṃ hṝnti devaraṃ tu dvidaivajā // NarP_1,56.521 //
GP12nardp1_u:12218: saṃtyajya hyatiśukre 'pi yātrā vaivāhikī śubhā // NarP_1,56.523 //
GP12nardp1_u:12223: dineṣu yasya devasya yā titistatra tasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12230: śubhalagne śubhāṃśe ca kartturna nidhanodaye // NarP_1,56.529 //
GP12nardp1_u:12232: pañcāṣṭake śubhe lagne naidhane śuddhisaṃyute // NarP_1,56.530 //
GP12nardp1_u:12237: caturthe sukhadāḥ saumyāḥ krūrāḥ kheṭāśca duḥkhadāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12238: glānidāḥ pañcame krūrāḥ saumyāḥ putrasukhapradāḥ // NarP_1,56.533 //
GP12nardp1_u:12239: ṣaṣṭe śubhāḥ śatrudāḥ syuḥ pāpāḥ śabrukṣayaṅkarāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12240: vyādhidāḥ saptame pāpāḥ saumyāḥ śubhaphalapradāḥ // NarP_1,56.534 //
GP12nardp1_u:12242: dharme pāpā ghnanti saumyāḥ śubhadā maṅgalapradāḥ // NarP_1,56.535 //
GP12nardp1_u:12248: guṇādhikatare lagne doṣaḥ svalpataro yadi // NarP_1,56.538 //
GP12nardp1_u:12253: sitaṃ raktaṃ ca haritaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ yathākramam /
GP12nardp1_u:12254: madhuraṃ kaṭukaṃ tiktaṃ kaṣāyakarasaṃ kramāt // NarP_1,56.541 //
GP12nardp1_u:12258: atyantavṛddhiradhike hīne hāniḥ same samam // NarP_1,56.543 //
GP12nardp1_u:12260: prātardṛṣṭe jale vṛddhiḥ samaṃ paṅke kṣayaḥ kṣaye // NarP_1,56.544 //
GP12nardp1_u:12266: āyāmeṣu caturdikṣu prāgādiṣu ca satsvapi // NarP_1,56.547 //
GP12nardp1_u:12278: paścime dakṣiṇe vāpi kapāṭaṃ sthāpayedgṛhe // NarP_1,56.553 //
GP12nardp1_u:12290: akārādiṣu bhāgṣu dikṣu prāgādiṣu kramāt // NarP_1,56.559 //
GP12nardp1_u:12293: sādhyavargaḥ puraḥ sthāpya pṛṣṭataḥ sādhakaṃ nyaset /
GP12nardp1_u:12294: vyatyaye nāśanaṃ tasya ṛṇamadhyaṃ dhanācchubham // NarP_1,56.561 //
GP12nardp1_u:12296: vibhejetsaptabhiḥ śeṣaṃ sādhakasya dhanaṃ tadā // NarP_1,56.562 //
GP12nardp1_u:12300: viṣamāyaḥ śubhaghāyaiva samāyo nirdhanāya ca // NarP_1,56.564 //
GP12nardp1_u:12302: ātmakṣayaḥ saptamarkṣe bhavatyeva hi bhartṛbhāt // NarP_1,56.565 //
GP12nardp1_u:12312: sabalo mukhagehānāmeṣa doṣo na vidyate // NarP_1,56.570 //
GP12nardp1_u:12314: gṛhamadhye hastamātre garte nyāsāya vinyaset // NarP_1,56.571 //
GP12nardp1_u:12321: śakuṃ tridhā vibhajyāndyaṃ caturasraṃ tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:12322: aṣṭāsraṃ ca tṛtīyāsau manvasraṃ mṛdumavraṇam // NarP_1,56.575 //
GP12nardp1_u:12328: śubhekṣite 'tha vā yukte lagne śaṅkuṃ vinikṣipet // NarP_1,56.578 //
GP12nardp1_u:12333: tāḥ punaḥ ṣaḍvidhāḥ śālāḥ pratyekaṃ daśaṣaḍvidhāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12334: dhruvaṃ dhānyaṃ jayaṃ nandaṃ kharaḥ kāntaṃ manoramam // NarP_1,56.581 //
GP12nardp1_u:12335: sumukhaṃ durmukhaṃ krūraṃ śatruṃ svarṇapradaṃ kṣayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12336: ākrandaṃ vipulākhya ca vijayaṃ ṣoḍaśaṃ gṛham // NarP_1,56.582 //
GP12nardp1_u:12344: pratīcyāṃ bhojanagṛhaṃ vā yavyāṃ dhānyamadiram // NarP_1,56.586 //
GP12nardp1_u:12350: dhvajo dhūmrotha siṃhaḥ śvā saurameyaḥ kharo gajāḥ // NarP_1,56.589 //
GP12nardp1_u:12360: pāñcālamānaṃ vaidehaṃ kauravaṃ ca kujanyakam // NarP_1,56.594 //
GP12nardp1_u:12366: avantimānaṃ viprāṇāṃ gāndhāraṃ kṣatriyasya ca // NarP_1,56.597 //
GP12nardp1_u:12370: paśuśālāśca śālānāṃ dhvajāyepyatha vā gaje // NarP_1,56.599 //
GP12nardp1_u:12380: sūryaḥ śaśī mṛgākāśau vāyuḥ pūṣā ca nairṛtiḥ // NarP_1,56.604 //
GP12nardp1_u:12386: ekāntarā syuḥ prāgādyāḥ parito brahmaṇaḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,56.607 //
