GP12nardp1_u:12388: mitrotha rājayakṣmā ca tathā pṛthvīdharāhvayaḥ // NarP_1,56.608 //
GP12nardp1_u:12392: tanmadhye viṃśatirbāhyā dvipadāste tu sarvadā // NarP_1,56.610 //
GP12nardp1_u:12393: aryamā ca vivasvāṃśca mitraḥ pṛthvī dharāhvayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12394: brahmaṇaḥ pārito dikṣu catvārastripadāḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,56.611 //
GP12nardp1_u:12400: tāmbūlaṃ ca tataḥ kartā prārthayedvāstupūruṣam // NarP_1,56.614 //
GP12nardp1_u:12404: dadyāttadagre viprebhyo bhojanaṃ ca svaśaktitaḥ // NarP_1,56.616 //
GP12nardp1_u:12406: ārogyaṃ putralābhaṃ ca dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ labhennaraḥ // NarP_1,56.617 //
GP12nardp1_u:12410: gṛhaṃ na praviśedevaṃ vipadāmākaraṃ hi tat // NarP_1,56.619 //
GP12nardp1_u:12416: yātrā śuklapratipadi nirddhanāya kṣayāya ca // NarP_1,56.622 //
GP12nardp1_u:12419: na mandendudine prācīṃ na vrajeddakṣiṇaṃ gurau /
GP12nardp1_u:12426: digrāśayastu kramaśo meṣādyāśca punaḥ punaḥ // NarP_1,56.627 //
GP12nardp1_u:12428: lagnastho bhāskaraḥ prācyāṃ diśi yāturlalāṭagaḥ // NarP_1,56.628 //
GP12nardp1_u:12432: lagnātsaptamagaḥ sauriḥ pratīcyāṃ tu lalāṭagaḥ // NarP_1,56.630 //
GP12nardp1_u:12438: tasya bhaṅgaprado rājñasta dvargo 'pi vilagnagaḥ // NarP_1,56.633 //
GP12nardp1_u:12442: pratiśukrakṛtaṃ doṣaṃ hṝntuṃ śaktā grahā na hi // NarP_1,56.635 //
GP12nardp1_u:12444: eteṣāṃ pañcagotrāṇāṃ pratiśukro na vidyate // NarP_1,56.636 //
GP12nardp1_u:12446: dvijakṣobhe nṛpakṣobhe pratiśukro na vidyate // NarP_1,56.637 //
GP12nardp1_u:12454: yāne sthirodaye neṣṭo bhavyayuktekṣitaḥ svayam // NarP_1,56.641 //
GP12nardp1_u:12458: tābhyāṃ tayorikendreṣu yātuḥ śatrukṣayo bhavet // NarP_1,56.643 //
GP12nardp1_u:12460: śubhavārgotha vā lagne yātuḥ śatrukṣayastadā // NarP_1,56.644 //
GP12nardp1_u:12462: tayorīśasthite rāśau yātuḥ śatrukṣayo bhavet // NarP_1,56.645 //
GP12nardp1_u:12466: mūrtiḥ kośo dhanvinaśca vāhanaṃ mantrasaṃjñakam // NarP_1,56.647 //
GP12nardp1_u:12470: na nighnato hi vyāpāraṃ saumyāḥḍha puṣṇantyariṃ vinā // NarP_1,56.649 //
GP12nardp1_u:12471: śukro 'staṃ ca na puṣṇāti mūrtiṃ mṛtyuṃ ca candramāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12480: yoge 'pi yāyināṃ kṣemamadhiyoge jayo bhavet // NarP_1,56.654 //
GP12nardp1_u:12488: lagne śukre ravau lābhe candre bandhusthite yadā // NarP_1,56.658 //
GP12nardp1_u:12490: svoccasaṃsthe site lagne svocce candre ca lābhage // NarP_1,56.659 //
GP12nardp1_u:12492: trikoṇe kendragāḥ saumyāḥ krūrāstryāyārigā yadi // NarP_1,56.660 //
GP12nardp1_u:12496: trikhaḍāyeṣu mandārau balavantaḥ śubhā yadi // NarP_1,56.662 //
GP12nardp1_u:12498: svoñcasthe lagnage jīve candre lābhagate yadi // NarP_1,56.663 //
GP12nardp1_u:12499: gato rājā ripūnhati pinākī tripuraṃ yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:12502: jīvaṃ lagnagate śukre kendre vāpi trikoṇage // NarP_1,56.665 //
GP12nardp1_u:12504: lagnage jñe śubhe kendre dhiṣṇye copakule gataḥ // NarP_1,56.666 //
GP12nardp1_u:12506: śubhi trikoṇe kendrasthe lābhe candre 'thavā ravī // NarP_1,56.667 //
GP12nardp1_u:12507: śatrūnhanti gato rājā hyandhakāraṃ yathā raviḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12508: svakṣetrage śubhe kadre trikoṇoyagate gataḥ // NarP_1,56.668 //
GP12nardp1_u:12510: indau svasthe gurau kendre mantraḥ sapraṇavo gataḥ // NarP_1,56.669 //
GP12nardp1_u:12514: śubhe kendre trikoṇasthe candre vargottame gataḥ // NarP_1,56.671 //
GP12nardp1_u:12516: mitrabhe 'tha gurau kendre trikoṇasthe 'tha vā site // NarP_1,56.672 //
GP12nardp1_u:12517: śatrūnhṝnti gato rājā bhujaṅgān garuḍo yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:12520: ye nṛpā yāntyarīñjetuṃ teṣāṃ yogairnṛpāhvayaiḥ // NarP_1,56.674 //
GP12nardp1_u:12527: asamāpte na kurvīta yātrāṃ martyo jijīviṣuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12529: vastrādeḥ skhalite krodhe durukte na vrajennṛpaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12532: sajjikā paramānnaṃ ca kāñjika ca payo dadhi // NarP_1,56.680 //
GP12nardp1_u:12534: kulmāṣāṃśca tilānnaṃ ca dadhi kṣaudraṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ // NarP_1,56.681 //
GP12nardp1_u:12535: mṛgamāṃsaṃ ca tatsāraṃ pāyasaṃ ca khagaṃ mṛgam /
GP12nardp1_u:12538: haviṣyaṃ kṛśarānnaṃ ca mudgānnaṃ yavapiṣṭikam // NarP_1,56.683 //
GP12nardp1_u:12554: prāṇināṃ prāṇarūpaṃ taṃ dvibāhuṃ daṇḍapāṇikam // NarP_1,56.691 //
GP12nardp1_u:12560: aprayāṇe svayaṃ kāryā prekṣayā bhūbhujastathā // NarP_1,56.694 //
GP12nardp1_u:12564: dinānyekatra na vasetsaptaṣṭ vā paro janaḥ // NarP_1,56.696 //
GP12nardp1_u:12567: utpāteṣu trividheṣu saptarātraṃ tu na vrajet /
GP12nardp1_u:12572: kṛṣṇaṃ tyaktvā prayāṇe tu kṛkalāsena vīkṣitaḥ // NarP_1,56.700 //
GP12nardp1_u:12576: dṛṣṭamātreṇa yātrāyāṃ vyastaṃ sarvaṃ praveśane // NarP_1,56.702 //
GP12nardp1_u:12590: vedamaṅgalaghoṣāḥ syuḥ yā yināṃ kāryasiddhidāḥ // NarP_1,56.709 //
GP12nardp1_u:12592: smṛtvā dvitīye viprāṇāṃ kṛtvā pūjāṃ nivartayet // NarP_1,56.710 //
GP12nardp1_u:12604: divā vā yadi vā rātrau praveśo maṅgalapradaḥ // NarP_1,56.716 //
GP12nardp1_u:12606: sthiralagne sthirāṃśe ca naidhane śuddhisaṃyute // NarP_1,56.717 //
GP12nardp1_u:12612: kṛtvārkaṃ vāmato vidvānbhṛṅgāraṃ cāgrato viśet // NarP_1,56.720 //
GP12nardp1_u:12614: kendrage vā śuklapakṣe cātivṛṣṭiḥ śubhekṣite // NarP_1,56.721 //
GP12nardp1_u:12622: pravarṣaṇaṃ bhṛguḥ kuryādviparīte na varṣaṇam // NarP_1,56.725 //
GP12nardp1_u:12624: tadā vṛṣṭiṃ prakurvanti na te cetpratilomagāḥ // NarP_1,56.726 //
GP12nardp1_u:12630: candrejye jñetha vā śukre kendrenbītirvinaśyati // NarP_1,56.729 //
GP12nardp1_u:12634: siṃhe bhinne kujo vṛṣṭirabhinne karkaṭe tathā // NarP_1,56.731 //
GP12nardp1_u:12636: ahirbudhnyaṃ pūrvaśasyaṃ paraśasyā ca revatī // NarP_1,56.732 //
GP12nardp1_u:12638: guroḥ saptamarā tisthaḥ pratyaggo bhṛgujo yadā // NarP_1,56.733 //
GP12nardp1_u:12648: udayāstamaye kāle vivarṇor'ketha vā śaśī // NarP_1,56.738 //
GP12nardp1_u:12650: prāṅmukhasya tu kūrmasya navāṅgeṣu dharāmimām // NarP_1,56.739 //
GP12nardp1_u:12662: nābhyādiṣu navāṅgeṣu pāpairduṣṭaṃ śubhaiḥ śubham // NarP_1,56.745 //
GP12nardp1_u:12663: devatā yatra nṛtyanti patanti prajvalanti ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12664: muhū rudanti gāyanti prasvidyanti hasaṃti ca // NarP_1,56.746 //
GP12nardp1_u:12665: vamantyagniṃ tathā dhūmaṃ snehaṃ raktaṃ payo jalam /
GP12nardp1_u:12667: evamādyā hi dṛśyante vikārāḥ pratimāsu ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12670: gāndharvaṃ dehadigdhūmaṃ bhūmikaṃpaṃ divā niśi // NarP_1,56.749 //
GP12nardp1_u:12671: anagnau ca sphuliṅgāśca jvalanaṃ ca vinendhanam /
GP12nardp1_u:12674: jantavo dvitriśiraso jāyante vāpi yoniṣu // NarP_1,56.751 //
GP12nardp1_u:12678: akāle puṣpitā vṛkṣā dṛśyante phalitā yadi // NarP_1,56.753 //
GP12nardp1_u:12682: madhyādbhayaṃ yaśo mṛtyuḥ kṣayaḥ kīrtiḥ sukhāsukham // NarP_1,56.755 //
GP12nardp1_u:12683: aisvaryaṃ dhanahāniṃ ca madhucchannaṃ ca vālmikam /
GP12nardp1_u:12686: ityetatkathitaṃ vipra jyautiṣaṃ te samāsataḥ // NarP_1,56.757 //
GP12nardp1_u:12687: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi cchandaḥ śāstramanuttamam // NarP_1,56.758 //
GP12nardp1_u:12695: sarvago magaṇaḥ prokto mukhalo yagaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12696: madhyalo ragaṇaśvaiva prāntyagaḥ sagaṇo mataḥ // NarP_1,57.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:12706: lakṣma bhinnaṃ yasya pādacatuṣke viṣamaṃ hi tat // NarP_1,57.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:12710: tribhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ padairgāthāḥ śṛṇu saṃjñā yathottaram // NarP_1,57.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:12714: śakkarī sātipūrvā ca aṣṭyatyaṣṭī tataḥ smṛte // NarP_1,57.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:12718: pāde sarvagurau pūrvīllaghuṃ sthāpya guroradhaḥ // NarP_1,57.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:12721: naṣṭāṅkārddhe same laḥ syādvipam saiva sorddhagaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12733: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde saṅkṣiptacchandovarṇanaṃ nāma saptapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:12747: vīryeṇa saṃmataḥ putro mama bhūyāditi sma ha /
GP12nardp1_u:12750: atiṣṭanmārutāhāraḥ śataṃ kila samāḥ prabhuḥ // NarP_1,58.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:12756: tatra rudro mahādevaḥ karṇikāramayīṃ śubhām // NarP_1,58.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:12758: tasnin divye vane ramye devadevarṣisaṃkule // NarP_1,58.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:12760: na cāsya hīyate varṇo na glānirupajāyate // NarP_1,58.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:12764: evaṃ vidhena tapasā tasya bhaktyā ca nārada // NarP_1,58.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:12768: yathā khe ca tathā śuddho bhaviṣyati sutastaṃva // NarP_1,58.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:12770: tejasā tasya lokāṃstrīnyaśaḥ prāpsyati kevalam // NarP_1,58.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:12771: evaṃ labdhvā varaṃ devo vyāsaḥ satyavatīsutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12773: atha rūpaṃ paraṃ vipra bibhratīṃ svena tejasā /
GP12nardp1_u:12777: sā tu kṛtvā tadā vyāsaṃ kāmasaṃvignamānasam /
GP12nardp1_u:12781: sa tu mahatā nigṛhṇan hṛcchayaṃ muniḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12782: na śaśāka niyantuṃ taṃ vyāsaḥ pravisṛtaṃ manaḥ // NarP_1,58.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:12786: śukre nirmathyamāne 'syāṃ śuko jajñe mahātapāḥ // NarP_1,58.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:12789: tathā rūpaḥ śuko jajñe prajvalanniva tejasā /
GP12nardp1_u:12791: taṃ gaṅgāṃ saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ merupṛṣṭhe svarūpiṇīm /
GP12nardp1_u:12792: abhyetya snāpayāmāsa vāriṇā svena nārada // NarP_1,58.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:12800: divyāni sarvapuṣpāṇi pravavarṣa ca mārutaḥ // NarP_1,58.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:12802: taṃ mahātmā svayaṃ prītyā devyā saha mahādyutiḥ // NarP_1,58.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:12805: dadau kamaṇḍaluṃ prītyā devā vāsāṃsi cābhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12808: āraṇe yastadā divyaṃ prāpya janma mahāmuniḥ // NarP_1,58.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:12810: utpannamātraṃ taṃ vedāḥ sarahasyāḥ sasaṃgrahāḥ // NarP_1,58.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:12812: bṛhaspatiṃ sa vavre ca vedavedāṅgabhāṣyavit // NarP_1,58.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:12816: gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā samāvṛtto mahāmuniḥ // NarP_1,58.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:12820: na tvasya ramate buddhi rāśrameṣu munīśvara // NarP_1,58.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:12824: mokṣadharmeṣu kuśalo bhagavān prabravītu me // NarP_1,58.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:12826: śṛtvā putrasya vacanaṃ paramarṣiruvāca tam // NarP_1,58.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:12829: yogaśāstraṃ ca nikhilaṃ kāpilaṃ caiva nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:12830: śataṃ brāhmyā śriyā yuktaṃ brahmatulyaparākramam // NarP_1,58.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:12832: uvāca gaccheti tadā janakaṃ mithileśvaram // NarP_1,58.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:12833: sa te vakṣyati mokṣārthaṃ nikhilena narādhipaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12835: praṣṭuṃ dharmasya niṣṭāṃ vai mokṣasya ca parāyaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:12836: uktaśca mānuṣeṇa tvaṃ tathā gacchetyavismitaḥ // NarP_1,58.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:12838: ārjavenaiva gantavyaṃ na sukhāya kṣaṇāttvayā // NarP_1,58.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:12839: na draṣṭavyā viśeṣā hi viśeṣā hi prasaṃginaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12840: ahṝṅkāro na kartavyo yājye tasminnarādhipe // NarP_1,58.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:12841: sthātavyaṃ vasathe tasya sa te chetsyati saṃśayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12844: evamuktaḥ sa dharmātmā jagāma mithilāṃ muniḥ // NarP_1,58.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:12858: darśayitvāsane sthāpya rājānaṃ ca vyajijñapat // NarP_1,58.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:12859: śrutvā rājā śukaṃ prāptaṃ vārastrīḥ sa nyayuṅkta ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12860: sevāyai tasya bhāvasya jñānāya munisatama // NarP_1,58.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:12868: krīḍantyaśca hasaṃtyaśca gāyantyaścaiva tāḥ śukam // NarP_1,58.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:12871: dhyānastha eva satataṃ na hṛṣyati na kupyati /
GP12nardp1_u:12872: pādaśaucaṃ tu kṛtvā vai śukaḥ saṃdhyāmupāsya ca // NarP_1,58.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:12874: pūrvarātre tu tatrāsau bhūtvā dhyānaparāyaṇaḥ // NarP_1,58.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:12876: tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya kṛtvā śaucamanantaram // NarP_1,58.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:12879: tāṃ ca rātriṃ nṛpakule vartayāmāsa nārada // NarP_1,58.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:12880: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyabhāge śukapralobhanaṃ nāmāṣṭañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:12884: puraḥ purohitaṃ kṛtvā sarvāṇyantaḥ purāṇi ca // NarP_1,59.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:12889: pādyaṃ nivedya prathamaṃ sārghyaṃ gāṃ ca nyavedayat /
GP12nardp1_u:12890: sa ca tāṃmantrataḥ pūjāṃ pratigṛhya dvijottamaḥ // NarP_1,59.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:12899: tatra tvaṃ gaccha tūrṇaṃ vai sa te hṛdayasaṃśayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12900: pravṛttau ca nivṛttau ca sarvaṃ chetsyatyasaṃśayam // NarP_1,59.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:12904: kathaṃ ca mokṣaḥ kartavyo jñānena tapasāpi vā // NarP_1,59.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:12921: kimavaśyaṃ tu vastavyamāśrameṣu na vā nṛpa /
GP12nardp1_u:12926: ācāryaḥ plāvitā tasya jñānaṃ plava ihocyate /
GP12nardp1_u:12929: kṛtvā śubhāśubhaṃ karma mokṣo nāmeha labhyate // NarP_1,59.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:12931: āsādayati śuddhātmā mokṣaṃ hi prathamāśrame // NarP_1,59.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:12937: saṃpaśyannaiva lipyeta jale vāricarago yathā // NarP_1,59.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:12939: vihāya dehaṃ nirmukto nirdvandvaḥ śubhasaṃgataḥ // NarP_1,59.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:12940: atra gāthāḥ purā gītāḥ śṛṇu rājñā yayātinā /
GP12nardp1_u:12942: jyotiścātmani nānyatra ratnaṃ tatraiva caiva tat /
GP12nardp1_u:12943: svayaṃ ca śakyaṃ taddraṣṭuṃ susamāhitarcatasā // NarP_1,59.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:12944: na bibheti paro yasmānna bibheti parācca yaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12945: yaśca necchati na dveṣṭi brahma saṃpadyate sa tu // NarP_1,59.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:12946: yadā bhāvaṃ na kurute sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam /
GP12nardp1_u:12949: karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā // NarP_1,59.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:12951: tyaktva kāmaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca tato brahmatvamaśnute // NarP_1,59.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:12952: yadā śrāvye ca dṛśye ca sarvabhūteṣu cāvyayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12953: samo bhavati nirdvudvo brahma saṃpadyate tadā // NarP_1,59.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:12954: yadā stuti ca rnidāṃ ca samatvena ca paśyati /
GP12nardp1_u:12955: kāñcanaṃ cāyasaṃ caiva sukhaduḥkhe tathaiva ca // NarP_1,59.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:12957: jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ caiva brahma saṃpadyate tadā // NarP_1,59.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:12960: tamaḥ parigataṃ veśya yathā dīpena dṛśyate /
GP12nardp1_u:12961: tathā buddhipradīpena śakya ātmā nirīkṣitum // NarP_1,59.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:12963: yañcānyadapi vettavyaṃ tattvato vetti tadbhavān // NarP_1,59.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:12967: jñānaṃ divyaṃ samādīptaṃ tenāsi vidito vidito mama // NarP_1,59.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:12969: adhikaṃ ca tavaiśvaryaṃ tañca tvaṃ nāvabudhyase // NarP_1,59.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:12971: utpanne cāpi vijñā ne nādhigacchanti tāṅgatim // NarP_1,59.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:12976: nāsti te sukhaduḥkheṣu viśeṣo nāsti vastuṣu /
GP12nardp1_u:12977: nautsukyaṃ nṛtyagīteṣu na rāga upajāyate // NarP_1,59.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:12978: na bandhuṣu nibandhaste na bhayeṣvasti te bhayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12980: ahaṃ ca tvānupaśyāmi ye cānye 'pi manīṣiṇaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12981: āsthitaṃ paramaṃ mārge akṣayaṃ cāpyanāmayam // NarP_1,59.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:12988: śaiśiraṃ girimāsādya pārāśaryaṃ dadarśa ca // NarP_1,59.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:12995: samāliṅgya sutaṃ vyāsaḥ svapārśvasthaṃ cakāra ca // NarP_1,59.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:12996: tataḥ pailādayo viprā vedān vyāsādadhītya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:13004: bho bho maharṣe bāsiṣṭha brahmaghoṣo na vartate // NarP_1,60.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:13019: divyaṃ te cakṣurutpannaṃ svasthaṃ te niścalaṃ manaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13020: tamasā rajasā cāpi tyaktaḥ satye vyavasthitaḥ // NarP_1,60.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:13023: dvāvetau pratyayaṃ yātau divaṃ cādhaśca gacchataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13024: pithivyāmantarikṣe ca yataḥ saṃyānti vāyavaḥ // NarP_1,60.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:13029: apānaśca tato jajñe prāṇaścāpi tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:13031: pṛtharkkṃmāṇi teṣāṃ tu pravakṣyāmi yathā tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:13032: prāṇināṃ sarvato vāyuśceṣṭā vartayate pṛthak // NarP_1,60.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:13035: prathamaḥ prathame mārge pravaho nāma so 'nilaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13037: āvaho nāma so 'bhyeti dvitīyaḥ śvasano nadan /
GP12nardp1_u:13038: udayaṃ jyotiṣāṃ śaśvatsomādīnāṃ karoti yaḥ // NarP_1,60.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:13044: saṃnīyamānā bahudhā yena nīlā mahāghanāḥ // NarP_1,60.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:13046: yo 'sau vahati devānāṃ vimānāni vihāyasā // NarP_1,60.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:13047: caturthaḥ saṃvaho nāma vāyuḥ sa girimardanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13048: yena vegavatā rugṇāḥ kriyante tarujā rasāḥ // NarP_1,60.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:13049: pañcamaḥ sa mahāvego vivaho nāma mārutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13055: ṣaṣṭhaḥ parivaho nāma sa vāyurjīvatāṃ varaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13060: yaṃ samāsādya vegena diśāmantaṃ prapedire // NarP_1,60.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:13063: parīvaho nāma varo vāyuḥ sa duratikramaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13064: evamete diteḥ putrā marutaḥ paramādbhutāḥ // NarP_1,60.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:13074: tato vyāse gate snātuṃ śuko brahmavidāṃ varaḥ // NarP_1,60.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:13076: tatra svādhyāyasaṃsaktaṃ śukaṃ vyāsasutaṃ mune // NarP_1,60.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:13078: utthāya satkṛtastena brahmaputro hi kārṣṇinā // NarP_1,60.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:13079: tataḥ provāca viprendra śukaṃ vidāṃ varaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13080: kiṃ karoṣi mahābhāga vyāsaputra mahādyute // NarP_1,60.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:13085: tadvadasva mahābhāga yathā ta jjñānamāpnuyām // NarP_1,60.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:13088: nāsti rāgasamaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāsti tyāgasamaṃ sukham // NarP_1,60.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:13091: mānuṣyamasukhaṃ prāpya yaḥ sajjati sa muhyati /
GP12nardp1_u:13092: nālaṃ sa duḥkhamokṣāya saṃgo vai duḥkhalakṣaṇaḥ // NarP_1,60.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:13096: kāryaḥ śreyorthinā tau hi śreyoghātārthamudyatau // NarP_1,60.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:13099: ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmaḥ kṣamā ca paramaṃ balam /
GP12nardp1_u:13100: ātmajñānaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ satyaṃ hi paramaṃ hitam // NarP_1,60.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:13101: yena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ sa vidvānsa ca paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13104: ātmabhūtairatadbhūtaḥ saha caiva vinaiva ca // NarP_1,60.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:13105: sa vimuktaḥ paraṃ śreyo na cireṇādhigacchati /
GP12nardp1_u:13107: yasya bhūtaiḥ saha mune sa śreyo vindate mahat /
GP12nardp1_u:13109: nedaṃ janma samāsādya vairaṃ kurvīta kena cit /
GP12nardp1_u:13120: dvandvārāmeṣu bhūteṣu varāko ramate muniḥ // NarP_1,60.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:13130: alaṃ parigraheṇeha doṣavān hi parigrahaḥ // NarP_1,60.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:13136: pārakyamadhruvaṃ sarvaṃ kiṃ svaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛte // NarP_1,60.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:13138: anarthe kiṃ prasaktastvaṃ svamarthaṃ nānutiṣṭasi // NarP_1,60.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:13142: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ca tvāṃ gacchantamanuyāsyataḥ // NarP_1,60.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:13143: vidyā karma ca śauryaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca bahuvistaram /
GP12nardp1_u:13145: nibandhinī rajjureṣā yā grāme vasato ratiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13146: chitvaināṃ sukṛto yānti naināṃ chindanti duṣkṛtaḥ // NarP_1,60.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:13148: na ca nāmāsti nirvedo lohaṃ hi hṛdayaṃ tava // NarP_1,60.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:13152: tyāgavātādhvagāṃ śīghrāṃ buddhināvaṃ nadīṃ taret // NarP_1,60.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:13153: tyaktvā dharmamadharmaṃ ca hyubhe satyānṛte tyaja /
GP12nardp1_u:13162: indriyāṇi ca pañcaiva tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajastathā // NarP_1,60.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:13167: trivargo 'tra sukhaṃ duḥkha jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:13168: ya idaṃ veda tattvena sasa veda prabhavāpyayau // NarP_1,60.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:13172: loke vihitamātmānaṃ lokaṃ cātmani paśyati // NarP_1,60.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:13182: tataḥ karma samādatte punaranyannavaṃ bahu // NarP_1,60.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:13188: saṃyamena ca saṃbandhānnivṛttyā tapaso balāt // NarP_1,60.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:13189: samprāptā bahavaḥ siddhiṃ avyābādhāṃ sukhodayām // NarP_1,60.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:13190: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bṛhadupākhyāne ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13196: divase divase mūḍhamāviśanti na paṇḍitam // NarP_1,61.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:13203: nārtho na dharmo na yaśo yo 'tītamanuśocati /
GP12nardp1_u:13204: asyābhāvena yujyetaṃ tañcāsya tu nivartate // NarP_1,61.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:13205: guṇairbhūtāni yujyante tathaiva ca na yujyate /
GP12nardp1_u:13206: sarvāṇi naitadekasya śokasthānaṃ hi vidyate // NarP_1,61.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:13207: mṛtaṃ vā yadi vā naṣṭaṃ yo 'tītamanuśocati /
GP12nardp1_u:13208: duḥkhena labhate duḥkhaṃ mahānarthe prapadyate // NarP_1,61.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:13212: cintyamānaṃ hi na vyeti bhūyaścābhipravarddhate // NarP_1,61.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:13214: etadvijñāya sāmarthyaṃ na vānyaiḥ samatāmiyāt // NarP_1,61.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:13216: ārogyaṃ priyasaṃvāsaṃ na mṛdhyetpaṇḍitaḥ kvacit // NarP_1,61.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:13222: sāyakā iva tīkṣṇāgrāḥ prayuktā dṛḍhadhanvibhiḥ // NarP_1,61.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:13228: jātaṃ martyaṃ jarayati nimiṣaṃ nāvatiṣṭate // NarP_1,61.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:13230: ādityo hyastamabhyeti punaḥ punarudeti ca // NarP_1,61.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:13232: iṣṭāniṣṭā manuṣyāṇāṃ mataṃ gacchanti rātrayaḥ // NarP_1,61.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:13234: yadi syānna parādhīnaṃ puruṣasya kriyāphalam // NarP_1,61.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:13236: dṛśyante niṣphalāḥ saṃtaḥ prahīnāśca svakarmabhiḥ // NarP_1,61.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:13240: vañcanāyāṃ ca lokeṣu sasukheṣveva jīyate // NarP_1,61.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:13245: tasya yonau prasaktasya garbho bhavati mānavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13250: āyuṣmān jāyate putraḥ kathaṃ pretaḥ piteva saḥ // NarP_1,61.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:13258: parityajati yo duḥkhaṃ sukhamapyubhayaṃ naraḥ // NarP_1,61.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13260: duḥkhamarthā hi tyajyante pālane ca na te sukhāḥ // NarP_1,61.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:13262: anyāmanyāṃ dhanāvasthāṃ prāpya vaiśeṣikā narāḥ // NarP_1,61.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:13263: atṛptā yānti vidhvaṃsaṃ santoṣaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13264: sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ // NarP_1,61.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:13266: anto nāsti pipāsāyāstuṣṭistu paramaṃ sukham // NarP_1,61.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:13270: bhūteṣu bhāvaṃ saṃcintya ye buddhyā tamasaḥ param // NarP_1,61.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:13271: na śocanti gatādhvānaḥ paśyanti paramāṃ gatim /
GP12nardp1_u:13276: śabde sparśe rase rūpe gandhe ca paramaṃ tathā // NarP_1,61.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:13279: viprayogaśca sarvasya na vācā na ca vidyayā /
GP12nardp1_u:13281: vicaredasamunnaddhaḥ sa sukhī sa ca paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13285: nainaṃ prajñā suniyataṃ trāyate nāpi pauruṣam /
GP12nardp1_u:13293: kena yatnena jīvantaṃ garbhaṃ tvamiha paśyasi /
GP12nardp1_u:13294: annapānāni jīryante yatra bhakṣyāśca bhakṣitāḥ // NarP_1,61.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:13297: dhāraṇe vā visarge ca na kartuṃ vidyate 'vaśaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13302: garbhasya saha jātasya saptamīmīdṛśīṃ daśām // NarP_1,61.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:13303: prāpnuvanti tataḥ pañca na bhavanti śatāyuṣaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13304: nābhyutthāne manuṣyāṇāṃ yogāḥ syurnātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,61.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:13308: te cāpi vividhā vaidyāḥ kuśalā saṃmatauṣadhāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13310: te pibanti kaṣāyāṃśca sarpīṣi vividhāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:13311: dṛśyante jarayā bhagnā nāgairnāgā ivottamāḥ // NarP_1,61.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:13313: śvāpadāśca daridrāśca prāyo nārtā bhavanti te // NarP_1,61.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:13315: ākramya roga ādatte paśūnpaśupaco yathā // NarP_1,61.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:13317: srotasā mahasā kṣipraṃ hriyamāṇaṃ balīyasā // NarP_1,61.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:13318: na dhanena na rājyena nogreṇa tapasā tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:13319: svabhāvā hyativartante ye nirmuktāḥ śarīriṣu // NarP_1,61.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:13321: yatate ca yathāśakti na ca tadvartate tathā // NarP_1,61.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:13325: apramattāḥ śaṭhāḥ krūrā vikrāntāḥ paryupāsate // NarP_1,61.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:13327: svaṃ svaṃ ca punaranyeṣāṃ na kañcidatigacchati // NarP_1,61.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:13331: manujāśca gataśrīkāḥ śataśo vividhāḥ striyāḥ // NarP_1,61.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:13333: idamanyatparaṃ paśya nātra mohaṃ kariṣyasi // NarP_1,61.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:13334: dharmaṃ cāpi tyajā dharmaṃ tyaja satyānṛtāṃ dhiyam /
GP12nardp1_u:13335: sarvaṃ tyaktvā svarūpasthaḥ sukhī bhava nirāmayaḥ // NarP_1,61.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:13337: yena devāḥ parityajya bhartyalokaṃ divaṃ gatāḥ // NarP_1,61.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:13343: tataḥ pitrā samāgamya praṇamya ca mahāmuniḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13346: kṣaṇaikaṃ sthīyatāṃ putra iti ca krośa durmanāḥ // NarP_1,61.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:13348: mokṣamevānusaṃcitya gata eva paraṃ padam // NarP_1,61.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:13349: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde ekaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13353: punaḥ papraccha taṃ vipra śukābhipatanaṃ munim // NarP_1,62.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:13360: kutra te nivasaṃtīha saṃśayo me mahānayam // NarP_1,62.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:13365: tataḥ sa prāṅmukho vidvānādityena virocite // NarP_1,62.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:13367: na tatra pakṣisaṃghāto na śabdo na ca darśanam // NarP_1,62.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:13370: prajahāsa tato hāsaṃ śukaḥ samprekṣya bhāskaram /
GP12nardp1_u:13378: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13385: tamo hyaṣṭavidhaṃ tyaktvā jahau pañcavidhaṃ rajaḥ // NarP_1,62.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:13389: saṃśliṣṭe śvetapīte ca rukmarūpyamaye śubhe // NarP_1,62.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:13395: na ca pratijaghānāsya sa gatiṃ parvatottamaḥ // NarP_1,62.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:13406: sa dadarśa dvidhā kṛtvā parvatāgraṃ gataṃ śukam /
GP12nardp1_u:13407: śaśaṃsurmunayaḥ siddhā gatiṃ tasmai sutasya tām // NarP_1,62.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:13419: so 'nunīto bhagavatā vyāso rudreṇa nārada // NarP_1,62.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13420: kimu tvaṃ tāmyasi mune putraṃ prati samākulaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13421: paśyasi vipra nāyāntaṃ brahmabhūtaṃ nijāntire // NarP_1,62.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:13423: śvāśramaṃ sa śuko brahmabhūto lokāṃścacāra ha // NarP_1,62.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:13426: tatra dṛṣṭvā tu tau devau tapyamāno mahattapaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13427: svayaṃ ca tatra tapasi sthitaḥ śukamanusmaran // NarP_1,62.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:13429: śvetadvīpaṃ gatastāta yatra tvamagamaḥ purā // NarP_1,62.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:13431: dṛṣṭaḥ śrutivimṛgyo hi devadevo janārdanaḥ // NarP_1,62.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:13440: yaṃ bhāntamanubhāntyete lokāḥ sarve 'pi nārada // NarP_1,62.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:13467: ṛbhave suvratākhyāya sudhāmne cājitāya ca // NarP_1,62.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:13479: ghṛtārciṣe viṣṇave te 'nantāya kapilāyaya ca // NarP_1,62.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:13490: vidyāmāpnuhi bhaktiṃ ca jñānī tvaṃ mama rūpadhṛk // NarP_1,62.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:13491: yadrūpaṃ mama dṛṣṭaṃ prāk śvetadvīpe tvayā dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:13494: varalokānyathā vāyuryathā ravaṃ savitā tathā // NarP_1,62.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:13496: bhaktirhi durlabhā loke mayi sarvaparāyaṇe // NarP_1,62.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:13500: kartā bhāgavataṃ śāstraṃ tadadhīṣva bhuvaṃ vraja // NarP_1,62.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:13502: tvadviyogena khinnātmā taṃ prasādaya matpriyam // NarP_1,62.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:13505: atha taṃ svantike dṛṣṭvā pārāśaryyaḥ pratāpavān /
GP12nardp1_u:13506: putraṃ prāpya prahṛṣṭātmā tapaso nivavarta ha // NarP_1,62.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:13517: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bṛhadupākhyāne mokṣadharṃmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13528: teṣāṃ samāgame bhadrā kā kathā lokapāvanī // NarP_1,63.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:13533: nārado bhārgavaśreṣṭha punaḥ papraccha tānmunīn // NarP_1,63.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:13536: samārādhyaḥ sa evātra sarvaiḥ sarvārthakāṅkṣibhiḥ // NarP_1,63.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:13540: dīkṣaṇaṃ prātarādyaṃ ca kṛtyaṃ syādyattaducyatām // NarP_1,63.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:13542: prīyeta paramātmā vai tadbrūta mama mānadāḥ // NarP_1,63.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:13547: śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi tantraṃ bhāgavataṃ tava /
GP12nardp1_u:13552: patistatra śivohyeko jīvāstu paśavaḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,63.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:13566: pāśāḥ pañca tathā tatra prathamau malakarmajau // NarP_1,63.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:13572: ityetau prathamau cātha māyeyādyān śṛṇudvija // NarP_1,63.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:13574: patirjayati sarveṣāmeko bījaṃ vibhuḥ param // NarP_1,63.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:13575: manasyati na codeti nivṛttiṃ ca prayacchati /
GP12nardp1_u:13576: varvarti dṛkkriyārūpaṃ tattejaḥ śāṃbhavaṃ param // NarP_1,63.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:13577: śakto mayā harau bhukto paśugaṇasya hi /
GP12nardp1_u:13582: kṛtyaṃ kurvanti tenedaṃ sarvānugrāhakaṃ mune // NarP_1,63.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:13590: yatra kriyā hi nyagbhūtā jñānākhyodrekamaśnute // NarP_1,63.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13592: nādo binduśca sakalaḥ sadākhyaṃ tattvamāśritau // NarP_1,63.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:13593: vidyeśāḥ punaraiśaṃ tu mantrā vidyābhidhaṃ punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13594: imāni caiva tattvāni śuddhādhveti prakīrtitam // NarP_1,63.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:13598: tattvaṃ vastuta ekaṃ tu śivākhyaṃ citraśaktikam // NarP_1,63.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:13600: cijjaḍānugrahārthāya kṛtvā rūpāṇi vai prabhuḥ // NarP_1,63.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:13602: muktiṃ ca viśveṣāṃ svavyāpāre samarthetām // NarP_1,63.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:13610: nityaikā ca śivā śaktyā hyanādinidhanā satī // NarP_1,63.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:13611: sādhāraṇī narāṇāṃ vai bhuvanānāṃ ca kāraṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:13613: viśvī sūkṣmā parā māyā vikṛtaiḥ parattu sā /
GP12nardp1_u:13614: karmāṇyāvekṣya vidyeśo māyāṃ vikṣobhya śaktibhiḥ // NarP_1,63.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:13616: sṛjatyādo kālatattvaṃ nānāśaktimayī ca sā // NarP_1,63.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:13618: sūte hyanantaraṃ māyā śaktiṃ niyamanātmikām // NarP_1,63.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:13620: anantaraṃ ca sā māyā nityā viśvavimohinī // NarP_1,63.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:13622: ekatastu nṛṇāṃ yena kalayitvā malaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,63.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:13626: pradarśanātha vai puṃso viṣayāṇāṃ ca sā punaḥ // NarP_1,63.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:13627: prakāśarūpaṃ vidyākhyaṃ tattvaṃ sūte kalaiva hi /
GP12nardp1_u:13628: vidyā tvāvaraṇaṃ bhitvā jñānaśakteḥ svakarmaṇā // NarP_1,63.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:13630: karoti bhogyaṃ yānāsau karaṇena pareṇa vai // NarP_1,63.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:13632: bhogye bhogaṃ ca bhoktāraṃ tatparaṃ karaṇaṃ tu sā // NarP_1,63.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:13635: bhogyaṃ bhoktuśca svenaiva vidyākhyaṃ karaṇaṃ tu tat /
GP12nardp1_u:13636: yadyarkavatprakāśā dhīḥ karmatvāñca tathāpi hi // NarP_1,63.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:13641: kiṃ ca pradhānacaritaṃ vyarthaṃ sarvaṃ bhavettataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13646: yena bhogyāya janitā bhidyaṅge puruṣe punaḥ // NarP_1,63.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:13650: kalaiva praścādavyaktaṃ sūte bhogyāya cāsya tu // NarP_1,63.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:13653: ādhāro 'pi ca yasteṣāṃ tadavyaktaṃ ca gīyate /
GP12nardp1_u:13654: traya eva guṇā hyaṣāmavyaktādeva saṃbhavaḥ // NarP_1,63.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:13660: sattvā dviguṇabhedena sa punastrividho bhavet // NarP_1,63.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:13662: tatra taijasato jñānendriyāṇi manasā saha // NarP_1,63.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:13666: icchārūpaṃ ca saṃkalpavyāpāraṃ tatra vai manaḥ // NarP_1,63.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:13668: bahiḥ karaṇabhāvena svocitena yataḥ sadā // NarP_1,63.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:13673: jñānendriyāṇi śrotraṃ tvak cakṣurjihvā ca nāsikā /
GP12nardp1_u:13674: grāhyāśca viṣayā hyeṣāṃ jñeyāḥ śabdādayo mune // NarP_1,63.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:13678: karaṇāni ca siddhinā na kṛtiḥ karaṇairvinā // NarP_1,63.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:13681: tanmātrāṇi tu khavāyustejo 'mbhaḥ kṣmeti pañca vai /
GP12nardp1_u:13684: rūpaṃ triṣu rasaścaiva dvayorgandhaḥ kṣitau tathā // NarP_1,63.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:13686: pākaśca saṃgrahaścaiva dhāraṇaṃ ceti kathyate // NarP_1,63.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:13688: bhāsvadagnau jale śuklaṃ kṣitau śuklādyanekadhā // NarP_1,63.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:13689: rūpaṃ triṣu rasoṃ'bhaḥ su madhuraḥ ṣaḍidhaḥ kṣitau /
GP12nardp1_u:13692: bhūtasya tu viśeṣo 'yaṃ viśeṣarahitaṃ tu tat // NarP_1,63.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:13698: hṛdi paṅktau dṛśoḥ pitte tejastaddharmadarśanāt // NarP_1,63.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:13704: deheṣu karmavaśataḥ sarveṣu vicaranti hi // NarP_1,63.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:13716: bindurekaḥ praviśati yadā garbhe dvayātmakaḥ // NarP_1,63.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:13723: evaṃ tatra sthito garbhe prāgjanmotthaṃ śubhāśubham /
GP12nardp1_u:13728: tataḥ krameṇa sa śiśurvardhamāno dinedine // NarP_1,63.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:13733: āhāraścaiva nidrā ca bhayaṃ maithunameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:13734: paśvādīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ sādhāraṇamitīritam // NarP_1,63.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:13742: yajate śivaṃ mantraiśca ravapareṣāṃ hitāya saḥ // NarP_1,63.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:13752: yo yasminnāśrame tiṣṭandīkṣāṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ // NarP_1,63.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:13754: kṛtānyapi na karmāṇi bandhanāya bhavanti hi // NarP_1,63.115 //
GP12nardp1_u:13758: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ dīkṣāṃ prāpya yo nācarennaraḥ // NarP_1,63.117 //
GP12nardp1_u:13767: kṛte 'pi viphalaṃ tasya prāyaścittaṃ pade pade /
GP12nardp1_u:13768: kāyena manasā vācā gurubhaktiparasya ca // NarP_1,63.122 //
GP12nardp1_u:13772: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde triṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13777: divyaṃ bhāvaṃ yato dadyātkṣiṇuyā dduritāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:13778: ato dīkṣeti sā proktā sarvāgamaviśāradaiḥ // NarP_1,64.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:13782: strīmantrāstu dviṭhāntāḥ syuḥ puṃmantrā huṃphaḍantakāḥ // NarP_1,64.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:13784: pundaivatāstu mantrā syurvidyāḥ strīdaivatā matāḥ // NarP_1,64.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:13788: agnīṣomātmakā hyevaṃ mantrā jñeyā manīṣibhiḥ // NarP_1,64.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:13790: saumayāścaiva prabudhyante vāme vahati māruteḥ // NarP_1,64.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:13795: japto yadi sa vai devaṃ prabuddhaḥ kṣiprasiddhidaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13796: anayā mālayā japto duṣṭamantro 'pi siddhyati // NarP_1,64.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:13797: krūre karmāṇi cāgneyāḥ saumyāḥ saumya phalapradāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13806: kumāro 'tha yuvā prauḍho vṛddho nistriṃśakastathā // NarP_1,64.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:13813: doṣā hyete samākhyātā vakṣyāmyeṣāṃ ca lakṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:13814: saṃyuktaṃ vā viyuktaṃ vā tridhā vā svarasaṃyutam // NarP_1,64.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:13816: caturddhā pañcadhā vāpi sa mantraśchinnasaṃjñakaḥ // NarP_1,64.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:13818: sa tu ruddho manujñeyo hyatiklaśena siddhidaḥ // NarP_1,64.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:13822: asau parāṅmukho jñeyo bhajatāṃ cirasiddhidaḥ // NarP_1,64.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:13824: sa mantro badhiraḥ proktaḥ kaṣṭenālpaphalapradaḥ // NarP_1,64.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:13826: netrahīnastu vijñeyaḥ kleśenāpi na siddhidaḥ // NarP_1,64.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:13828: haṃseṃdurvā sakāro vā phakāro varma vā puna // NarP_1,64.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:13829: māprā namāmi ca padaṃ nāsti yasminsa kīlitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13830: evaṃ madhye dvayaṃ mūrghni yasminnasralakārakau // NarP_1,64.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:13831: na vidyete sa mantrastu staṃbhitaḥ siddhirodhakṛt /
GP12nardp1_u:13832: agniḥ pavanasaṃyukto manoryasya tu mūrddhani // NarP_1,64.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:13833: sa sārṇo dṛśyate yastu sa mantro dagdhasaṃjñakaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13835: trastaḥ sa mantro vijñeyo mukhe tāravivarjitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13836: hakāraḥ śaktirathavā bhīto mantraḥ sa eva hi // NarP_1,64.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:13838: malinastu sa vijñeyo hyatikleśena siddhidaḥ // NarP_1,64.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:13839: dārṇo yasya manormadhye mūrdhni krodhayugaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:13840: asraṃ cāsti sa mantrastu tiraskṛta udīritaḥ // NarP_1,64.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13843: tryakṣaro haṃsahīno yaḥ suṣuptaḥ kīrtitastu saḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13846: yasya madhye sthitaṃ cāsraṃ sa mantro mūrcchitaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,64.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:13848: mantrasyādau ca madhye ca mūrdhni cāsracatuṣṭayam // NarP_1,64.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:13849: jñātavyo bhrānta ityeṣa yaḥ syādaṣṭā daśākṣaraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13850: punarviśativarṇo vā yo mantraḥ smarasaṃyutaḥ // NarP_1,64.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:13858: śikhā varma ca yasyānte netramasraṃ ca dṛśyate // NarP_1,64.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:13859: śiva śaktyārṇahīno vā nirbījaḥ sa manuḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13861: sa manuḥ siddhihīnaḥ syānmandaḥ paṅktyakṣaro manuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13862: kūṭa ekākṣaro mantraḥ sa evokto niraṃśakaḥ // NarP_1,64.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:13864: ṣaḍvarṇo bījahīno vā sārddhasaptākṣaro 'pi vā // NarP_1,64.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:13868: yo mantro dantavarṇastu mohitaḥ sa tu kīrtitaḥ // NarP_1,64.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:13870: kṣudhārtaḥ sa tu vijñeyo mantrasiddhivivarjitaḥ // NarP_1,64.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:13874: ekona triṃśadarṇo vā mantro hīnāṅgakaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,64.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:13878: vrīḍitaḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ sarvakarmasu na kṣamaḥ // NarP_1,64.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:13881: ye mantrāste tu vijñeyāḥ sthānabhraṣṭā munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:13882: trayodaśārṇā ye mantrāstithyarṇāśca tathā punaḥ // NarP_1,64.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:13884: śataṃ sārddhaśataṃ vāpi śatadvayamathāpi vā // NarP_1,64.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:13886: ye mantrā varṇasaṃkhyākā niḥsnehāste prakīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,64.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:13890: tadvarddhvaṃ caiva ye mantrāḥ stotrarūpāstu te smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,64.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:13891: evaṃ vidhāḥ samākhyātā manavo doṣa saṃyutāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13896: yaṃ kañcidapi vā mantraṃ tasya syuḥ sarvasiddhayaḥ // NarP_1,64.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:13897: savyapāṣṇi gude sthāpya dakṣiṇaṃ ca dhvajopari /
GP12nardp1_u:13900: tadagre sarahasyaṃ te kathayiṣyāmi nārada // NarP_1,64.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:13903: suṃdaraḥ sumukhaḥ śāntaḥ kulīnaḥ sulabho vaśī /
GP12nardp1_u:13906: tattvaniṣkāsane dakṣo vinayī ca suveṣavān // NarP_1,64.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:13915: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde catuḥṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13933: catuṣke cettadā pūrvaṃ yatra nāmākṣaraṃ sthitam // NarP_1,65.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:13937: tadā pūrvoktarītyā tu kramāddveyaṃ manīṣibhiḥ // NarP_1,65.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:13939: turīye ceñcatuṣke tu tadaivaṃ gaṇayetsudhīḥ // NarP_1,65.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:13949: anye 'pyatra prakārā hi saṃti vai bahavoṃ mune // NarP_1,65.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:13951: evaṃ saṃśodhya mantraṃ tu śuddhe kāle sthale tathā // NarP_1,65.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:13956: kṛtvā svasti vidhānaṃ tu maṇḍalādi ca tuṣṭimān /
GP12nardp1_u:13957: guruḥ śiṣyeṇa sahitaḥ śuciryāgagṛhaṃ viśet // NarP_1,65.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:13964: tatra saṃsthāpya vidhivattatra bhānoḥ kalāṃ yajet /
GP12nardp1_u:13969: vahnerdaśa kalāḥ proktāḥ procyante 'tha raveḥ kalāḥ // NarP_1,65.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:13971: suṣumṇā bhogadā viśvā bodhinī dhāriṇī kṣamā // NarP_1,65.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:13972: athendrośca kalā jñeyā hyamṛtā mānadā punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13973: pūṣā tuṣṭiśca puṣṭiśca ratiśca dhṛtisaṃjñikāḥ // NarP_1,65.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:13983: vedyāṃ saṃveśya saṃprokṣya prokṣaṇīsthena vāriṇā // NarP_1,65.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13985: nyāsajālena saṃśodhya mūrdhni vinyasya pallavān // NarP_1,65.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:13990: atha śiṣyasya śirasi hastaṃ datvā gurustataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13993: tataḥ sacandanaṃ hastaṃ datvā śiṣyasya mastake // NarP_1,65.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:14005: raviṃ śivāṃ śivaṃ caiva yadā madhye tu śaṅkaram // NarP_1,65.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:14006: raviṃ gaṇeśamaṃbāṃ ca hariṃ cātha yadā śivām /
GP12nardp1_u:14008: śivaṃ śivāṃ raviṃ viṣṇuṃ ravau madhyagate punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14009: gaṇeṣaṃ viṣṇumaṃbāṃ ca śivaṃ ceti yathākramam // NarP_1,65.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:14011: brāhme muhūrtte hyutthāya kṛtvācā vaśyakaṃ budhaḥ // NarP_1,65.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:14027: tatpadaṃ darśitaṃ yena tasmai śrīgurave namaḥ // NarP_1,65.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:14029: cakṣurunmīlitaṃ yena tasmai śrīgurave namaḥ // NarP_1,65.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:14031: yasya vāgamṛtaṃ hṝnti viṣaṃ saṃsārasaṃjñakam // NarP_1,65.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:14033: oṃ namaste nātha bhagavān śivāya gururūpiṇe // NarP_1,65.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:14045: iti stutvā tataḥ sarva gurave vinivedayet // NarP_1,65.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:14047: yatkaromi jagannātha tadastu tava pūjanam // NarP_1,65.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:14065: prātaḥ samutthāya tava priyārthaṃ saṃsārayātrāṃ tvanuvartayiṣye // NarP_1,65.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:14069: ajapākhyāṃ tu gāyatrīṃ jīvojapati sarvadā // NarP_1,65.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:14073: nirābhāsaśca dharmaśca jñānaṃ ceti tathā punaḥ // NarP_1,65.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:14089: saśriye ṣaṭsahasraṃ ca viṣṇave vinivedayet // NarP_1,65.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:14101: praramādye ca gurave sahasraṃ vinivedayet // NarP_1,65.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:14107: brahmaivāhaṃ na saṃsārī nityamukto na śokabhāk // NarP_1,65.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:14111: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde pañcaṣaṣṭimo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:14117: iti bhūmiṃ tu saṃprārthya vihareñca yathāvidhi // NarP_1,66.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:14119: gacchantu ṛṣayo devāḥ piśācā ye ca guhyakāḥ // NarP_1,66.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:14121: iti tālatrayaṃ datvā śiraḥ prāvṛtya vāsasā // NarP_1,66.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:14123: malaṃ visṛjya saucaṃ tu mṛdādbhiḥ samupācaret // NarP_1,66.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:14124: ekā liṅge gude tisro daśa vāmakare mṛdaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14125: karayoḥ sapta vai dadyātritrivaraṃ ca pādayoḥ // NarP_1,66.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:14128: āyurbalaṃ yaśo varcaḥ prajāḥ paśuvasūni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:14129: śriyaṃ prajñāṃ ca medhāṃ ca tvaṃ no dehi vanaspate // NarP_1,66.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:14135: devāgāraṃ tato gatvā nirmālyamapasārya ca // NarP_1,66.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:14137: asreṇa pātraṃ saṃprokṣya mūlena jvālayeñca tam // NarP_1,66.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:14141: iti nīrājanaṃ kṛtvā prārthayitvā nijeśvaram // NarP_1,66.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:14143: gatvā tīrthaṃ namaskṛtya snānīyaṃ ca nidhāya vai // NarP_1,66.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:14147: praviśya nābhimātre tu mṛdaṃ vāmakarasya ca // NarP_1,66.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:14148: maṇibandhe hastatale tadagre ca tathā punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14151: talasthāṃ ca ṣaḍaṅgeṣu tanmantraiḥ pravilepayet // NarP_1,66.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:14156: dhārāṃ ca brahmarandhreṇa praviśantīṃ nijāṃ tanum /
GP12nardp1_u:14159: tataḥ śrautoktavidhinā snātvā mantrī samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,66.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:14163: brahmāṇḍodaratīrthāni karaiḥ spṛṣṭāni te raveḥ // NarP_1,66.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:14164: tena satyena me deva dehi tīrthaṃ divākara // NarP_1,66.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:14165: gaṅge ca yamune caiva godāvari sarasvati /
GP12nardp1_u:14172: mūlena caikādaśadhā tatra saṃmantrya bhāvayet // NarP_1,66.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:14178: iti natvā samārundhya saptacchidrāṇi sādhakaḥ // NarP_1,66.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:14182: catvāro manavaste 'tra kathyante tāntrikā mune // NarP_1,66.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:14184: mātaraḥ sarvabhūtānāmāpo devyaḥ punantu mām // NarP_1,66.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:14186: kṣālayanti ca tāṃ sparśādāpo devyaḥ punantu mām // NarP_1,66.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:14187: yanme keśeṣu daurbhāgyaṃ sīmante yañca mūrddhani /
GP12nardp1_u:14190: santoṣaḥ kṣāntirāstikyaṃ vidyā bhavatu vo namaḥ // NarP_1,66.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:14192: pibeddhiruddhaṃ no kuryādeṣāṃ tu niyato vidhiḥ // NarP_1,66.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:14193: pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni dakṣāṅghrau tāni bhūsure /
GP12nardp1_u:14198: athavā bhasmanā snāto rajobhiścaiva vākṣamaḥ // NarP_1,66.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:14199: atha sandhyādikaṃ kuryān sthitvā caivāsane śubhe /
GP12nardp1_u:14200: keśavena tathā nārāyaṇena mādhavena ca // NarP_1,66.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:14210: hariṇā viṣṇunāṃsau ca vaiṣṇavācamanaṃ tvidam // NarP_1,66.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:14219: tilakaṃ ca tataḥ kuryādbhāle suṣṭhu gadākṛti /
GP12nardp1_u:14220: nandakaṃ hṛdaye śaṅkhacakre caiva bhujadvaye // NarP_1,66.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:14222: karṇamūle pārśvayośca pṛṣṭe nābhau kakudyapi // NarP_1,66.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:14224: agnihotrodbhavaṃ bhasma gṛhītvā tryaṃbakeṇa tu // NarP_1,66.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:14228: śaivaṃ śāktastrikoṇā bhaṃ nārīvadvā samācaret // NarP_1,66.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:14229: kṛtvā tu vaidikīṃ saṃdhyāṃ tāntrikīṃ ca samācaret /
GP12nardp1_u:14240: prakṣālyāntargataṃ tena kalmaṣaṃ tajjalaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,66.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:14244: tataśca hastau prakṣālya prāgvadācamya mantravit // NarP_1,66.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:14248: dattvārghaṃ triranenātha devaṃ ravigataṃ smaret // NarP_1,66.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:14255: varaṃ pāśaṃ ca śūlaṃ ca dadhānāṃ nṛkaroṭikām /
GP12nardp1_u:14261: gurupaṅktiṃ ca saṃtarpyaṃ sāṃgaṃ sāvaraṇaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:14264: viṣvaksena ca śaileyaṃ vaiṣṇavaḥ paritarpayet // NarP_1,66.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:14265: evaṃ saṃtarpya viprendra dattvārdhyaṃ ca vivasvate /
GP12nardp1_u:14270: sarasvatīṃ vāmabhāge dakṣe vighneśvaraṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,66.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:14271: kṣetrapālaṃ tathā vāme dakṣe gaṅgāṃ prapūjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:14272: vāme ca yamunāṃ dakṣe dhātāraṃ vāmatastathā // NarP_1,66.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:14278: vṛṣabhaśca mahākālaḥ śaivā vai dvārapālakāḥ // NarP_1,66.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:14279: brāhmayādyā mātaro 'ṣṭau tu śaktyo dvāḥsthitāḥ svayam /
GP12nardp1_u:14280: seṃduḥ svanāmāgharṇādyā ṅenamoṃtā ime smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,66.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:14288: śrīdharo medhayā yukto hṛṣīkiśaśca harṣayā // NarP_1,66.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:14293: śārṅgī tu prabhayā yuktaḥ khaḍgī yuktastu satyayā /
GP12nardp1_u:14296: pāśī virajayā yukto kuśī viśvāsamanvitaḥ // NarP_1,66.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:14298: nindī smṛtyā samāyukto naro vṛddhyā samanvitaḥ // NarP_1,66.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:14300: kṛṣṇo buddhyā yutaḥ satyo bhuktyā muktyātha sātvataḥ // NarP_1,66.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:14304: balī tu parayā yukto balānujaparāyaṇe // NarP_1,66.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:14306: haṃsaḥ prabhāsamāyukto varāho niśayā yutaḥ // NarP_1,66.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:14307: vimalo dhārayā yukto nṛsiṃho vidyutā yutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14309: amṛtādyā ca gāyatrī chando viṣṇuśca devatā /
GP12nardp1_u:14316: eka maulau mukhe caika dvika netre dvikaṃ śrutau // NarP_1,66.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:14317: nasordvayaṃ kapole ca dvayaṃ dve dviradacchade /
GP12nardp1_u:14318: ekaṃ tu rasanāmūle grīvāyāmekameva ca // NarP_1,66.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:14320: ṭatavargauṃ pādayostu paphau kuṅkṣidvaye nyaset // NarP_1,66.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:14321: pṛṣṭhavaṃśe vamityuktaṃ nābhau bhaṃ hṛdaye tu mam /
GP12nardp1_u:14322: yādisaptāpi dhātusthā haṃ prāṇe laṃ tathātmani // NarP_1,66.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:14323: kṣaṃ krodhe kramato nyasya viṣṇu pūjākṣamo bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:14324: pūrṇodaryā tu śrīkaṇṭho hyananto vijarānvitaḥ // NarP_1,66.106 //
GP12nardp1_u:14331: akrūra āsyayā yukto mahāseno vidyayā yutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14348: śvetorasko vidāriṇyā bhṛguḥ sahajayā yutaḥ // NarP_1,66.118 //
GP12nardp1_u:14351: yatra svīśapadaṃ noktaṃ tatra sarvatra yojayet /
GP12nardp1_u:14354: halo bījāni coktāni svarāḥ śaktaya īritāḥ // NarP_1,66.121 //
GP12nardp1_u:14360: vighneśaśca hriyā yukto vighnarājaḥ śriyā yutaḥ // NarP_1,66.124 //
GP12nardp1_u:14364: kāntyā yukto dvidantastu kāminyā gajavakrakaḥ // NarP_1,66.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:14381: muṃhī subhagayā yuktaḥ khaḍgī durbhagayā yutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14388: ṣaḍdīrghāḍhyena bījena kṛtvāṅgāni tataḥ smaret // NarP_1,66.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:14390: patnyāśliṣṭaṃ raktatanuṃ trinetraṃ gaṇape bhavet // NarP_1,66.139 //
GP12nardp1_u:14392: nivṛttiśca pratiṣṭhā ca vidyā śāntistatedhikāḥ // NarP_1,66.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:14393: dīpikā recikā cāpi mocikā ca parābhidhā /
GP12nardp1_u:14396: smṛtirmedhā tataḥ kāntirlakṣmīrddhṛtiḥ sthirā sthitiḥ // NarP_1,66.142 //
GP12nardp1_u:14398: kāmiko varadā vātha hlādinī prītisaṃyutā // NarP_1,66.143 //
GP12nardp1_u:14399: dīrghā tīkṣṇā tathā raudrā proktā nidrā ca tandrikā /
GP12nardp1_u:14400: kṣudhā ca krodhinī paścākriyākārī samṛtyukā // NarP_1,66.144 //
GP12nardp1_u:14411: namaḥ svāhā vaṣaṭ huṃ vauṣaṭ phaṭ jātaya īritāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14414: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge buhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde saṃdhyādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:14418: trikoṇaṃ caturasraṃ vā vāmabhāge prakalpya ca // NarP_1,67.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:14419: sampūjyā sreṇa saṃkṣālya hṛdādhāraṃ nidhāya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:14420: tatrāgnimaṇḍalaṃ cedvā pātraṃ saṃkṣālya cāsrataḥ // NarP_1,67.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:14433: netraṃ madhye dikṣu cāsraṃ trikoṇe pūjayettataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14441: tāraḥ kārṃmamahāṃste tu tato jalacarāya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:14442: varma phaṭ hṛdayaṃ pāñcajanyāya hṛdayaṃ maneḥ // NarP_1,67.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:14454: cintayitveṣṭadevaṃ ca tato mudrāḥ pradarśayet // NarP_1,67.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:14457: gāruḍī gālinī caiva mukhye mudre prakīrtite /
GP12nardp1_u:14471: jātīphalaṃ ca kaṅkolaṃ lavaṅgaṃ ca jalānvitam /
GP12nardp1_u:14478: vidhinā sthāpitāyāṃ vā pratimāyāṃ prapūjayet // NarP_1,67.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:14480: nirmitā śubhadā gehe pūjanāya dine dine // NarP_1,67.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:14481: vakrāṃ dagdhāṃ khaṇḍitāṃ ca bhinnamūrddhadṛśaṃ punanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14482: spaṣṭāṃ vāpya ntyajādyaiśca pratimāṃ naiva pūjayet // NarP_1,67.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:14484: mūlena mūrtiṃ saṃkalpya dhyātvā devaṃ yathoditam // NarP_1,67.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:14490: taveyaṃ hi mahāmūrtistasyāṃ tvāṃ sarvagaṃ prabho /
GP12nardp1_u:14495: sāṃnidhyaṃ kuru tasyāṃ tvaṃ bhaktānugrāhakāraka // NarP_1,67.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:14499: mūrtauṃ vā yajñasaṃpūrtyai sthito bhava maheśvara // NarP_1,67.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:14501: svatejaḥ pañjareṇāśu veṣṭito bhava sarvataḥ // NarP_1,67.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:14503: tasmai te parameśāya svāgataṃ svāgataṃ ca me // NarP_1,67.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:14507: tasmai me paraṇābjāya pādyaṃ śuddhāya kalpyate // NarP_1,67.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:14513: madhuparkamidaṃ deva kalpayāmi prasīda me // NarP_1,67.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:14520: sahasraṃ vā śataṃ vāpi yathāśaktyādareṇa ca // NarP_1,67.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:14527: tailādidūṣitaṃ jīrṇaṃ sacchidraṃ malinaṃ tyajet // NarP_1,67.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:14529: yajñasūtrāya tasmai te yajñasūtraṃ prakalpaye // NarP_1,67.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:14533: gṛhāṇa parama gandha kṛpayā parameśvara // NarP_1,67.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:14537: ketakīṃ kuṭajaṃ kundaṃ bandhūkaṃ kesaraṃ japām /
GP12nardp1_u:14540: śaktau dūrvārkamandārān gaṇeśe tulasīṃ tyajet // NarP_1,67.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:14544: kadalī badarī dhātrī tintiṇī bījapūrakam // NarP_1,67.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:14546: eteṣāṃ tu phalaiḥ kuryāddevatāpūjanaṃ budhaḥ // NarP_1,67.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:14547: śuṣkaistu nārcayeddevaṃ patraiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalairapi // NarP_1,67.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:14549: chinnabhinnānyapi mune na dūṣyāṇi jagurbudhāḥ // NarP_1,67.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:14551: sarvadā tulasī śuddhā bilvapatrāṇi vai tathā // NarP_1,67.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:14557: āghreyaṃ devadeveśa dhūpaṃ bhaktyā gṛhāma me // NarP_1,67.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:14560: annaṃ caturvidhaṃ svādu rasaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ samanvitam /
GP12nardp1_u:14561: bhaktyā gṛhāṇa me deva naivedyantuṣṭidaṃsadā // NarP_1,67.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:14566: saiva prācī tu vijñeyā tato 'nyā vidiśo daśa // NarP_1,67.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:14581: idro vahniryamo rakṣo varuṇaḥ pavano vidhuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14584: vājī vṛṣo haṃsakūrmauṃ vāhanāni vidurbudhāḥ // NarP_1,67.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:14585: vajraṃ śaktiṃ daṇḍakhaḍgau pāśāṃ kuśagadā api /
GP12nardp1_u:14590: dakṣiṇe sthaṇḍilaṃ kṛtvā tatra saṃskāramācaret // NarP_1,67.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:14598: devaṃ saṃyojayenmūrtauṃ tato vahniṃ visarjayet // NarP_1,67.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:14600: karmāntare 'pi saṃprāpte sānnidhyaṃ kuru sādaram // NarP_1,67.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:14608: ityaṣṭadikṣu datvā ca punarbhūtabaliṃ caret // NarP_1,67.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:14617: japtvā mantraṃ yathāśakti devatāyai nivedayet // NarP_1,67.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:14619: siddhirbhavatu me deva tvatprasādāttvayi sthitā // NarP_1,67.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:14620: tataḥ parāṅmukhaṃ cārghaṃ kṛtvā puṣpaiḥ prapūjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:14622: manasā vacasā ceti praṇāmo 'ṣṭāṅga īritaḥ // NarP_1,67.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:14623: bāhubhyāṃ ca sajānubhyāṃ śirasā vacasāpi vā /
GP12nardp1_u:14630: vācā hastābhyāṃ ca padbhyā mudareṇa tataḥ param // NarP_1,67.107 //
GP12nardp1_u:14632: tatsarvaṃ ca tato brahmarpaṇaṃ bhavatu ṭhadvayam // NarP_1,67.108 //
GP12nardp1_u:14633: māṃ madīyaṃ ca sakalaṃ viṣṇave ca samarpaye /
GP12nardp1_u:14641: tatsarvaṃ tāvakī pūjā bhūyādbhūtyai ca me prabho /
GP12nardp1_u:14644: anyathā śaraṇaṃ nāsti tvameva śaraṇaṃ mama // NarP_1,67.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:14647: dāso 'yamiti māṃ matvā kṣamasva jagatāṃ pate /
GP12nardp1_u:14648: āvāhanaṃ na jānāmi na jānāmi visarjanam // NarP_1,67.116 //
GP12nardp1_u:14649: pūjāṃ caiva na jānāmi tvaṃ gatiḥ parameśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:14650: saṃprārthyaivaṃ tato mantrī mūlānte ślokamuñcaret // NarP_1,67.117 //
GP12nardp1_u:14651: gaccha gaccha paraṃ sthānaṃ jagadīśa jaganmaya /
GP12nardp1_u:14652: yanna brahmādayo devā jānanti ca sadāśivaḥ // NarP_1,67.118 //
GP12nardp1_u:14654: nidhāya devaṃ sāṃgaṃ ca svīyadṛtsarasīruhe // NarP_1,67.119 //
GP12nardp1_u:14661: agrāhyaṃ śivanirmālyaṃ patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ jalam // NarP_1,67.123 //
GP12nardp1_u:14663: pūjā pañcavidhā tatra kathitā nāradākhilaiḥ // NarP_1,67.124 //
GP12nardp1_u:14664: āturī sautikī trāsī sādhanā bhāvinī tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:14665: daurbodhī ca kramādāsāṃ lakṣaṇāni śṛṇuṣaava me // NarP_1,67.125 //
GP12nardp1_u:14666: rogādiyukto na srāyānna japenna ca pūjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:14667: vilokya pūjāṃ devasya mūrtiṃ vā sūryyamaṇḍalam // NarP_1,67.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:14669: roge nivṛtte snātvātha natvā saṃpūñcedgurum // NarP_1,67.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:14671: pūjāvicchedadoṣo me māstviti prārthayecca tam // NarP_1,67.128 //
GP12nardp1_u:14672: dvijānapi ca saṃpūjya yathāśaktyā pratoṣya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:14675: sūtakaṃ dvividhaṃ proktaṃ jātākhyaṃ mṛtasaṃjñakam // NarP_1,67.130 //
GP12nardp1_u:14676: tatra snātvā mānasīṃ tu kṛtvā saṃdhyāṃ samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14678: nivṛtte sūtake prāgvatsaṃpūjya ca guruṃ dvijān /
GP12nardp1_u:14680: eṣā tu sautikī proktā trāsī cātha nigadyate /
GP12nardp1_u:14684: puṣpaiḥ patraiḥ phalairvāpi manasā vā yajedvibhum /
GP12nardp1_u:14685: sādhanābhāvinī hyeṣā daurbodhīṃ śṛṇu nārada // NarP_1,67.135 //
GP12nardp1_u:14686: striyo vṛddhā stathā bālā mūrkhāstaistu yathākramam /
GP12nardp1_u:14687: yathājñānakṛtā sā tu daurbodhīti prakīrtitā // NarP_1,67.136 //
GP12nardp1_u:14689: devapūjāvihīno yaḥ sa gacchennarakaṃ dhruvam // NarP_1,67.137 //
GP12nardp1_u:14691: deve niveditaṃ paścādbhuñjīta svagaṇaiḥ svayam // NarP_1,67.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:14695: na sāṃgaśayikaṃ tasya durmaterjāyate phalam // NarP_1,67.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:14696: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde devapūjānirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaṣaṣṭittamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:14704: sarvānte janamuñcārya tato me vaśamānaya // NarP_1,68.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:14709: ṛṣiṃ śirasi vakre tu chandaśca hṛdi devatām /
GP12nardp1_u:14710: guhye bījaṃ padoḥ śaktiṃ nyasetsādhakasattamaḥ // NarP_1,68.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:14711: ṣaḍdīrghāḍhyena bījena yaṃ ca bījādinā punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14714: gāmādyaṃ caiva bhūrlokaṃ nābhyantaṃ pādayornyaset // NarP_1,68.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:14715: gīmādyaṃ ca bhuvarlokaṃ kaṇṭhāntaṃ nābhito nyaset /
GP12nardp1_u:14720: kṣāntaṃ vinyasya mūlena vyāpakaṃ racayetsudhīḥ // NarP_1,68.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:14724: bhāladeśe mukhe kaṇṭhe hṛdi nābhyūrujānuṣu // NarP_1,68.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:14728: tanno dantiḥ pracovarṇā dayāditi vadetpunaḥ // NarP_1,68.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:14730: evaṃ nyāsavidhiṃ kṛtvā dhyāyedevaṃ hṛdaṃbuje // NarP_1,68.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:14740: bhūpuraṃ tadbahiḥ kṛtvā gameśaṃ tatra pūjayet // NarP_1,68.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:14742: agrā tejovatī satyā navamī vidhnanāśinī // NarP_1,68.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:14747: śriyaṃ śriyaḥ patiṃ caiva gaurīṃ gaurī patiṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:14748: ratiṃ ratipatiṃ pāścānmahīpūrva ca potriṇam // NarP_1,68.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:14766: keśareṣu ṣaḍaṅgāni patreṣvaṣṭau tu mātaraḥ // NarP_1,68.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:14776: godugdhena gavāṃ lābho dadhnā sarvasamṛddhimān // NarP_1,68.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:14778: vāsāṃsi labhate hutvā kusuṃbhakusumaiḥ śubhaiḥ // NarP_1,68.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:14780: mūlenādau caturvāraṃ pratyekaṃ ca pratarpayet // NarP_1,68.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:14784: devena sahitāṃ śaktiṃ śaktyā ca sahitaṃ tu tam // NarP_1,68.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:14798: ardhyaṃ dadyāttu mūlānte ṅeṃte gaṇapatiṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,68.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:14800: stutvā natvā visṛjyātha yajeccandramasaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,68.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:14804: evaṃ vrataṃ yaḥ kurute samyaksaṃvatsarāvadhi // NarP_1,68.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:14808: evaṃ kṛte 'pi pūrvoktaṃ phalamāpnoti niścitam // NarP_1,68.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:14814: dyūte vivāde samare vyavahāre jayaṃ labhet // NarP_1,68.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:14815: bījaṃ varāho binddhāḍhyau manvindvānnau kalau tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14822: padaiḥ sarvaṇa mantreṇa pañcāṅgāni prakalpayet // NarP_1,68.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:14828: vakratuṇḍābhidho bījaṃ vaṃ śaktiḥ kavacaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,68.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:14830: kṛtvā ṣaḍaṅgamantrārṇānbhrūmadhye ca gale hṛdi // NarP_1,68.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:14831: nāmau liṅge pade nyasyākhilena vyāpakaṃ caret /
GP12nardp1_u:14836: mūrtiṃ mūrtena saṃkalpya tasyāmāvāhya pūjayet // NarP_1,68.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:14838: yajedvidyāṃ vidhātrīṃ ca bhogadāṃ vipraghātinīm // NarP_1,68.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:14846: brahmacārī haviṣyāśī satyavāk ca jitendriyaḥ // NarP_1,68.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:14848: dāridṣaṃ tu parābhūya jāyate dhanadopamaḥ // NarP_1,68.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:14850: aṣṭottaraśataṃ nityaṃ hutvā prāgvatphalaṃ labhet // NarP_1,68.76/
GP12nardp1_u:14852: apūpairvatsare sa syātsamṛddheḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,68.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:14854: haviṣā pā yasānnena naivedyaṃ parikalpayet // NarP_1,68.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:14861: vacāṃ niṣkārddhabhāgaṃ ca tadarddhaṃ vā manuṃ japet /
GP12nardp1_u:14862: viśodhya cūrṇaṃ prasṛtau gavāṃ mūtre vinikṣipet // NarP_1,68.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:14878: sakalaṃ pravadedevaṃ kumārī vā kumārakaḥ // NarP_1,68.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:14880: anye 'pi mantrā devarṣe santi tantre gaṇeśituḥ // NarP_1,68.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:14881: kintvatra yanna sādhyaṃ syātrriṣu lokeṣu sādhakaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14884: śaṭhebhyaḥ paraśiṣyebhyo vañcakebhyo 'pi mā vada // NarP_1,68.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:14887: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde gaṇeśamantravidhānanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:14895: devabhāgo muniśchando gāyatrī devatā raviḥ // NarP_1,69.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:14897: satyāya hṛdayaṃ paścādbrahmaṇe śira īritam // NarP_1,69.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:14900: netro jvālā mano huṃ phaṭsvāhāntā manavo gaṇāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14901: punaḥ ṣaḍarṇairhrī lakṣmyāḥ kṛtvāntaḥ sthaiḥ ṣaḍaṅgakam // NarP_1,69.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:14903: ādityaṃ ca raviṃ paścādbhānuṃ bhāskarameva ca // NarP_1,69.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:14904: sūryaṃ ca mūrdhni vadane hṛdi guhye ca pādayoḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14925: bhrūmadhye ca tathā bhāle brahmaraṅghre nyasetkramāt // NarP_1,69.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:14933: prathamaṃ pīṭhayajane dharmādīnāṃ sthale yajet // NarP_1,69.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:14937: dīptā sūkṣmā jayā bhadrā vibhūtirvimalā tathā // NarP_1,69.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:14940: svarā bījāni śaktīnāṃ tadādyāḥ pūjayettuḥ tāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14945: navārṇāya ca manave mūrtiṃ saṃkalpayetsudhīḥ // NarP_1,69.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:14948: saṃpūjya madhye vādityaṃ raviṃ bhānuṃ ca bhāskaram /
GP12nardp1_u:14951: uṣāṃ prajñāṃ prabhāṃ saṃdhyāṃ tato brahmādikānyajet // NarP_1,69.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:14952: purato 'ruṇamabhyarcya somaṃ jñaṃ ca guruṃ bhṛgum /
GP12nardp1_u:14957: samāhito dineśāya dadyādardhyaṃ dine dine // NarP_1,69.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:14959: vidhāya maṇḍalaṃ bhānoḥ pīṭhaṃ pūrvavadarcayet // NarP_1,69.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:14965: kuṅkumaṃ rojanāṃ rājīṃ candanaṃ raktacandanam // NarP_1,69.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:14971: sudhābījaṃ candanena dakṣe karatale likhet // NarP_1,69.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:14976: dṛṣṭiṃ cādhāya manasā pūjayitvā raviṃ punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14977: sādhakena svakaikyena mūlamantraṃ dhiyā japan // NarP_1,69.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:14979: dattvā puṣpāñjaliṃ bhūyo japedaṣṭottaraṃ śatam // NarP_1,69.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:14981: tena tuṣṭo dineśo 'smai dadyādvittaṃ yaśaḥ sukham // NarP_1,69.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:14987: evaṃ manuṃ japanvipro duḥkhaṃ naivāpnuyātkvacit // NarP_1,69.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:14995: chandaḥ paṅktistu somo 'sya devatā parikīrtitā // NarP_1,69.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:15004: rohiṇī kṛttikā caiva revatī bharaṇī puraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15005: rātrirārdrā tato jyetsnā kalā hārasamaprabhā // NarP_1,69.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:15019: paścime maṇḍale sthitvā pūjādravyaṃ ca madhyame // NarP_1,69.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:15049: ityeka rviśatiḥ proktā mūrtayo bhūsutasya vai // NarP_1,69.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:15060: ācamya deśakālau ca smṛtvā kāmya samuccaran /
GP12nardp1_u:15063: dharātmajaṃ nasorakṣṇoḥ kujaṃ bhaumaṃ lalāṭake // NarP_1,69.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:15065: aṅgārakaṃ śikhāyāṃ ca sarvāṅge ca mahīsutam // NarP_1,69.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:15070: nābhau hṛdi śirasyāraṃ vakre bhūmijameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:15077: trikoṇeṣu ca sampūjya bahiraṣṭau ca mātṛkāḥ // NarP_1,69.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:15082: maṅgalāya tato mantrī idaṃ mantradvayaṃ paṭhet // NarP_1,69.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:15084: sutārthinī prapannā tvāṃ gṛhāṇārdhyaṃ namo 'stu te // NarP_1,69.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:15086: mahīsuta mahābhāga gṛhāṇārdhyaṃ namo 'stu te // NarP_1,69.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:15090: kumāraṃ śaktihastaṃ ca maṅgalaṃ praṇamāmyaham // NarP_1,69.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:15100: saubhāgyasukhado nityaṃ bhava me dharaṇīsuta // NarP_1,69.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:15106: āpnuvanti śivaṃ sarve sadā pūrṇamanorathāḥ // NarP_1,69.108 //
GP12nardp1_u:15108: prāpnuvanti sukhaṃ tasmai namo dharaṇisūnave // NarP_1,69.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:15110: pūjitaḥ sukhasaubhāgyaṃ tasmai kṣmāsūnave namaḥ // NarP_1,69.110 //
GP12nardp1_u:15129: bhaumasyaiṣā tu gāyatrī japtuḥ sarveṣṭasiddhidā // NarP_1,69.120 //
GP12nardp1_u:15131: phaāntaḥ karṇendusaṃyukto budho ṅeṃte hadantimaḥ // NarP_1,69.121 //
GP12nardp1_u:15133: paṅktiśchaido devatā tu budhaḥ sarveṣṭado nṛṇām // NarP_1,69.122 //
GP12nardp1_u:15135: vande budhaṃ sadā bhaktyā pītāmbaravibhūṣaṇam // NarP_1,69.123 //
GP12nardp1_u:15142: tasyāśu grahajā pīḍā naśyatyeva na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15151: lakṣaṃ japo daśāṃśena ghṛtenānnena vā hunet // NarP_1,69.131 //
GP12nardp1_u:15153: evaṃ siddhe manau mantrī sādhayediṣṭamātmanaḥ // NarP_1,69.132 //
GP12nardp1_u:15157: sa viṃśatiśataṃ śīghraṃ vāsāṃsi labhate mahīm // NarP_1,69.134 //
GP12nardp1_u:15159: vasraṃ me dehi śukrāya ṭhadvayānto dhruvādikaḥ // NarP_1,69.135 //
GP12nardp1_u:15161: daityejyo devatā bījaṃ dhruvaḥ śaktirvasupriyā // NarP_1,69.136 //
GP12nardp1_u:15165: ayutaṃ prajapenmantraṃ daśāṃśaṃ juhuyād ghṛtaiḥ // NarP_1,69.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:15169: manavo 'mo sadā gopyā na deyā yasya kasyacit // NarP_1,69.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:15170: bhaktiyuktāya śiṣyāya deyā vā nijasūnave // NarP_1,69.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:15171: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde mantravidhānanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:15179: aṣṭākṣaro manuścāsya sādhyo nārāyaṇo muniḥ // NarP_1,70.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:15180: chandaḥ proktaṃ ca gāyatrī devatā viṣṇukhyayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15181: oṃ bījaṃ yaṃ ca tathā śaktirviniyogo 'khilāptaye // NarP_1,70.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:15183: vīrolkāya śikhā proktā dyulkāya kavacaṃ matam // NarP_1,70.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:15193: gale nābhau hṛdi kucapārśvapṛṣṭeṣu tatparāḥ // NarP_1,70.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:15203: athavā vai namontena nyasedityapare jaguḥ // NarP_1,70.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:15208: pāde liṅge hṛdi mukhe mūrdhni vakṣasi hṛtsthale /
GP12nardp1_u:15219: kakudyapi nyasenmantrī mūrtīrdvādaśa vai kramāt // NarP_1,70.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:15220: dhātrā tu keśavaṃ nyasyāryamṇa nārāyaṇaṃ punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15221: mitreṇa mādhavaṃ nyasya govindaṃ varuṇena ca // NarP_1,70.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:15224: vāmanaṃ ca tathādraṇa pūṣṇā śrīdharameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:15226: tvaṣṭrā yutaṃ padmanābhaṃ dāmodaraṃ ca viṣṇunā /
GP12nardp1_u:15227: dvādasārṇaṃ tato mantraṃ samaste śirasi nyaset // NarP_1,70.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:15231: pītāṃbarānte śrīvatsāṃ kitavakṣaḥ sthaleti ca // NarP_1,70.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:15235: evaṃ nyāsavidhiṃ kṛtvā dhyāyennārāyaṇaṃ vibhum // NarP_1,70.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:15241: prathamena tu lakṣeṇa svātmaśuddhirbhaved dhruvam // NarP_1,70.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:15245: tathā ca nirmalaṃ jñānaṃ pañcalakṣajapādbhavet // NarP_1,70.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:15249: evaṃ japtvā tataḥ prājño daśāṃśaṃ sarasīruhaiḥ // NarP_1,70.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:15252: vimalotkarṣiṇī jñānā kriyā yogā tataḥ parā /
GP12nardp1_u:15253: prahvī satyā tatheśānanugrahā navamī matā // NarP_1,70.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:15254: tāro namano bhagavate viṣṇave sarvabhū tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15255: tātmane vāsudevāya sarvātmeti padaṃ vadet // NarP_1,70.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:15259: ādau cāṅgāni saṃpūjya mantrāṇāṃ keśareṣu ca // NarP_1,70.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:15272: raktaṃ vighnaṃ tathāgneye śyāmamāryaṃ ca rākṣase /
GP12nardp1_u:15273: durgāṃ śyāmāṃ vāyukoṇe senānyaṃ pītamaiśvare // NarP_1,70.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:15282: bhāratyā sahitaṃ yo vai dhyāyeddvevaṃ parātparam /
GP12nardp1_u:15285: śaśtraṃ saṃmantrya mantreṇa śabrūnhatvā nivartate // NarP_1,70.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:15289: gāruḍena ca saṃyojya pañcārṇena japettadā // NarP_1,70.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:15301: śanaiśvara dine samyak spṛṣṭvā śvatthaṃ ca pāṇinā // NarP_1,70.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:15303: pañcaviṃśatidhā japtvā nityaṃ prātaḥ pibejjalam // NarP_1,70.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:15309: medhāṃ kavitvaṃ vāksiddhiṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,70.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:15317: tāro hṛdbhagavān ṅeṃto vāsudevāya kīrtitaḥ // NarP_1,70.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:15321: devatā vāsudevastu bījaṃ śaktirdhruvaśca hṛt // NarP_1,70.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:15323: mūrdhni bhāle dṛśorāsye gale dorhṛdaye punaḥ // NarP_1,70.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:15324: kukṣau nābhau dhvaje jānudvaye pādadvaye tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:15327: pādādārabhya mūrddhānaṃ nyāsaṃ saṃhārakaṃ viduḥ // NarP_1,70.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:15329: bīvaṃ prāṇaṃ tathā cittaṃ hṛtpadmaṃ sūryamaṇḍalam // NarP_1,70.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:15331: saṃkarṣaṇaṃ ca pradyumnamaniruddhaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,70.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:15337: pīṭhe pūrvodite mantrī mūrti saṃkalpya mūlataḥ // NarP_1,70.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:15341: tṛtīyāvaraṇe pūjyāḥ proktā dvādaśa mūrtayaḥ // NarP_1,70.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:15348: tāraḥ kāmo ramā paścān ṅeṃtaḥ syātpuruṣottamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15350: brahmā muniḥ syādgāyatrī chandaḥ prokto 'tha devatā /
GP12nardp1_u:15363: evamārādhya deveśaṃ prāpnoti mahatīṃ śriyam // NarP_1,70.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:15364: putrānpautrānyaśaḥ kāntiṃ bhuktiṃ muktiṃ ca vindati /
GP12nardp1_u:15367: śrīkārākhyo hariḥ prokto devatā sakaleṣṭadaḥ // NarP_1,70.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:15375: bāhuyugme tathā bāhūṃrājanya iti vinyaset // NarP_1,70.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:15377: nyasetpādadvaye mantrī padbhyāṃ śūdro ajāyata // NarP_1,70.102 //

GP12nardp1_u:15918: bījaṃ varāharūpāya tāro bīja nṛsiṃhataḥ // NarP_1,71.153 //
GP12nardp1_u:15919: rūpāya tāra svaṃ bījaṃ vāmanānte ca rūpataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15921: bījaṃ kṛṣṇāya tārānte bījaṃ ca kalkine tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15922: jayadvayaṃ tataḥ śālagrāmānte ca nivāsine // NarP_1,71.155 //

GP12nardp1_u:15996: niviṣṭavahnijāyānte svadhā caiva tato vaṣaṭ // NarP_1,71.192 //
GP12nardp1_u:16003: astratāro 'cyutāstraṃ ca tāro vācā sudeva phaṭ /

GP12nardp1_u:16006: māyāviśvātmane ṣaṭ ca tāraḥ saucaṃ turātmane // NarP_1,71.197 //
GP12nardp1_u:16009: hraḥ hiraṇaayagarbharūpa dhāraṇānte ca phaṭ dhruvaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:16011: kṣaiṃ nṛsiṃharūpadhārin oṃ klaṃ ślaśca svarādikaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:16014: tāro varmatrayaṃ saṃkaraṃ vaṃ cāmukamastakam // NarP_1,71.201 //
GP12nardp1_u:16017: ṣaḍdīrghāḍyāṃ svabījaṃ ca kṣapitānte tu kalmaṣa /
GP12nardp1_u:16020: nṛsiṃhānte tataḥ kālātmane svāhā dhruvastataḥ // NarP_1,71.204 //
