GP12nardp1_u:23287: śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ mahat /
GP12nardp1_u:23302: narakoddhārakaṃ karma gaditaṃ ca tataḥ param // NarP_1,94.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23312: tatastu yauvane proktā līlā dvāravatībhavā // NarP_1,94.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:23317: kalijaṃ caritaṃ proktaṃ cāturvidhyaṃ layasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:23320: ataḥ paraṃ tu sūtena śaunakādibhirādarāt // NarP_1,94.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:23322: nānādharmakathāḥ puṇyā vratāni niyamā yamāḥ // NarP_1,94.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23328: yo naraḥ paṭhate bhaktyā yaḥ śṛṇoti ca sādaram // NarP_1,94.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:23330: tallikhitvā ca yo dadyādāṣāḍhyāṃ ghṛtadhenunā // NarP_1,94.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:23332: sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma vimānenārkavarcasā // NarP_1,94.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:23335: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde viṣṇupurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturnavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23343: sargādilakṣaṇaṃ yatra proktaṃ vipra savistaram // NarP_1,95.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:23344: manvantareṣu vaṃśāśca rājñāṃ ye yatra kīrtitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23349: vratādīnāṃ ca pūrvo 'yaṃ vibhāgaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ // NarP_1,95.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:23351: śivasya saṃhitoktā vai vistareṇa munīśvara // NarP_1,95.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:23353: sa tu sarvātmanā yasyāstīre tiṣṭhati saṃtatam // NarP_1,95.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23354: idaṃ brahmā hārīridaṃ sākṣāccedaṃ paro haraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23355: idaṃ brahma nirākāraṃ kaivalyaṃ narmadājalam // NarP_1,95.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:23358: ye vasaṃtyuttare kūle rudrasyānucarā hi te /
GP12nardp1_u:23359: vasaṃti yāmyatīre ye lokaṃ te yānti vaiṣṇavam // NarP_1,95.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:23361: saṃgamāḥ pañca ca triṃśannadīnāṃ pāpanāśanī // NarP_1,95.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:23365: catuḥśatāni tīrthāni prasiddhāni ca saṃti hi // NarP_1,95.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:23367: saṃti cānyāni revāyāstīrayugme pade pade // NarP_1,95.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:23371: śrāvaṇyāṃ yo dadedbhaktyā brāhmaṇāya kuṭuṃbine // NarP_1,95.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:23374: niyamena haviṣyāśī sa rudro nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23376: so 'pi sarvapurāṇasya phalaṃ śravaṇajaṃ labhet // NarP_1,95.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:23377: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde vāyupurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23385: tatra tu prathamaskandhe sūtarṣīṇāṃ samāgame // NarP_1,96.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:23386: vyāsasya caritaṃ puṇyaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:23391: dvitīyo 'yaṃ samuditaḥ skandho vyāsena dhīmatā // NarP_1,96.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:23395: satyāścaritamādau tu dhruvasya caritaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,96.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23397: ityeṣa turyo gadito visarge skandha uttamaḥ // NarP_1,96.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:23399: brahmāṇḍāntargatānāṃ ca lokānāṃ varṇanaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,96.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:23411: kṛṣṇasya bālacaritaṃ kaumāraṃ ca vrajasthitiḥ // NarP_1,96.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:23413: bhūbhāraharaṇaṃ cātra nirodhe daśamaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,96.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:23419: saurī vibhūtiruditā sātvatī ca tataḥ param // NarP_1,96.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:23421: ityevaṃ kathitaṃ vatsa śrīmadbhāgavataṃ tava // NarP_1,96.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:23429: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde śrīmadbhāgavatānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṇṇavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23445: purāṇalakṣaṇaṃ caiva pramāṇaṃ dānameva ca // NarP_1,97.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:23451: asyottare vibhāge tu praśna ekādaśīvrate // NarP_1,97.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:23461: prabhāsasya ca māhātmyaṃ puṣkarākhyānakaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,97.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:23467: mohinīcaritaṃ paścādevaṃ paścādevaṃ vai nāradīyakam // NarP_1,97.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23469: sa yāti brahmaṇo dhāma nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,97.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:23474: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde nāradīyapurāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma saptanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23478: purāṇaṃ sumahatpuṇyaṃ paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ sadā // NarP_1,98.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:23492: manūnāṃ ca kathā nānākīrtitāḥ pāpahārikāḥ // NarP_1,98.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23497: khanitrasya tataḥ proktā kathā puṇyā mahātmanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23502: pururavaḥ kathā puṇyā nahuṣasya kathādbhutā // NarP_1,98.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:23508: yaḥ śṛṇoti naro bhaktyā purāṇamidamādarāt // NarP_1,98.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:23510: yastu vyākurute caitacchaivaṃ sa labhate padam // NarP_1,98.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:23512: kārtikyāṃ dvijavaryāya sa labhendbrahmaṇaḥ padam // NarP_1,98.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23515: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23521: paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva sarvapāpaharaṃ nṛṇām // NarP_1,99.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:23529: nyāsādīnāṃ vidhānaṃ ca pratiṣṭhāpūrtakaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,99.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:23534: jyotiṣaṃ ca tataḥ proktaṃ śāstraṃ yuddhajayārṇavam /
GP12nardp1_u:23535: ṣaṭkarma ca tataḥ proktaṃ mantramantrauṣadhīgaṇaḥ // NarP_1,99.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:23553: gajādīnāṃ cikitsā ca teṣāṃ śāntistataḥ param // NarP_1,99.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23559: varṇanaṃ narakāṇāṃ ca yogāśtramataḥ param // NarP_1,99.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:23563: tiladhenu yutaṃ cāpi mārgaśīrṣyāṃ vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,99.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:23566: śṛṇvatāṃ paṭhatāṃ caiva nṛṇāṃ ceha paratra ca // NarP_1,99.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:23567: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde 'gnipurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23573: sṛṣṭyarthaṃ tatra saṃjāto manuḥ svāryabhuvaḥ purā // NarP_1,100.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:23574: sa māṃ praṇamya papraccha dharmaṃ sarvāthasādhakam /
GP12nardp1_u:23575: ahaṃ tasmai tadā prītaḥ prāvocaṃ dharmasaṃhitām // NarP_1,100.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:23576: purāṇānāṃ yadā vyāso vyāsaṃ caktre mahāmatiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23577: tadā tāṃ saṃhitāṃ sarvāṃ pañcadhā vyabhajanmuniḥ // NarP_1,100.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:23579: tatrādimaṃ smṛtaṃ parvaṃ brāhmaṃ yatrāstyupakramaḥ // NarP_1,100.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:23583: pustalekhakalekhānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca tataḥ param // NarP_1,100.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:23584: saṃskārāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cātra kīrtitam /
GP12nardp1_u:23585: pakṣasyāditithīnāṃ ca kalpāḥ sapta ca kīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,100.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23587: śaive ca kāyato bhinnāḥ saure cāntyakathānvayaḥ // NarP_1,100.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:23591: dharme kāme ca mokṣe tu viṣṇoścāpi śivasya ca // NarP_1,100.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:23592: dvitīyaṃ ca tṛtīye ca saure vargacatuṣṭaye /
GP12nardp1_u:23597: guṇānāṃ tāratamyena samaṃ brahmeti hi śrutiḥ // NarP_1,100.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:23598: taṃ likhitvā tu yo dadyātpauṣyāṃ vidvānvimatsaraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23602: yo vai jitendriyo bhūtvā sopavāsaḥ samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23604: sa muktaḥ pātakairghoraiḥ prayāti brahmaṇaḥ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:23606: paṭhedvā śṛṇuyāccaitāṃ bhuktiṃ muktiṃ ca vindati // NarP_1,100.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:23607: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde bhaviṣyapurāṇānukramaṇī nirūpaṇaṃ nāma śatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23610: śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ daśamaṃ tava /
GP12nardp1_u:23643: rahasye rādhayā krīḍā varṇitā bahuvistarā // NarP_1,101.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:23645: kaṃsādīnāṃ vadhe vṛtte kṛṣṇasya dvijasaṃskṛtiḥ // NarP_1,101.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23650: paṭhitaṃ ca śrutaṃ dhyātaṃ pūjitaṃ cābhivanditam /
GP12nardp1_u:23657: so 'pi kṛṣṇaprasādena labhate vāñchitaṃ phalam // NarP_1,101.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:23658: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne brahmavaivartapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyāḥ // 101 //
GP12nardp1_u:23670: yogākhyānaṃ tataḥ proktaṃ kalpākhyānaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,102.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:23671: liṅgodbhavastadaṃbā ca kīrtitā hi tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:23692: tryaṃbakasya ca māhātmyaṃ purāṇaśravaṇasya ca // NarP_1,102.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:23696: phaālgunyāṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ yo dadyādbhaktyā dvijātaye // NarP_1,102.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23698: yaḥ paṭecchṛṇuyādvāpi laiṅgaṃ pāpāpahaṃ naraḥ // NarP_1,102.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:23703: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde liṅgapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23706: śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi vārāhaṃ vai purāṇakam /
GP12nardp1_u:23708: mānavasya tu kalpasya prasaṃgaṃ matkṛtaṃ purā /
GP12nardp1_u:23710: vyāso hi viduṣāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sākṣānnārāyaṇo bhuvi /
GP12nardp1_u:23716: gaṇānāṃ ca tathā devyā dhanadasya vṛṣasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:23721: ityādi kṛtavṛttāntaṃ prathame darśitaṃ mayā // NarP_1,103.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23733: ityevaṃ tava vārāhaṃ proktaṃ pāpavināśanam // NarP_1,103.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:23740: iti śrībṛhannāradīya purāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde vārāhapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāma tryuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23745: purāṇe śatakoṭo tu yacchaivaṃ varṇitaṃ mayā /
GP12nardp1_u:23746: lakṣaṃ tasyārthaṃ jātasya sāro vyāsena kīrtitaḥ // NarP_1,104.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:23749: yaḥ śṛṇoti paṭhedvāpi sa tu sākṣācchivaḥ sthitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23750: yatra māheśvarā dharmāḥ ṣaṇmukhena prakāśitāḥ // NarP_1,104.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:23772: vāsudevasya māhātmyaṃ koṭitīrthaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,104.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:23780: ityeṣa kathitaḥ skānde khaṇḍo māheśvaro 'dbhutaḥ // NarP_1,104.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:23809: tato mārgasya māhātmye vidhānaṃ snānajaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:23818: vanānāṃ dvādaśānāṃ ca māhātmyaṃ kīrtitaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,104.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:23833: somārkā dīni tīrthāni trayodaśa tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:23838: ataḥ paraṃ brahmakhaṇḍaṃ marīce śṛṇu puṇyadam // NarP_1,104.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:23839: yatra vai setumāhātmye phalaṃ snāne kṣaṇodbhavam /
GP12nardp1_u:23858: chatrānandā tathā śāntā śrīmātā ca mataṅginī // NarP_1,104.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:23859: puṇyadā ca samākhyātā yatra devyaḥ samāsthitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23878: śravaṇādikapuṇyaṃ ca kīrtitaṃ śarmadaṃ nṛṇām // NarP_1,104.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:23925: ataḥ paraṃ tvavantyākhyaṃ śṛṇu khaṇḍa ca pañcamam ///
GP12nardp1_u:23938: śukre ca pañcame cākhye kuśasthalyāḥ pradakṣiṇāḥ // NarP_1,104.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:23962: kalpe kalpe pṛthaṅ nāma narmadāyāḥ prakīrtitam // NarP_1,104.110 //
GP12nardp1_u:23980: lokeśaṃ dhanadeśaṃ ca maṅgaleśaṃ ca kāmajam // NarP_1,104.119 //
GP12nardp1_u:23986: caṇḍārkaṃ yamatīrthaṃ ca kālhoḍīśaṃ vanādike // NarP_1,104.122 //
GP12nardp1_u:23990: karañjaṃ kāmahaṃ tīrthaṃ bhāṇḍīro rohiṇībhavam // NarP_1,104.124 //
GP12nardp1_u:23993: indreśaṃ kaṃbukeśaṃ ca someśaṃ kohanaṃ śakam /
GP12nardp1_u:23997: śākraṃ saumyaṃ ca nādeśaṃ toyeśaṃ rukmiṇībhavam /
GP12nardp1_u:24011: ṛṇamokṣaṃ bhārabhūti puṅkhāṃ muḍiṃ ca ḍiṇḍimam // NarP_1,104.134 //
GP12nardp1_u:24021: rudrāvartaṃ ca markaṇḍaṃ tīrthaṃ pāpapraṇāśanam // NarP_1,104.139 //
GP12nardp1_u:24025: ataḥ paraṃ nāgarākhyaḥ khaṇḍaḥ ṣaṣṭho 'bhidhīyate // NarP_1,104.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:24037: rāmahradaṃ nāgapuraṃ ṣaāḍliṅgaṃ caiva yajñabhūḥ // NarP_1,104.147 //
GP12nardp1_u:24039: rudraśīrṣaṃ ca yāgeśaṃ vālakhilyaṃ ca gāruḍam // NarP_1,104.148 //
GP12nardp1_u:24049: aṭeśvaraṃ yājñavalkya gauryaṃ gāṇeśameva ca // NarP_1,104.153 //
GP12nardp1_u:24056: bhārgavaṃ caritaṃ caiva vaiśvāmaitraṃ tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:24057: sārasvataṃ paippalādaṃ kaṃsārīśaṃ ca paiṇḍakam // NarP_1,104.157 //
GP12nardp1_u:24061: pauṣkaraṃ naimiṣaṃ dhārmamaraṇya tritayaṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,104.159 //
GP12nardp1_u:24067: nadīnāṃ tritayaṃ gaṅgā narmadā ca sarasvatī // NarP_1,104.162 //
GP12nardp1_u:24079: someśo yatra viśveśor'kasthalaṃ puṇyadaṃ mahat // NarP_1,104.168 //
GP12nardp1_u:24085: varārohā hyajā pālā maṅgalā laliteśvarī // NarP_1,104.171 //
GP12nardp1_u:24117: kapileśasya ca kathā jaradgavaśivasya ca // NarP_1,104.187 //
GP12nardp1_u:24125: mṛgīkuṇḍaṃ ca sarvasvaṃ kṣetre vastrāpathe smṛtam // NarP_1,104.191 //
GP12nardp1_u:24129: bhadrakarṇasya māhātmyaṃ trinetrasya tataḥ param // NarP_1,104.193 //
GP12nardp1_u:24135: kātyāyanyāśca māhātmyaṃ tataḥ piṇḍārakasya ca // NarP_1,104.196 //
GP12nardp1_u:24165: ityeṣa saptamaḥ proktaḥ khaṇḍaḥ prābhāsiko dvijāḥ // NarP_1,104.211 //
GP12nardp1_u:24168: mādhyāṃ satkṛtya viprāya sa śaive modate pade // NarP_1,104.213 //
GP12nardp1_u:24169: iti śrībṛhannāradīya purāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde skandapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāma caturadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24189: marutāṃ janmakathanaṃ baleśca caritaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,105.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:24200: māheśvaryāṃ tu kṛṣṇasya tadbhaktānāṃ ca kīrtanam /
GP12nardp1_u:24203: gāṇeśvaryāṃ gaṇeśasya caritaṃ ca maheśituḥ // NarP_1,105.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:24208: sa cākhyāsyati viprebhyo naimiṣīyebhya eva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:24209: evaṃ paraṃparāprāptaṃ purāṇaṃ vāmanaṃ śubham // NarP_1,105.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:24210: ye paṭhanti ca śṛṇvanti te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim /
GP12nardp1_u:24214: dehānte bhuktabhogo 'sau yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // NarP_1,105.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:24215: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde vāmanapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāma pañcādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24218: śṛṇu vatsa marīce tvaṃ purāṇaṃ kūrmasaṃjñakam /
GP12nardp1_u:24223: yatra brāhmāḥ purā proktā dharmā nānāvidhā mune // NarP_1,106.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:24225: tatra pūrvavibhāge tu purāṇopakramaḥ purā // NarP_1,106.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24229: tataḥ saṃkṣepataḥ sargaḥ śāṅkaraṃ caritaṃ tathā // NarP_1,106.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:24237: vārāṇasyāśca māhātmyaṃ prayāgasya tataḥ param // NarP_1,106.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:24239: uttare 'syā vibhāge tu purā gītaiśvarī tataḥ // NarP_1,106.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24241: nānāvidhānāṃ tīrthānāṃ māhātmyaṃ ca pṛthak tataḥ // NarP_1,106.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:24245: pāda'syāḥ prathame proktā brāhmaṇānāṃ vyavasthitiḥ // NarP_1,106.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:24247: dvitīye kṣattriyāṇāṃ tu vṛttiḥ samyakprakīrtitā // NarP_1,106.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:24255: ityeṣā pañcapadyuktā dvitīyā saṃhitā mune // NarP_1,106.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:24257: ṣoḍhā ṣaṭkarmasirddhi bodhayantī ca kāminām // NarP_1,106.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:24264: brāhmaṇāyā yane dadyātsa yāti paramāṃ gatim // NarP_1,106.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:24265: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde kūrmaparāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma ṣaḍuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24268: atha mātsyaṃ purāṇaṃ te pravakṣye dvijasattama /
GP12nardp1_u:24269: yatroktaṃ saptakalpānāṃ vṛttaṃ saṃkṣipya bhūtale // NarP_1,107.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:24289: tathaivānaṃ dakaryāśca vrataṃ sārasvataṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,107.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24319: vāmanasya tu māhātmyaṃ vārāhasya tataḥ param // NarP_1,107.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:24327: yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi sa yāti bhavanaṃ hareḥ // NarP_1,107.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:24329: viprāyābhyarcya viṣuve sa yāti paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,107.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:24330: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde matsyapurāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma saptottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24333: marīce śṛṇu vakṣyābhi purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ śubham /
GP12nardp1_u:24339: pūjāvidhānaṃ ca tathā vaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaraṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24342: mālāmantraḥ śivārcātha gaṇapūjā tataḥ param // NarP_1,108.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:24360: rogaghnaṃ kavacaṃ viṣṇorgāruḍaṃ traipuro manuḥ // NarP_1,108.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:24364: tarpaṇaṃ vaiśvadevaṃ ca saṃdhyā pārvaṇakarma ca // NarP_1,108.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:24366: pratisaṃkrama uktāḥ sma yugadharmāḥ kṛteḥ phalam // NarP_1,108.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:24376: yamalokasthamārgasya varṇana ca taḥ param // NarP_1,108.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:24380: pretānāṃ caritākhyānaṃ kāraṇaṃ pretatāṃ prati // NarP_1,108.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:24398: kīrtitaṃ pāpaśamanaṃ paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ nṛṇām // NarP_1,108.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:24400: sauvarṇahaṃsayugmāḍhyaṃ viprāya sa divaṃ vrajet // NarP_1,108.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:24401: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde gāruḍānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24407: caturtha upasaṃhāraḥ pādāścatvāra eva hi // NarP_1,109.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:24412: eṣa vai prathamaḥ pādo dvitīyaṃ śṛṇu mānada /
GP12nardp1_u:24439: kārtavīryasya caritaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,109.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:24444: indrasya tu stavaḥ puṇyaḥ śukreṇa parikīrtitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24451: bhaviṣyāṇāṃ manūnāṃ ca caritaṃ hi tataḥ param // NarP_1,109.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:24456: śaivasyātha purasyāpi varṇanaṃ ca tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:24459: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ varṇanaṃ hi tataḥ param // NarP_1,109.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:24461: catuṣpādaṃ purāṇaṃ te brahmāṇḍaṃ samudāhṛtakam // NarP_1,109.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:24463: brahmāṇḍaṃ yaccaturlakṣaṃ purāṇaṃ yena vaṭhyate // NarP_1,109.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:24467: mattaḥ śrutvā purāṇāni lokebhyaḥ pracakāśire // NarP_1,109.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:24469: mayācedaṃ purāṇaṃ tu vasiṣṭāya puroditam // NarP_1,109.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:24473: ya idaṃ kīrtayedvatsa śṛṇoti ca samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,109.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:24477: sa yādi brahmaṇo lokaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,109.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:24479: purāṇāni tu saṃkṣepācchrotavyāni ca vistarāt // NarP_1,109.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:24481: kathayedvā vidhānena neha bhūyaḥ sa jāyate // NarP_1,109.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:24485: deyaṃ kadāpi sādhūnāṃ dveṣiṇe na śaṭhāya ca // NarP_1,109.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:24487: nirmatsarāya śucaye deyaṃ sadvaiṣṇavāya ca // NarP_1,109.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:24488: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde brahmāṇḍapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma navottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24492: marūcaye yathā proktaṃ brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā // NarP_1,110.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:24493: adhunā tu mahābhāga tithīnāṃ vai kathānakam /
GP12nardp1_u:24495: yasminmāse tu yā puṇyā tithiryena uvāsitā /
GP12nardp1_u:24496: yadvidhānaṃ ca pūjādestatsarvaṃ vada sāṃpratam // NarP_1,110.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:24498: śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi tithīnāṃ te vrataṃ pṛthak /
GP12nardp1_u:24501: śuklapakṣe samagraṃ vai tadā sūryodaye sati // NarP_1,110.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:24507: maṅgalyā ca pavitrā ca lokadvayamukhāvahā // NarP_1,110.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:24511: tataḥ krameṇa devebhyaḥ pūjā kāryā pṛthakpṛthak // NarP_1,110.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:24513: savastraṃ sahiraṇyaṃ ca tato dadyāddijātaye // NarP_1,110.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24516: ārogyadaṃ nṛṇāṃ vipra tasminneva dine mune /
GP12nardp1_u:24519: atha jyeṣṭhe site pakṣe pakṣatyāṃ divasodaye // NarP_1,110.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:24527: evaṃ bhaktyā samabhyacya dattvā viprāya dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,110.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:24543: idaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra deva devasya śūlinaḥ // NarP_1,110.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:24549: samarpya gurave bhaktyā śivaloke mahīyate // NarP_1,110.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:24558: itthaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra sarvasiddhyālayo naraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24559: jāyate bhuvi durgāyāḥ prasādānnātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,110.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:24567: naktaṃ viṣṇvarcanaṃ homaiḥ sauvarṇīṃ hutabhuktanum // NarP_1,110.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:24569: evaṃ kṛtvā dhanairdhānyaiḥ samṛddho jāyate bhuvi // NarP_1,110.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:24577: karmaṇā laukikenāpi saṃtuṣṭo hi maheśvaraḥ // NarP_1,110.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:24579: vaiśākhe tu sitādyāyāṃ viṣṇuṃ viśvavihāriṇam // NarP_1,110.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:24581: evaṃ śucisitādyāyāṃ brahmāṇaṃ jagatāṃ gurum // NarP_1,110.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:24585: vratāni tubhyaṃ proktāni bhuktimuktipradāni ca // NarP_1,110.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:24587: bhojane tu haviṣyānnaṃ sāmānyata udāhṛtam // NarP_1,110.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:24588: iti śrībṛhannanāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsapratipadvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24591: śṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi dvitīyāyā vratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:24592: yāni kṛtvā naro bhaktyā brahmaloke mahīyate // NarP_1,111.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:24596: asminneva dine vipra bālendumuditaṃ pare // NarP_1,111.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:24598: atha vāsmindine bhaktyā dasrāvabhyarcya yatnataḥ // NarP_1,111.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24600: pūrṇayātrāvrate hyasmindadhnā vāpi ghṛtena ca // NarP_1,111.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:24608: bhojayitvā dvijān bhaktyā bhāskaraṃ lokamāpnuyāt // NarP_1,111.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:24610: tasyāṃ rathaṃ samāropya rāmaṃ saha subhadrayā // NarP_1,111.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:24620: gārhasthyaṃ mā praṇāśaṃ me yātu dharmārthakāmada // NarP_1,111.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:24624: āśvine māsi vai puṇyā dvitīyā śuklapakṣagā // NarP_1,111.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:24628: puṣṭipravarddhanaṃ cātra bhaginyā bhojanaṃ gṛhe // NarP_1,111.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:24629: vastrālaṅkārapūrvaṃ tu tasmai deyamataḥ param // NarP_1,111.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:24630: yasyāṃ tithau yamunayā yamarājadevaḥ saṃbhojito nijakarātsvasṛsauhṛdena /
GP12nardp1_u:24631: tasyāṃ svasuḥ karatalādiha yo bhunakti prāpnoti ratnadhanadhānyamanuttamaṃ saḥ // NarP_1,111.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:24642: samarpya deve bhaktyaiva sa mūrtiṃ pradadeddvije /
GP12nardp1_u:24643: evaṃ kṛte vrate vipra sākṣātsūrya ivoditaḥ // NarP_1,111.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:24645: iha kāmānvarāmbhuktvā yātyante brahmaṇaḥ padam // NarP_1,111.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:24651: prasādya praṇameccaiva sāṣṭāṅgaṃ patito bhuvi // NarP_1,111.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:24655: proktaṃ tadeva kṛṣṇāsu karttavyaṃ vidhikovidaiḥ // NarP_1,111.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:24657: pūjyate hi dvitīyāsu brahmacaryyādi pūrvavat // NarP_1,111.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:24658: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsadvitīyāvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24661: śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi tṛtīyāyā vratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:24664: sauvarṇā rājatīṃ vāpi tāmnīṃ vā mṛṇyayīṃ dvija // NarP_1,112.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:24668: dvijabhāryā bhartṛmatīḥ kanyakāṃ vā sulakṣaṇāḥ // NarP_1,112.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24672: dhātujāṃ mṛnmayīṃ vā tu nikṣipecca jalāśaye // NarP_1,112.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:24676: strīṇāṃ yathā tathā nānyā vidyate bhuvanatraye // NarP_1,112.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:24681: dve śukle dve tathā kṛṣṇe yugādī kavayo viduḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24682: śukle pūrvāhnike grāhye kṛṣṇe caiva tapastatha // NarP_1,112.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24683: dvāparaṃ hi kalirbhādre pravṛttāni yugāni vai /
GP12nardp1_u:24686: yadvā gaṅgāṃbhasi snāto mucyate sarvakilbiṣaiḥ // NarP_1,112.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:24691: atha jyeṣṭhatṛtīyā tu śuklā raṃbheti nāmataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24695: dadāti vittaṃ putrāṃśca matiṃ dharme śubhāvahām /
GP12nardp1_u:24697: keśavaṃ tu salakṣmīkaṃ sastrīke tu dvijer'cayet /
GP12nardp1_u:24704: putrāndehi dhanaṃ dehi saubhāgyaṃ dehi suvrate // NarP_1,112.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:24705: anyāṃśca sarvakāmānme dehi dehi namo 'stu te /
GP12nardp1_u:24706: evaṃ saṃprārthya deveśīṃ bhavānīṃ bhavasaṃyutām // NarP_1,112.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:24708: evaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāṇi kṛtvā nārī vrataṃ śubham // NarP_1,112.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:24712: sauvarṇīṃ pratimāṃ tatra bhavānyāḥ pratipūjayet // NarP_1,112.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:24717: pratimāṃ gurave dattvā dvijebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:24721: tatastu kāñcane pātre rājate cāpi tāmrake /
GP12nardp1_u:24722: vaiṇave mṛnmaye vāpi vinyasyānnaṃ sadakṣiṇam // NarP_1,112.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:24723: saphalaṃ ca savastraṃ ca dvijāya pratipādayet /
GP12nardp1_u:24730: bhūyasīṃ ca tato dadyādviprebhyo devituṣṭaye // NarP_1,112.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:24731: evaṃ yā kurute nārī vrataṃ saubhāgyavarddhanam /
GP12nardp1_u:24732: sā tu devīprasādena saubhāgyaṃ labhate dhruvam // NarP_1,112.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:24733: yadā tṛtīyā bhādre tu hastarkṣasahitā bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:24734: hastagaurīvrataṃ nāma taduddiṣṭaṃ hi śauriṇā // NarP_1,112.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:24735: tathā koṭīśvarī nāma vrataṃ proktaṃ pinākinā /
GP12nardp1_u:24738: upavāsena kartavyaṃ varṣe varṣe tu nārada // NarP_1,112.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:24741: tatpakkena tu nirmāya devyā mūrtiṃ suśomanām /
GP12nardp1_u:24748: iti te kathitaṃ vipra koṭilakṣeśvarīvratam // NarP_1,112.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:24758: vāyanāni ca pañcaiva tābhyo dadyācca bhojayet // NarP_1,112.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:24762: gītavādyayutā nadyāṃ gaurīṃ tāṃ tu visarjayet // NarP_1,112.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:24763: āhūtāsi mayābhadre pūjitā ca yathā vidhi /
GP12nardp1_u:24764: mama saubhāgyadānāya yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatāṃ tvayā // NarP_1,112.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:24765: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ bhaktyā dvija devīprasādataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24774: devīlokaṃ samāsādya modate ca tayā saha // NarP_1,112.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:24780: prasannā diśati svīyaṃ lokaṃ tu vratatoṣitā // NarP_1,112.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:24783: sarvāsu ca tṛtīyāsu vidhiḥ sādhāraṇo mune /
GP12nardp1_u:24784: devīpūjā viprapūjā dānaṃ homo visarjanam // NarP_1,112.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:24787: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsatṛtīyāvratakathanaṃ nāma dvādaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24795: vaiśākhasya caturthyāṃ tu prārthyaṃ saṃkarṣaṇāhvayam // NarP_1,113.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:24797: prāpya saṃkarṣaṇaṃ lokaṃ modate bahukalpakam // NarP_1,113.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24799: phalaṃ mūlaṃ ca yuthebhyo dattvā svargaṃ labhennaraḥ // NarP_1,113.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:24810: śrāvaṇasya caturthyāṃ tu jāti candrodaye mune // NarP_1,113.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24816: evaṃ vrataṃ vidhāyātha bhuktvā modakameva ca // NarP_1,113.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:24824: haimaṃ nirmāya gaṇapaṃ tāmrapātropari sthitam // NarP_1,113.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:24831: tataḥ saṃprārathya vighneśamūrtiṃ sopaskarāṃ mune // NarP_1,113.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:24833: kṛtvaivaṃ pañca varṣāṇi samupāsya yathāvidhi // NarP_1,113.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:24839: pañcābdaṃ vādaśābdaṃ vā ṣoḍaśābdamathāpi vā // NarP_1,113.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:24843: atha śukla caturthyāṃ tu siddhavaināyakavratam // NarP_1,113.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:24851: umāputrāya bailvaṃ tu dūrvāṃ gajamukhāya ca // NarP_1,113.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:24855: herambāya tu siṃdūraṃ catirhetre ca patrajam // NarP_1,113.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:24859: ācamayya namaskṛtya saṃprārthya ca visarjjayet // NarP_1,113.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:24861: nivedayecca gurave dvijebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dadet // NarP_1,113.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:24862: evaṃ kṛtārcano bhaktyā pañca varṣāṇi nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:24864: asyāṃ caturthyāṃ śaśinaṃ na paśyecca kadācana /
GP12nardp1_u:24865: paśyan mithyābhiśāpa tu labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24866: atha taddoṣanāśāya mantraṃ paurāṇikaṃ paṭhet // NarP_1,113.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:24868: sakumāraka mā rodīstava hyeṣa syamantakaḥ // NarP_1,113.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:24875: caturthyāṃ kārtike kṛṣṇe karakākhyaṃ vrataṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,113.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:24881: suvāsinībhyo viprebhyo yathākāmaṃ ca sādaram // NarP_1,113.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:24883: bhuñjīta miṣṭamannaṃ ca vratasya paripūrtaye // NarP_1,113.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:24884: yadvā kṣīreṇa karakaṃ pūrṇaṃ toyena vā mune /
GP12nardp1_u:24888: yāvajjīvaṃ tu vā nāryā kāryyaṃ saubhāgyavāñchayā /
GP12nardp1_u:24897: viṣāṇi naśyantyacirānna daśanti ca pannagāḥ // NarP_1,113.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:24905: tasyopari ghaṭaṃ sthāpya tāmrapātreṇa saṃyutam // NarP_1,113.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:24910: prabhāte vimale snātvā homaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ /'
GP12nardp1_u:24918: tato vyāhṛtibhiḥ śaktyā hutvā pūrṇāhutiṃ caret /
GP12nardp1_u:24921: savatsāṃ gāṃ tato dadyādācāryāya sadakṣiṇām // NarP_1,113.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:24922: anyobhyo 'pi yathāśakti bhūyasīṃ ca tato dadet /
GP12nardp1_u:24924: bandhubhiḥ saha bhuñjīta svayaṃ ca prītamānasaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24925: etadvrataṃ naraḥ kṛtvā bhuktvā bhogānihottamān // NarP_1,113.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:24929: pauṣamāsacaturthyāṃ tu vighneśaṃ prārthya bhaktitaḥ // NarP_1,113.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:24931: evaṃ kṛte mune bhūyādvratī saṃpattibhājanam // NarP_1,113.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:24941: saśamīpatradadhi ca kṛtvā candrāya dāpayet // NarP_1,113.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:24945: śaktyā saṃbhojya viprāgryānsvayaṃ bhuñjīta cājñayā // NarP_1,113.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:24946: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra saṃkaṣṭākhyaṃ śūbhāvaham /
GP12nardp1_u:24947: samṛddho dhanadhānyaiḥ syānna ca saṃkaṣṭamāpnuyāt // NarP_1,113.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:24949: tasyāṃ tu gaurī saṃpūjyā saṃyuktā yoginīgaṇaiḥ // NarP_1,113.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:24953: payasā pāyasenāpi lavaṇena ca pālakaiḥ // NarP_1,113.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:24955: saubhāgyavṛddhaye deyo bhoktavyaṃ bandhubhiḥ saha // NarP_1,113.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:24960: snānaṃ dānaṃ japo homaḥ sarvamasyāṃ kṛtaṃ mune /
GP12nardp1_u:24963: tilaṣiṣṭairdvijān bhojya svayaṃ cāśnīta mānavaḥ // NarP_1,113.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:24966: sauvarṇaṃ gajavaktraṃ ca kṛtvā saṃpūjya yatnataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24969: sāṃgārakā vā viprendra sā viśeṣaphalapradā // NarP_1,113.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:24971: vighneśa eva deveśaḥ saṃpūjyo bhaktitatparaiḥ // NarP_1,113.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:24972: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādśanāsa caturthīvratānirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayodaśādhikasatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24978: asyāṃ matsyāvatārārcā bhaktaiḥ kāryā mahotsavā // NarP_1,114.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:24981: yo lakṣmīṃ pūjayeccātra taṃ vai lakṣmīrna muñcati /
GP12nardp1_u:24982: pṛthvīvrataṃ tathā cāndraṃ hayagarīvavrataṃ tathā // NarP_1,114.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24984: atha vaiśākhapañcamyāṃ śeṣaṃ cābhyarcya mānavaḥ // NarP_1,114.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:24988: athāṣāḍhasya pañcamyāṃ vāyuṃ sarvagataṃ mune // NarP_1,114.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:24990: dhvajaṃ ca pañcavarṇaṃ tu vaṃśadaṇḍāgrasaṃsthitam // NarP_1,114.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:24992: tatastanmūladeśe tu dikṣu sarvāsu nārada // NarP_1,114.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:24994: prathamādiṣu yāmeṣu yo yo vāyuḥ pravartate // NarP_1,114.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:24995: tasmai tasmai digīśāya pūjāṃ samyak prakalpayet /
GP12nardp1_u:24997: sāyamāgatya gehaṃ svaṃ bhuktvā svalpaṃ samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24999: yaḥ svapno jāyate tasyāṃ rātrau yāme caturthake /
GP12nardp1_u:25000: sa eva bhavitā nūnaṃ svapna ityāha vai śivaḥ // NarP_1,114.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:25010: prātarbhānau samudite pitṝṃścaiva tathā ṛṣīn // NarP_1,114.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:25013: sarvaṃ dinaṃ kṣipedevaṃ pradoṣe tu śivālaye /
GP12nardp1_u:25016: japetpañcākṣarī vidyāṃ śataṃ cāpi sahasrakam // NarP_1,114.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25021: yāni syustaiḥ samṛddho 'haṃ bhūyāṃ janmani janmani /
GP12nardp1_u:25022: evaṃ saṃprārthya deveśaṃ gṛhamāgatya vai svakam // NarP_1,114.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:25039: bhādre tu kṛṣṇapañcamyāṃ nāgān kṣīreṇa tarpayet // NarP_1,114.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:25049: etaibhyo 'ghya ca vidhivatkalpayitvā pradāya ca // NarP_1,114.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:25053: kṛtvā vratānte varayedācāryān sapta vaidikān // NarP_1,114.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:25059: arghyaṃ datvā tato homaṃ tilavrīhiyavādibhiḥ // NarP_1,114.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:25065: bhojayitvā tu tānbhaktyā praṇipatya visarjayet // NarP_1,114.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:25067: bhuṅktvā vai ṣaḍrasopetaṃ pramudyātsaha bandhubhiḥ // NarP_1,114.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:25071: tasyāḥ svarṇamayīṃ mūrtiṃ śaktyā nirmāya nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:25081: vipraikaṃ bhojayeccāpi tasmai dattvā ca dakṣiṇām /
GP12nardp1_u:25083: yastu vai bhaktisaṃyuktaḥ snānaṃ kuryāj jayādine /
GP12nardp1_u:25084: naśyanti tasya pāpāni siṃhākrāntā mṛgā yathā // NarP_1,114.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:25087: aputro labhate putraṃ vandhyā gabha ca vindati /
GP12nardp1_u:25088: rogī rogātpramucyeta baddho mucyeta bandhanāt // NarP_1,114.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:25090: nāgebhyo hyabhayaṃ labdhvā modate saha bāndhavaiḥ // NarP_1,114.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:25093: pañcamyāṃ pratimāse tu śukle kṛṣṇe ca nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:25094: pitṝṇāṃ pūjanaṃ śastaṃ nāgānāṃ cāpi sarvathā // NarP_1,114.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:25095: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthapañcamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturdaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25098: śṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi ṣaṣṭhyāścaiva vratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:25101: tatreṣṭvā ṣaṇmukhaṃ devaṃ nānāpūjā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,115.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:25103: vaiśākhaśuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ ca pūjayitvā ca kārtikam // NarP_1,115.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:25104: labhate mātṛjaṃ saukhyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25116: gṛhītvā vaṃśapātre tu dhṛtvā piṇḍākṛtiṃ ca tām /
GP12nardp1_u:25118: paṅkajaṃ karavīraṃ ca nepālīṃ mālatīṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:25119: nīlotpalaṃ ketakīṃ ca saṃgṛhya tagaraṃ tathā // NarP_1,115.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:25121: akṣatāḥ kalikā gṛhya tābhirdevīṃ prapūjayet // NarP_1,115.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:25124: snātvā kanakhale devi harariṃ labdhavatī patim /
GP12nardp1_u:25138: sakhībhiḥ sahitā sādhvī tāṃ rātriṃ prasabhaṃ nayet /
GP12nardp1_u:25141: evaṃ jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā saptamyāṃ saritaṃ nayet // NarP_1,115.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:25144: snātvā gṛhaṃ samāgatya hutvā vaiśvānaraṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25150: naro vā yadi vā nārī tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu /
GP12nardp1_u:25155: nabhasye māsi yā śuklā ṣaṣṭhī sā candanāhvayā // NarP_1,115.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:25157: rohiṇī pātabhaumaistu saṃyutā kapilā bhavet // NarP_1,115.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:25167: pūjyātra saikatī mūrtiryadvā dvijasatī mudā // NarP_1,115.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:25169: kanyā varaṃ prāpnuyācca vāñcitaṃ putramaṅganā // NarP_1,115.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:25171: kārtike śuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu ṣaṇmukhena mahātmanā // NarP_1,115.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:25173: atastasyāṃ suraśreṣṭhāṃ devasenāṃ ca ṣaṇmukham // NarP_1,115.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:25179: skandena satkṛtiḥ prāptā brahamādyaiḥ parikalpitā // NarP_1,115.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:25183: yadi cetsā samuddiṣṭā caṃpāhvā munisattama // NarP_1,115.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:25191: māghamāse sitā ṣaṣṭhī varuṇāhvā smṛtā tu sā /
GP12nardp1_u:25196: phaālgune śuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu devaṃ paśupatiṃ dvija // NarP_1,115.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:25203: evaṃ kṛta śivārcastu naro nāryathavā mune /
GP12nardp1_u:25204: iha bhuktvā varānbhogānante śivagatiṃ labhet // NarP_1,115.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:25205: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitaṣaṣṭhīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcadaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25209: yāni kṛtvā naro bhaktyā sūryasāyujyamāpnuyāt // NarP_1,116.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:25210: caitre tu śuklasaptamyāṃ bahiḥ snānaṃ samācaret /
GP12nardp1_u:25213: vinyasetpūrvapatre tu devau dvau kṛtadhātukau // NarP_1,116.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:25215: dakṣiṇe ca nyasetpatre tathaiva rākṣasadvayam // NarP_1,116.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:25218: vāyavya yātudhānau dvau uttare ca ṛṣidvayam /
GP12nardp1_u:25222: evaṃ saṃpūjya homaṃ tu ghṛtenāṣṭaśataṃ caret /
GP12nardp1_u:25224: nāmamantreṇa vedyāṃ vā tataḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ dadet /
GP12nardp1_u:25225: dakṣiṇā ca tato deyā dvijebhyaḥ śaktito dvija // NarP_1,116.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:25227: dehānte maṇḍalaṃ bhānorbhattvā gacchetparaṃ padam // NarP_1,116.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:25230: tāṃ tatra pūjayetsnātvā pratyūṣe vimale jale /
GP12nardp1_u:25232: tato ghaṭasahasraṃ tu deyaṃ gaṅgāvrate tvidam /
GP12nardp1_u:25235: tilamātraṃ tu sauvarṇaṃ vidhāya kamalaṃ śubham // NarP_1,116.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:25239: iti saṃprārthya deveśaṃ sūrye cāstamupāgate // NarP_1,116.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:25240: sodakuṃbhaṃ tu tatpadmaṃ kapilāṃ ca dvijer'payet /
GP12nardp1_u:25241: taddine tūpavastavyaṃ bhoktavyaṃ ca pare 'hani // NarP_1,116.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:25243: nibavrataṃ ca tatreva tadvidhānaṃ śṛṇuṣva me // NarP_1,116.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:25247: dvijānpare 'hni saṃbhojya svayaṃ bhuñjīta bandhubhiḥ // NarP_1,116.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:25249: saptamī śarkarākhyaiṣā proktā taccāpi me śṛṇu // NarP_1,116.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25253: iṣṭā raverataḥ puṇyā śarkarā havyakavyayoḥ // NarP_1,116.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:25257: kartavyaṃ hi prayatnena vratame tadravipriyam // NarP_1,116.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:25258: yaḥ kuryātparāyā bhaktyā sa vai sadgatimāpnuyāt /
GP12nardp1_u:25259: jyeṣṭhe tu śuklasaptamyāṃ jāta indro raviḥ svayam // NarP_1,116.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:25261: svargatiṃ labhate vipra devendrasya prasādataḥ // NarP_1,116.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:25263: jātastaṃ tatra saṃprārcya gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ pṛthak // NarP_1,116.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:25266: kārpāsaṃ tu caturhastaṃ sārddha vastraṃ hi gopateḥ ///
GP12nardp1_u:25269: asyāṃ dānaṃ japo homaḥ sarvaṃ cākṣayyatāṃ vrajet // NarP_1,116.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:25271: somasya tu maheśasya pūjanaṃ cātra kīrtitam // NarP_1,116.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:25275: nālikeraṃ ca vṛntākaṃ nāraṅgaṃ bījapūrakam // NarP_1,116.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:25279: saṃpūjya parayā bhaktyā dhārayedvāmake kare // NarP_1,116.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:25280: strī naro dakṣiṇe caiva yāvadvarṣaṃ samāpyate /
GP12nardp1_u:25281: saṃbhojya viprānsaptaiva pāyasena visṛjyasa tān // NarP_1,116.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:25283: phalāni tāni deyāni saptasvapi dvijeṣu ca // NarP_1,116.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:25284: evaṃ tu sapta varṣāṇi kṛtvopāsya yathāvidhi /
GP12nardp1_u:25285: sāyujyaṃ labhate vipra mahādevasya tadvratī // NarP_1,116.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:25289: tvāmahaṃ dadmi kalyāṇi prīyatāmaryamā svayam // NarP_1,116.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:25291: ityuktvā vedaviduṣe dattvā kṛtvā ca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,116.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:25293: pacagavyaṃ vrataṃ cetthaṃ vidhāya śvo dvijottamān // NarP_1,116.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:25295: kṛtaṃ hyetadgataṃ vipra subhāṣyaṃ śraddhayānvitaḥ // NarP_1,116.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:25301: visṛjya bandhubhiḥ sārddhaṃ svayaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ // NarP_1,116.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:25305: ato 'syāṃ pūjanaṃ tasya yathoktavidhinā dvija // NarP_1,116.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:25307: suvarṇadakṣiṇāṃ datvā visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam // NarP_1,116.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:25309: dvijobrāhmaṃ tathā śūdraḥ satkulejanma cāpnuyāt // NarP_1,116.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:25311: upoṣya bhānuṃ triḥsandhyaṃ samabhyarcya dharāsthitaḥ // NarP_1,116.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:25314: pṛthavī vā suvarṇaṃ vā visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam /
GP12nardp1_u:25316: mārtaṇḍākhyaṃ vrataṃ nāma kathayanti dvijāḥ pare /
GP12nardp1_u:25320: sauvarṇaṃ gandhapuṣpādyaiḥ kṛtvā rātrau ca jāgaram /
GP12nardp1_u:25321: pare 'hni viprānsambhojya pāyasena tu sapta vai // NarP_1,116.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:25322: dakṣiṇāṃ nālikerāṇi tebhyo datvā guruṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25323: sauvarṇaṃ tu raverbimbaṃ yuktaṃ dakṣiṇayā nyayā // NarP_1,116.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:25324: samarpya ca bhṛśaṃ prārthya visṛjyādyātsvayaṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25330: asyāṃ samarcya savituḥ pratimāṃ tu haimīṃ haimāśvayuktarathagāṃ tu dadetsahebhām /
GP12nardp1_u:25331: yo bhāvabhaktisahitaḥ sa gato hi lokaṃ śambhoḥ sa modata ihāpi ca bhuktabhogaḥ // NarP_1,116.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:25334: arkasya ca badaryāśca sapta sapta dalāni vai /
GP12nardp1_u:25336: putrapradaṃ vrataṃ cātra prāhādityaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25340: pūjayedapare cāhni homaṃ kṛtvā dvijāṃ stataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25341: dadhyodanena payasā pāyasena ca bhojayet // NarP_1,116.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:25343: labhate sa tu satputraṃ cirāyuṣamanāmayam // NarP_1,116.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:25352: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitasappamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25360: caitre māsi sitāṣṭamyāṃ na te śokamavāpnuyuḥ // NarP_1,117.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:25370: jyeṣṭhaśukle tathāṣṭamyāṃ yo devīṃ pūjayennaraḥ // NarP_1,117.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:25372: śuklāṣṭamyāṃ tathā'ṣāḍhe snātvā caiva niśāṃbunā // NarP_1,117.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:25376: bhojayitvā tato viprāndatvā svarṇaṃ ca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,117.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:25377: visṛjya ca tataḥ paścātsvayaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25380: kṣīreṇa snāpayitvā ca miṣṭānnaṃ vinivedayet // NarP_1,117.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:25384: upavāsaṃ tu saṃkalpya snātvā kṛtvā ca naityikam // NarP_1,117.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:25386: kṛṣṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ tathānantaṃ govindaṃ garuḍadhvajam // NarP_1,117.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:25391: ādau madhye tathā cānte homaṃ kuryādvidhānataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25394: sauvarṇe tāmrapātre vā mṛnmaye veṇupātrake // NarP_1,117.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:25396: haimīṃ ca pratimāṃ kṛtvā pūjayitvā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,117.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25398: dātavyā gauḥ savatsā ca vastrālaṅkārabhūṣitā // NarP_1,117.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:25400: tāśca dadyādvidhijñāya svayaṃ vā bhakṣayedvratī // NarP_1,117.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:25402: daśame 'hni tato mūrtiṃ sadravyāṃ guraver'payet // NarP_1,117.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:25404: dadyādeva daśābdaṃ tu kṛtvā vratamanuttamam // NarP_1,117.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:25406: ante kṛṣṇasya sāyujyaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,117.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:25410: upavāsī tilaiḥ snāto nadyādau vimale jale // NarP_1,117.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:25412: tanmadhye kalaśaṃ sthāpya tāmrajaṃ vāpi mṛnmayam // NarP_1,117.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:25414: haimīṃ vastrayugācchannāṃ kṛṣṇasya pratimāṃ śubham // NarP_1,117.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:25416: devakīṃ vasudevaṃ ca yaśodāṃ nandameva ca // NarP_1,117.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:25418: tata ārārtikaṃ kṛtvā kṣamāpyānamya bhaktitaḥ // NarP_1,117.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:25421: dhānyākaṃ ca yavānīṃ ca śuṇṭhīṃ khaṇḍaṃ ca nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:25422: sājyaṃ raupye dhṛtaṃ pātre naivedyaṃ vinivedayet // NarP_1,117.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:25428: datvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ tebhyo visṛjettuṣṭamānasaḥ // NarP_1,117.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:25430: gurave dakṣiṇāṃ datvā visṛjyāśrīta ca svayam // NarP_1,117.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:25434: kṛtena yena labhyeta koṭyaikādaśakaṃ phalam // NarP_1,117.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:25438: śakto bhaktaścopavāsaṃ pare 'hni vidhinā tataḥ // NarP_1,117.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:25440: kṛtvā svayaṃ ca bhuñjītaṃ vratamevaṃ samāpayet // NarP_1,117.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:25442: rahasyaṃ goṣṭhajaṃ labdhvā rādhāparikare vaset // NarP_1,117.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:25443: dūrvāṣṭamīvrataṃ cātra kathitaṃ tacca me śṛṇu /
GP12nardp1_u:25444: śucau deśe prajātāyāṃ dvarvāyāṃ dvijasattama // NarP_1,117.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:25445: sthāpya liṅgaṃ tato gandhaiḥ puṣpairdhūpaiśca dīpakaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25452: tataḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya viprānsaṃbhojya tatra vai // NarP_1,117.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:25453: bhuktvā svayaṃ gṛhaṃ gacchedatvā vipreṣu dakṣiṇām /
GP12nardp1_u:25454: phalāni ca praśastāni miṣṭāni surabhīṇi ca // NarP_1,117.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:25455: evaṃ puṇyā pāpaharā nṛṇā dūrvāṣṭamī dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:25457: yā na pūjayate dūrvā nārī mohādyathāvidhi /
GP12nardp1_u:25458: janmāni trīṇi vaidhavyaṃ labhate sā na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,117.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:25460: jyeṣṭhā nāmnī tu sā jñeyā pūjitā pāpanāśinī // NarP_1,117.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:25464: tadavighnena me yātu samāptiṃ tvatprasādataḥ // NarP_1,117.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:25465: ityuccārya tato baddhā ḍoraka dakṣiṇe kare /
GP12nardp1_u:25480: pīyūṣadhāma rohiṇyāḥ sahitār'ghyaṃ gṛhāṇa me // NarP_1,117.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:25484: reṇuke trāhi māṃ devi rāmamātaḥ śivaṃ kuru // NarP_1,117.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:25490: candanaṃ tālapatraṃ ca puṣpamālāṃ tathākṣatān // NarP_1,117.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:25491: durvāṃ kausumbhasūtraṃ ca yugaṃ śrīphalameva vā /
GP12nardp1_u:25492: bhakṣyāṇi ca nave śūrpe pratidravyaṃ tu ṣoḍaśa // NarP_1,117.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:25500: etadvrataṃ mahālakṣmyāḥ kṛtvā vipra vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,117.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:25502: eṣāṣokāṣṭamī coktā yasyāṃ pūrṇaṃ ramāvratam // NarP_1,117.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:25505: yatra kutrāpi saṃjātā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25506: āśvine śuklapakṣe tu proktā vipra mahāṣṭamī // NarP_1,117.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:25508: upavāsaṃ caikabhaktaṃ mahāṣṭamyāṃ vidhāya tu // NarP_1,117.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:25510: ūrjje kṛṣṇādike 'ṣṭamyāṃ karakākhyaṃ vrataṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,117.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:25512: candrodayer'ghadānaṃ ca vidheyaṃ vratibhiḥ sadā // NarP_1,117.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:25514: gopāṣṭamīti saṃproktā kārtike dhavale dale // NarP_1,117.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:25522: vratametannaraḥ kṛtvā nārī vā vidhipūrvakam // NarP_1,117.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:25523: putraṃ sallakṣaṇopetaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,117.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:25525: upoṣya jāgaraṃ kṛtvā mahāpāpaiḥ pramucyate // NarP_1,117.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:25530: śuklāṣṭamyāṃ tu pauṣasya śivaṃ sampūjya bhaktitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25538: śuklāṣṭamyāṃ phaālgunasya śivaṃ cāpi śivāṃ dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:25542: śītale tvaṃ jaganmātā śītale tvaṃ jagatpitā /
GP12nardp1_u:25543: śītale tvaṃ jagadvātrī śītalāyai namonamaḥ // NarP_1,117.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:25546: śītale śītale cetthaṃ ye japanti jale lthitāḥ //ṭha
GP12nardp1_u:25547: teṣāṃ tu śītalā devī syādvisphoṭakaśāntidā // NarP_1,117.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:25549: tasya varṣaṃ bhavecchāntiḥ śītalāyāḥ prasādataḥ // NarP_1,117.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:25551: śivāṃ vāpiśivaṃ prārcyalabhate vāñchitaṃ phalam // NarP_1,117.99 //
GP12nardp1_u:25552: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitāṣṭamīvratakathanaṃ nāma saptadaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25555: atha vakṣyāmi viprendra navamyāste vratāni vai /
GP12nardp1_u:25556: yāni kṛtvā narā loke labhante vāñchitaṃ phalam // NarP_1,118.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:25562: eva yaḥ kurute bhaktyā śrīrāmanavamīvratam // NarP_1,118.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:25563: vidhūya cehapāpāni vraje dviṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:25564: uktaṃ mātṛvrataṃ cātra bhairaveṇa samanvitāḥ // NarP_1,118.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:25566: atraiva bhadrakālo tu yoginīnāṃ mahābalā // NarP_1,118.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:25570: vidhinā sa vimānena devataiḥ saha modate // NarP_1,118.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:25576: āṣāḍhe māsi viprendra yaḥ kuryātpakṣayordvija // NarP_1,118.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:25578: sa bhavedvai valoke tu bhogabhāragdevayānagaḥ // NarP_1,118.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:25580: pakṣayorupavāsaṃ vā kaumārīṃ caṇḍikāṃ yajet // NarP_1,118.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:25584: sa vimānena gacchedvai devīlokaṃ sanātanam // NarP_1,118.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:25585: bhādre tu navamī śuklā nandāhvā parikīrtitā /
GP12nardp1_u:25590: tato niśāyāṃ prāgyāme khaḍgaṃ dhanuriṣūngadām // NarP_1,118.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:25591: śūlaṃ śaktiṃ ca paraśuṃ chirikāṃ carma kheṭakam /
GP12nardp1_u:25592: chatraṃ dhvajaṃ gajaṃ cāśva govṛṣaṃ pustakaṃ tulām // NarP_1,118.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:25594: saṃpūjya mahiṣaṃ tatra bhadrakālyai samālabhet // NarP_1,118.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:25595: evaṃ baliṃ vidhāyātha bhuktvā pakkānna meva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:25596: dvijebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ datvā vrataṃ tatra samāpayet // NarP_1,118.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25601: devānāṃ ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ cāpi nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:25604: svayaṃ bhuktvā ca vihareddvijebhyo dattadakṣiṇaḥ // NarP_1,118.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:25605: evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā japadānaṃ dvijārcanam /
GP12nardp1_u:25606: homaṃ ca sarvamakṣayyaṃ bhavediti vidhervayaḥ // NarP_1,118.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:25610: pauṣe śuklanavamyāṃ tu mahāmāyāṃ prapūjayet // NarP_1,118.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:25612: māghamāse tu vā śuklā navamī lokapūjitā // NarP_1,118.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:25614: tasyāṃ snānaṃ tathā dānaṃ japo homa upoṣaṇam // NarP_1,118.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:25620: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitanavamīvratakathanaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25623: atha te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi daśamyā vai vratāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:25624: yāni kṛtvā naro bhaktyā dharmarājapriyo bhavet // NarP_1,119.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:25634: labhate vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,119.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:25635: jyeṣṭhe śukladaśamyāṃ tu jāhnavī saritāṃ varā /
GP12nardp1_u:25636: samāyātā dharāṃ svargāttasmātsā puṇyadā smṛtā // NarP_1,119.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:25637: jyeṣṭhaḥ śukladalaṃ hasto budhaśca daśamīḥ tithiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25640: harate daśa pāpāni tasmāddaśaharaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,119.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:25641: asyāṃ yo jāhnavīṃ prāpya snāti saṃprītamānasaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25642: vidhinā jāhnavītoye sa yāti harimandiram // NarP_1,119.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:25644: tasyāṃ snānaṃ japo dānaṃ homo vā svargatipradāḥ // NarP_1,119.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:25646: asyāṃ śivārcanaṃ śastaṃ gandhādyai rupacārakaiḥ // NarP_1,119.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:25647: tatropavāso naktaṃ vā dvijānāṃ bhojanaṃ japaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25648: hemno dāna ca dhenvādeḥ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam // NarP_1,119.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:25650: vrataṃ daśāvatārākhyaṃ tatra snānaṃ jalāśaye // NarP_1,119.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:25653: matsyaṃ kūrmaṃ varāhaṃ ca narasiṃhaṃ trivikramam /
GP12nardp1_u:25654: rāmaṃ rāmaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca bauddhaṃ kalkinameva ca // NarP_1,119.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:25658: visṛjya paścādbhuñjīta svayaṃ sveṣṭaiḥ samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,119.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:25666: kinnaṃ dhānyaṃ saraupyaṃ tu dhṛtvā dhautāṃśukāvṛtam // NarP_1,119.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:25670: evaṃ kṛtvā vidhānaṃ tu naro varṣaṃ suravānvitaḥ // NarP_1,119.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:25673: pūrvadikṣu śamīṃ vipra gatvā tanmūlajāṃ mṛdam /
GP12nardp1_u:25675: saṃpūjya tāṃ vidhānena sajjīkṛtya svakaṃ balam /
GP12nardp1_u:25678: manasā kalpitāṃ vāpi svarṇaṃ puṃravaṃśareṇa vai // NarP_1,119.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:25682: dhanaṃ jayaṃ sutān gāśca gajāśvaṃ vāpyajāvikam // NarP_1,119.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:25684: daśamyāṃ kārtike śukle sārvabhaumavrataṃ caret // NarP_1,119.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:25686: daśadikṣu baliṃ dadyād gṛhadvāpi purādbrahiḥ // NarP_1,119.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:25689: yo me pūrvagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25691: yo me vahnigataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25693: yo me dakṣagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25694: taṃ yamaḥ pretarājo vai nāśayatvakhileṣṭadaḥ // NarP_1,119.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:25695: yo me nairṛtigaḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25699: yo me vāyugataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25701: yo me saumyagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25703: yo ma īśagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25705: yo maṃ ūrddhvagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25709: ityevaṃ dikṣu daśasu baliṃ datvā samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25714: dvādaśābhyarcya saṃbhojya śaktito dakṣiṇāṃ dadet // NarP_1,119.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:25716: yugaṃ svargasukhaṃ bhuktvā sārvabhaumo nṛpo bhavet // NarP_1,119.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:25720: etatkṛtvā vrataṃ vipra hyārogyaṃ prāpya bhūtale // NarP_1,119.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:25722: pauṣe daśamyāṃ śuklāyāṃ viśvedevān samarcayet // NarP_1,119.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:25723: ṛtuṃ dakṣaṃ vasū6nsatyaṃ kālaṃ kāmaṃ muniṃ gurum /
GP12nardp1_u:25724: vipraṃ rāmaṃ ca daśadhā keśavastānsamāsthitaḥ // NarP_1,119.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:25728: dakṣiṇāṃ tāṃ dvijāgryebhyo gurave vā samarpayet // NarP_1,119.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:25729: evaṃ kṛtavidhi ścaikabhakto bhogī vratī bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:25730: lokadvayasya viprarṣe nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,119.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:25734: ātmā hyāyurmano dakṣo madaḥ prāṇastathaiva ca // NarP_1,119.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:25735: barhiṣmāṃśca gaviṣṭhaśca dattaḥ satyaśca te daśa /
GP12nardp1_u:25748: gṛhāṇārghyaṃ mayā dattaṃ bhaktyā māmanukaṃpaya // NarP_1,119.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:25750: raupyāṃ sudakṣiṇāṃ datvā visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam // NarP_1,119.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:25754: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitadaśamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25758: nānāpuṣpairmune kṛtvā vicitraṃ maṇḍapaṃ śubham // NarP_1,120.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:25764: rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // NarP_1,120.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:25769: datvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ tebhyo visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam ///
GP12nardp1_u:25770: iyaṃ tu kāmadā nāma sarvapātakanāśinī // NarP_1,120.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:25776: sarvapāpa vinirmukto vaiṣṇavaṃ labhate padvam // NarP_1,120.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:25778: snātvā pare 'hni saṃpūjya gandhādyaiḥ puruṣottamam // NarP_1,120.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:25780: jeṣṭhasya kṛṣṇakādaśyāṃ samupoṣya parāṃ nṛpa // NarP_1,120.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:25782: tato dvijāgryānsaṃbhojya datvā tebhyaśca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,120.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:25784: jyeṣṭhasya śuklaikādaśyāṃ nirjalāṃ samupoṣya tu // NarP_1,120.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:25794: upoṣya tasmin divase vidhivanmaṇḍape śubhe // NarP_1,120.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:25798: tataḥ pañcāmṛtaiḥ snāpya mantraiḥ śuddhajalena ca // NarP_1,120.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25802: vibuddhe tvayi buddhaṃ ca jagatsarvaṃ carācaram // NarP_1,120.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:25808: tataḥ prabhṛti viprendra gandhādyaiḥ pratyahaṃ yajet // NarP_1,120.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:25814: upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśa bhistataḥ saṃbhojya vai dvijān // NarP_1,120.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:25815: datvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ tebhyo visṛjyāśnīta bāndhavaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25817: sa sarvakāmāṃllabdhveha yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:25818: ekādaśyāṃ nabhaḥśukle pavitrāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:25821: datvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ tebhyaḥ putraṃ prāpyeha sadguṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:25834: tataḥ prabhāpte dvādaśyāṃ gandhādyairarcya vāmanam // NarP_1,120.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:25836: evaṃ yaḥ kurute vipra padmāvratamanuttamam // NarP_1,120.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:25837: bhuktiṃ prāpyeha muktiṃ tu labhateṃ'te prapañcataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25838: iṣasya kṛṣṇaikā daśyāmindirāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:25840: viṣṇoḥ prītikaraṃ vipra tataḥ prātarharerdine // NarP_1,120.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:25842: visṛjya dakṣiṇāṃ datvā tāṃstato 'śnīta ca svayam // NarP_1,120.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:25844: pitṝṇāṃ koṭimuddhṛtya yātyante vaiṣṇavaṃ gṛham // NarP_1,120.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:25848: bhaktyā praṇamya visṛjedaśnīyācca svayaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,120.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:25849: evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā naraḥ pāśāṅkuśāvratam /
GP12nardp1_u:25850: sa bhuktveha varānbhogānyāti viṣṇoḥ salokatām // NarP_1,120.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:25856: vyomayānena sāṃnidhyaṃ labhate ca ramāpateḥ // NarP_1,120.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:25862: snātvā nityakriyāṃ kṛtvā gadādāmodaraṃ yajet // NarP_1,120.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:25866: evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā bodhinīvratamādṛtaḥ // NarP_1,120.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:25870: tataḥ saṃbhojya viprāgryāndatvā tebhyaśca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,120.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:25873: sa vimānaṃ samāruhya yātyante vaiṣṇavaṃ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:25874: mārgasya śuklaikādaśyāṃ mokṣākhyāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:25877: visṛjya dakṣiṇāṃ datvā svayaṃ bhuñjīta bāndhavaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25878: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra bhuktvā bhogānihepsitān // NarP_1,120.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:25883: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra saphalāyā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,120.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:25885: pauṣasya śuklaikādaśyāṃ putradāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:25887: tataḥ saṃbhojya viprāgryāndatvā tebhyastu dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,120.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:25889: evaṃ kṛtavrato vipra bhukvā bhogānihepsitān // NarP_1,120.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:25891: māghamya kṛṣṇaikādaśyāṃ ṣaṭtilāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:25892: snātvā datvā tarpayitvā hutvā bhuktvā samarcya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:25893: tilaireva dvijaśreṣṭha dvādaśyāṃ prātareva hi // NarP_1,120.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:25896: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra vidhinā susamāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25900: bhojayitvā dakṣiṇāṃ ca datvā viprānvisṛjya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:25901: svayaṃ bhuñjīta taccheṣaṃ prayato nijabāndhavaiḥ // NarP_1,120.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:25902: ya evaṃ kurute vipra vrataṃ keśavatoṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:25903: sa bhuktveha varānbhogānante viṣṇoḥ padaṃ vrajet // NarP_1,120.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:25907: visṛjya bāndhavaiḥ sārddhaṃ svayamaśnīta vāgyataḥ // NarP_1,120.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:25909: dehānte vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ yāti devaiḥ susatkṛtaḥ // NarP_1,120.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:25915: sitaikādaśyāṃ tapasye vrajedviṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // NarP_1,120.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:25919: datvā tebhyo visṛjyātha svayaṃ bhuñjīta bāndhavaiḥ // NarP_1,120.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:25921: sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ vimānena tu bhāsvatā // NarP_1,120.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:25922: itthaṃ kṛṣṇo tathā śukle vrataṃ caikādaśībhavam /
GP12nardp1_u:25923: mokṣadaṃ kīrtitaṃ vipra nāstyasminsaṃśayaḥ kvacit // NarP_1,120.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:25925: sarvavratottamaṃ vipra tato jñeyaṃ mahāphalam // NarP_1,120.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:25931: daśamyāṃ daśa vastūni varjayedvaiṣṇavaṛ sadā // NarP_1,120.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:25932: dyūtakrīḍāṃ ca nidrāṃ ca tāṃbūlaṃ dantadhāvanam /
GP12nardp1_u:25933: parāpavādaṃ paiśunyaṃ steyaṃ hiṃsāṃ tathā ratim // NarP_1,120.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:25935: kāṃsyaṃ māṃsaṃ surāṃ kṣaudraṃ tailaṃ viṇmlecchabhāṣaṇam // NarP_1,120.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:25941: iti śrībṛhannāradīya purāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthabhāge dvādaśamāsastitaikādaśīvratakathanaṃ nāma viṃśatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25945: yāni kṛtvā naro loke viṣṇoḥ priyataro bhavet // NarP_1,121.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:25958: kāñcanaṃ kāmadevaṃ ca śuktāṃ gāṃ ca payasvinīm /
GP12nardp1_u:25964: svāstṛtāṃ tatra śayyāṃ tu kṛtvātra śrīyutaṃ harim /
GP12nardp1_u:25971: saptajanmasu bhuṅkte ca bhogān lokadvayepsitān // NarP_1,121.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:25983: tabhyo vāsāṃsi daṇḍāṃśca brahmasūtrāṇi mudrikāḥ // NarP_1,121.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:25985: dvādaśyāṃ tu nabhaḥśukle śrīdharaṃ pūjayedvratī // NarP_1,121.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25987: saṃbhojya dakṣiṇā raupyāṃ datvā natvā visarjjayet // NarP_1,121.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:25989: dvādaśyāṃ nabhasyaśukle vratī saṃpūjya vāmanam // NarP_1,121.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:25991: sauvarṇī dakṣiṇāṃ datvā viṣṇuprītikaro bhavet // NarP_1,121.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:25998: tatra vatsayutāṃ gāṃ tu samālikhya sugandhibhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26007: surabhi tvaṃ jaganmātā nityaṃ viṣṇupade sthitā // NarP_1,121.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:26011: taddine tailapakvaṃ ca sthālīpakvaṃ dvijottama // NarP_1,121.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:26012: gokṣīraṃ goghṛtaṃ caiva dadhi takraṃ ca varjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:26019: dehānte viṣṇusāyujyaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,121.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:26023: hutvā tatra samuddīpte raupya dīpikayā mune // NarP_1,121.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:26025: tatraivānugatāṃ lakṣmīṃ brahmāṇīṃ caṇḍikāṃ tathā // NarP_1,121.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:26026: ādityaṃ śaṅkaraṃ gaurīṃ yakṣaṃ gaṇapatiṃ grahān /
GP12nardp1_u:26029: namo jayeti śabdaiśca ghaṇṭāśaṅkhā diniḥsvanaiḥ // NarP_1,121.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:26033: rājacihnāni sarvāṇi cchatrādīni ca nārada // NarP_1,121.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:26042: yeṣāṃ rāṣṭre pure grāme kriyate śāntiruttamā /
GP12nardp1_u:26043: nīrājanābhidhā vipra tadrogā yānti saṃkṣayam // NarP_1,121.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:26045: manobhavastathā prāṇo naro yātaśca vīryavān // NarP_1,121.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:26047: vibhuścāpi prabhuścaiva sādhyā dvādaśa kīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,121.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:26053: dhātāmitror'yamā pūṣā śakroṃ'śo varuṇo bhagaḥ // NarP_1,121.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:26055: pratimāsaṃ tu śuklāyāṃ dvādaśyāmarcya yatnataḥ // NarP_1,121.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:26056: varṣaṃ nayedvratānte tu pratimā dvādaśāpi ca /
GP12nardp1_u:26057: haimīḥ saṃpūjya vidhinā bhojayitvā dvijottamān // NarP_1,121.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:26059: eva vrataṃ naraḥ kṛtvā dvādaśādityasaṃjñakam // NarP_1,121.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:26061: jāyate bhuvi dharmātmā mānuṣye rogavarjitaḥ // NarP_1,121.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:26064: nirañjanaṃ nirā kāraṃ nirdvandvaṃ brahma cāpnuyāt /
GP12nardp1_u:26069: tataḥ samānte tāṃ mūrtiṃ samabhyarcya vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,121.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:26075: iti kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra prīṇayitvā janārdanam // NarP_1,121.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:26076: sauvarṇena vimānena yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:26081: śoṣayedātape dhṛtvā pātre tāmre 'tha mṛnmaye // NarP_1,121.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:26083: sauvarṇīṃ pratimāṃ viṣṇorniśāyāṃ jāgaraṃ caret // NarP_1,121.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:26085: tataḥ prabhāte dvādaśyāṃ tilapātropari sthitām // NarP_1,121.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:26090: vaiṣṇavyātha ca pūraṇāṃ ca śatamaṣṭottara tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26093: viprebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā datvā natvā visarjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:26094: naro vā yadi vā nārī vrataṃ kṛtvaivamādarāt // NarP_1,121.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:26098: pītvā gaśṛṅgavāryādau tāṃ ca kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam // NarP_1,121.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:26104: candanaṃ palikaṃ vastraṃ pañcahastonmitaṃ tanum // NarP_1,121.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:26105: evaṃ tu māsikaṃ dānaṃ kṛtvā prāśya yathākramam /
GP12nardp1_u:26106: gomūtraṃ jalamājyaṃ vā paktvā śākaṃ caturvidham // NarP_1,121.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:26109: evaṃ kṛtavrato varṣaṃ sauvarṇīṃ pratimāṃ raveḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26110: kṛtvā vai tāmrapātrasthāṃ nyasyābhyarcya vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,121.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:26112: viprāndrādaśa saṃbhojya tebhyo dadyācca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,121.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:26116: abhyacya vidhivadbhaktyā suvarṇaṃ tanmukhe nyaset // NarP_1,121.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:26122: antye sitāyāṃ dvādaśyāṃ sauvarṇīṃ pratimāṃ hareḥ // NarP_1,121.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:26127: jayā ca vijayā caiva jayantī cāparājitā /
GP12nardp1_u:26128: etā aṣṭau sadopoṣyā dvādaśyaḥ pāpahārikāḥ // NarP_1,121.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:26130: kīdṛśaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brahmannetāsāṃ kiṃ phalaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:26131: tatsarvaṃ me samācakṣva yāścanyāḥ puṇyadāyukāḥ // NarP_1,121.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:26134: praśasya bhrātaraṃ prāha mahābhāgavataṃ muniḥ // NarP_1,121.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:26136: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā bhrātaḥ sādhūnāṃ saṃśayacchidā /
GP12nardp1_u:26137: vakṣye mahādvādaśīnāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca phalaṃ pṛthak // NarP_1,121.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:26139: tadā tu trispṛśā nāma dvādaśī sā mahāphalā // NarP_1,121.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:26143: tadā tāṃ saṃparityajya dvādaśīṃ samupoṣayet // NarP_1,121.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:26147: tadā vañjulikākhyāṃ tu tāṃ tyaktvopoṣayetsadā // NarP_1,121.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:26152: kuhūrāke yadā vṛddhe syātāṃ vipra yadā tadā /
GP12nardp1_u:26153: pakṣavarddhanikā nāma dvādaśī sā mahāphalā // NarP_1,121.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:26156: yadā tu dhavale pakṣe dvādaśī syānmadhānvitā //ṭha
GP12nardp1_u:26157: tadā proktā jayā nāma sarvaśatruvināśinī // NarP_1,121.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:26161: tadā sā vijayā nāma tasyāmacedgadādharam // NarP_1,121.107 //
GP12nardp1_u:26165: dvādaśī sā mahāpuṇyā jayantī nāmataḥ smṛtā // NarP_1,121.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:26169: yadā tu syātsite pakṣe dvādaśī jīvabhānvitā // NarP_1,121.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:26175: tadā vratadvayaṃ kāryyaṃ na doṣo 'traikadaivatam // NarP_1,121.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:26177: ūrjje sitāyāṃ dvādaśyāmantyabhe ca vratadvayam // NarP_1,121.115 //
GP12nardp1_u:26180: ekādaśyā vrataṃ nityaṃ dvādaśyāḥ sahitaṃ yataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26182: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe bṛhadupākhyāne pūrvabhāge caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasya dvādaśīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikaviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:26186: yāni kṛtvā naro bhaktyā subhago jāyate bhuvi // NarP_1,122.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:26188: kṛtvā saṃpūjya yatnena vījeyavdyajanena ca // NarP_1,122.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:26196: namo mārāya kāmāya kāmadevasya mūrttaye // NarP_1,122.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:26201: evaṃ yaḥ kurute vipra varṣe varṣe mahotsavam /
GP12nardp1_u:26202: vasaṃtasamaye prāpte hṛṣṭaḥ puṣṭaḥ sadaiva saḥ // NarP_1,122.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:26204: madanaṃ hṛdbhavaṃ kāmaṃ manmathaṃ ca ratipriyam // NarP_1,122.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:26208: ajāyā dānamapyuktaṃ snātvā nadyā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,122.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:26210: bhūyastvanena dānena sa loke naiva jāyate // NarP_1,122.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:26211: yadīyaṃ śaninā yuktā sā mahāvāruṇī smṛtā /
GP12nardp1_u:26213: śubhayogaḥ śatarkṣaṃ ca śanau kāme madhau site /
GP12nardp1_u:26218: evameva vrataṃ kāryaṃ varṣānte gāmalaṅkṛtām // NarP_1,122.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:26222: śvetamandāramarkaṃ vā karavīraṃ ca raktakam // NarP_1,122.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:26225: pūjitā mama daurbhāgyaṃ nāśayantu namo 'stu vaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26226: itthaṃ yor'cayate bhaktyā varṣe varṣe drumatrayam // NarP_1,122.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:26227: naśyate tasya daurbhāgyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:26230: haimyau raupyau ca mṛnmapyau yathāśaktyā vidhāya ca // NarP_1,122.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:26233: tataḥ pañcadinaṃ pūjā caikabhaktaṃ vrataṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:26234: tṛtīyadivase prātaḥ snātvā saṃpūjya tau punaḥ // NarP_1,122.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:26236: varṣe varṣe tataḥ paścādvidheyaṃ varṣapañcakam // NarP_1,122.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:26238: itthaṃ naro vā nārī vā kṛtvā vratamidaṃ śubham // NarP_1,122.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:26242: kṛtopavāsā kanyaiva nārī vā dvijasattama // NarP_1,122.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:26243: tāmre vā mṛnmaye vāpi sauvarṇe rājate tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:26246: satakṛtya bhojya pratime dadyāttābhyāṃ sadakṣiṇe // NarP_1,122.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:26250: lakṣmīnārāyaṇaṃ kṛtvā sauvarṇaṃ vāpi rājatam // NarP_1,122.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:26252: pīṭhe vinyasya vastrāḍhyaṃ gandhādyaiḥ paripūjayet // NarP_1,122.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:26254: evaṃ dinatrayaṃ kṛtvā vratānte māsamarcya ca // NarP_1,122.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:26257: tāsāṃ madhye tu yā nandā tasyai dhenvai namo namaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26259: gāvo mamāgrataḥ santu gāvo me saṃtu pṛṣṭhataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26260: gāvo me pārśvataḥ saṃtu gavāṃ madhye vasāmyaham // NarP_1,122.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:26266: haimaṃ hyaśokaṃ nirmāya pūjayitvā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,122.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:26272: samabhyarcya vidhānena dvijaṃ saṃbhojya dāpayet // NarP_1,122.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:26276: pradoṣe tailadīpaṃ tu prajvālyābhyarcya yatnataḥ // NarP_1,122.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:26278: evaṃ kṛte tu viprendra yamapīḍā na jāyate // NarP_1,122.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:26280: punaḥ snātvā pradoṣe tu vāgyataḥ susamāhitaḥ // NarP_1,122.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:26285: tataḥ stuvīta deveśaṃ śivaṃ nāmnāṃ śatena ca /
GP12nardp1_u:26286: tāni nāmāni kīrtyante sarvābhīṣṭapradāni vai // NarP_1,122.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:26288: kaparddine sureśāya vyomakeśāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:26292: vyālapriyāya vyālāya vyālānāṃ pataye namaḥ // NarP_1,122.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:26296: vedagītāya guptāya vedaguhyāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:26298: namo jagatpratiṣṭhāya vyomarūpāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:26304: trinetrāya trivedāya vedāṅgāya namo namaḥ // NarP_1,122.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:26306: viśvarūpāya viśvāya viśvanāthāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:26308: arūpāya virūpāya sūkṣmasūkṣmāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:26313: namaḥ prabhāvarūpāya prabhāvārthāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:26315: triyaṃbakāya śitikaṇṭhabhārgiṇe gaurīyuje maṅgalahetave namaḥ // NarP_1,122.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:26325: evaṃ kṛte tu vidhivadvratī saubhāgyabhājanaḥ // NarP_1,122.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:26331: prayāge māghamāse tu tryahaṃ snātasya yatphalam /
GP12nardp1_u:26333: tatra snānaṃ japo homo dānaṃ cānantyamaśnute /
GP12nardp1_u:26334: phaālgune tu site pakṣe trayodaśyāmupoṣitaḥ // NarP_1,122.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:26340: tato vratānte tu punaḥ sauvarṇaṃ dhananāyakam // NarP_1,122.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:26347: guruṃ samarcya vastrādyaiḥ pratimāṃ tāṃ nivedayet /
GP12nardp1_u:26348: dvijebhyo dakṣaṇāṃ śaktyā datvā natvā visṛjya ca // NarP_1,122.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:26350: evaṃ kṛte vrate vipra nirdhanaḥ prāpya vaibhavam // NarP_1,122.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:26351: modate bhuvi vikhyāto rājarāja ivāparaḥ // NarP_1,122.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:26352: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvādaśamāsasthitatrayodaśīvratakathanaṃ nāma dvāviṃśadadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:26355: śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi caturdaśyā vratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:26356: yāni kṛtvā naro loke sarvānkāmānavāpnuyāt // NarP_1,123.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:26367: datvā mantraṃ dvijāgryāya bhuñjīta ca pare 'hani /
GP12nardp1_u:26368: evameva tu kṛṣṇāsu sarvāsu dvijasattama // NarP_1,123.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:26372: niśāgame tu saṃpūjya nṛsiṃhaṃ daityasūdanam // NarP_1,123.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:26380: varṣe varṣe sa labhate bhuktabhogo hareḥ padam // NarP_1,123.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:26382: durlabhaṃ vārcanaṃ tatra darśanaṃ pāpanāśanam // NarP_1,123.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:26388: evaṃ yaḥ pūjayetpaiṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ sarvārthasiddhidam // NarP_1,123.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:26396: śatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā tato devyai nivedayet // NarP_1,123.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:26402: gandhādyaiḥ prāk samabhyarcyaḥ kārpāsaṃ paṭṭajaṃ tu vā // NarP_1,123.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:26404: tataḥ purāṇamuttārya sūtraṃ kṣiptvā jalāśayeṃ // NarP_1,123.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:26410: suśobhane nyasettatra kalaśaṃ tāmrajaṃ mune // NarP_1,123.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:26412: pītapaṭṭāṃśukācchannāṃ tatra tāṃ vidhinā yajet // NarP_1,123.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:26414: tato homaṃ haviṣyeṇa kṛtvā pūrṇāhutiṃ caret // NarP_1,123.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:26415: śayyāṃ sopaskarāṃ dhenuṃ pratimāṃ ca dvijottama /
GP12nardp1_u:26420: kadalīvratamapyatra tadvidhānaṃ ca me śṛṇu // NarP_1,123.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:26421: naro vā yadi vā nārī raṃbhāmupavanasthitām /
GP12nardp1_u:26424: evaṃ saṃpūjya mantreṇa tataḥ saṃprārthayerdvatī // NarP_1,123.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:26426: śarīrārogyalāvaṇyaṃ dehi devi namo 'stu te // NarP_1,123.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:26427: iti saṃprārthyaṃ kanyāstu catasro vā suvāsinīḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26429: namaskṛtya nijaṃ gehaṃ samāpya niyamaṃ vrajet /
GP12nardp1_u:26430: evaṃ kṛte vrate vipra labdhvā saubhāgyamuttamam // NarP_1,123.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:26436: tarpaṇaṃ ca gavāṃ grāsaṃ baliṃ caiva śvakākayoḥ // NarP_1,123.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:26438: evaṃ yaḥ kurute vipra śrāddhaṃ saṃpannadakṣiṇam // NarP_1,123.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:26444: sa bhuktveha varānbhogāndivaṃ dharmājñayā vrajet // NarP_1,123.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:26451: snātvā viśveśvaro devo devaiḥ saha munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:26452: maṇikarṇika tīrthe ca tripuṇḍraṃ bhasmanā dadhat // NarP_1,123.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:26462: śvetāyāḥ kṣīramuditaṃ raktāyāśca tathā dadhi // NarP_1,123.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:26464: kuśāṃ bunā tataḥ prātaḥ snātvā santarpyaṃ devatāḥ // NarP_1,123.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:26467: yacca bālye kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kaumāre vārddhake 'pi yat /
GP12nardp1_u:26476: pare 'hni prātarutthāya snātvā somaṃ maheśvaram // NarP_1,123.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:26485: tatsthaṃ dvijātaye dattvā modate divi devavat /
GP12nardp1_u:26490: kṛśarānnaṃ svayaṃ cāpi tadevāśnīta vāgyataḥ // NarP_1,123.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:26498: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ martyo mahādevaprasādataḥ // NarP_1,123.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:26502: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra durgāyāścaikabhojanaḥ // NarP_1,123.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:26506: udyāpane tu sarvāṃsāṃ sāmānyo vidhirucyate // NarP_1,123.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:26510: pātrāṇi yajñasūtrāṇi tāvatyeva hi kalpayet // NarP_1,123.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:26512: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthabhāge dvādaśamāsasthitacaturdaśīvratavarṇanaṃ nāma trayoviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:26515: atha nārada vakṣyāmi śṛṇu pūrṇāvratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:26516: yāni kṛtvā naro nārī prāpnuyātsukhasaṃtatim // NarP_1,124.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:26522: śṛtānnamudakuṃbhaṃ ca vaiśākhyāṃ vai dvijottame // NarP_1,124.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:26524: atra kṛṣṇājinaṃ dadyātsakhuraṃ ca saśṛṅgakam // NarP_1,124.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:26528: modate viṣṇu loke hi yāvaccandrārkatārakam // NarP_1,124.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:26530: yaḥ pradadyāddvijāgryebhyaḥ sa na śocati karhicit // NarP_1,124.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:26536: patyā sahāviyogaṃ me vaṭasthe kuru te namaḥ // NarP_1,124.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:26537: iti saprārthya yā nārī bhojayitvā pare 'hani /
GP12nardp1_u:26543: evaṃvidhaṃ hariṃ tatra snātvā pūjāṃ samācaret /
GP12nardp1_u:26551: pūrṇāntaṃ śrāvaṇe māsi gaurīrūpāṃ ca kokilām /
GP12nardp1_u:26556: gandhādyaiḥ pratyahaṃ prārccellikhitāṃ varṇakaiḥ paṭe // NarP_1,124.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:26557: tato vratānte haimīṃ vā tilapiṣṭamayīṃ dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:26560: saṃpūjya dattā viprāya sarvasaukhyakarī bhava // NarP_1,124.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:26562: vastrādidakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā datvā natvā visarjayet // NarP_1,124.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:26569: rakṣāvidhānaṃ ca tathā kartavyaṃ vidhipūrvakam // NarP_1,124.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:26570: siddhārthākṣatarājikāśca vidhṛtā raktāṃśukāṃśe sitāḥ kausuṃbhena ca tantunātha salilaiḥ prakṣālya kāṃsye dhṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26571: gandhādyairabhipūjya devanikarānsaṃprārthya viṣṇvādikānbadhnīyāddvijahastataḥ pramudito natvā prakoṣṭhe svake // NarP_1,124.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:26576: kṛte hyasminvrate vipra vārṣikaṃ karmaṃ vaidikam /
GP12nardp1_u:26577: vismṛtaṃ vidhihīnaṃ ca na kṛtaṃ sukṛtaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,124.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:26579: ekabhuktaśca yastāṃ tu śivaṃ saṃpūjya yatnataḥ // NarP_1,124.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:26580: kṛtāñjaliḥ prārthayecchvaḥ kariṣye ca vrataṃ prabho /
GP12nardp1_u:26581: evaṃ vijñāpya devaṃ tu gṛhṇīyādvratamuttamam // NarP_1,124.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:26587: punaḥ saṃpūjya tatraiva rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ caret // NarP_1,124.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:26591: haimā raupyā mṛnmayāśca ghaṭāḥ pañcadaśottamāḥ // NarP_1,124.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:26597: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ caiva umāmāheśvarābhidham // NarP_1,124.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:26607: tena snātvā vidhānena sopavāso jitendriyaḥ // NarP_1,124.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:26615: yāmamātre gate rātryā lakṣmyai tadvinivedayet // NarP_1,124.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:26620: niśīthe carate loke ko jāgartiṃ dharātale /
GP12nardp1_u:26621: tasmai vittaṃ prayacchāmi jāgrate pūjakāya me // NarP_1,124.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:26628: kīṭāḥ pataṅgā maśakāśca vṛkṣā jale sthale ye vicaranti jīvāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26629: dṛṣṭvā pradīpānnahi te 'pi janminaḥ punaśca muktiṃ hi labhanta eva ca // NarP_1,124.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:26630: atra candrodaye vipra saṃpūjyāḥ kṛttikāśca ṣaṭ // NarP_1,124.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:26634: evaṃ devānsamabhyarcya dīpo deyo gṛhādbahiḥ // NarP_1,124.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:26637: gavāṃ kṣīreṇa saṃpūrya haimaṃ tatra vinikṣipet /
GP12nardp1_u:26639: mahāmatsyāya ca nama iti mantraṃ samuccaran /
GP12nardp1_u:26643: atra kṛttvā vṛṣotsargaṃ vrataṃ naktaṃ ca nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:26648: purandaraśca somaśca tathā tiṣyo bṛhaspatiḥ // NarP_1,124.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:26654: dṛṣṭvā ca maṅgalaṃ dravyaṃ spṛṣṭvā natvā tator'cayet // NarP_1,124.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:26658: alakṣmīnāśanaṃ caiva modateha paratra ca // NarP_1,124.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:26664: phaālgune pūrṇimāyāṃ tu holikāpūjanaṃ matam // NarP_1,124.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:26668: atastvāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi bhūte bhūtipradā bhava” // NarP_1,124.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:26674: iti jānīhi viprendra loke sthitiranekadhā // NarP_1,124.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:26681: jyeṣṭhāmāyāṃ vrataṃ proktaṃ sāvitryāḥ kasya nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:26683: śucau nabhasi bhādre ca māse pūrṇāntike dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:26690: ūrjjāmāyāṃ dīpadānaṃ devā gāragṛheṣu ca // NarP_1,124.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:26692: samarcanaṃ tathā lakṣmyāḥ svarṇaraupye kṛtākṛte // NarP_1,124.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:26698: pauṣe māghe ca viprendra pitṛśrāddhaṃ phalādhikam // NarP_1,124.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:26700: phaālgune kevalaṃ śrāddhaṃ dvijānāṃ bhojanaṃ tathā // NarP_1,124.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:26702: itthaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ tithikṛtyaṃ mune tava // NarP_1,124.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:26703: sarvatrāpi viśeṣo 'sti sa purāṇāntare sthitaḥ // NarP_1,124.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:26704: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitapaurṇamāsya māvāsyāvratakathanaṃ nāma caturviṃśatyadhikaśatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:26707: ityevamuktvā muninā hi pṛṣṭāste vai kumārāḥ kila nāradena /
GP12nardp1_u:26708: saṃpūjitāḥ śāstravidāṃ variṣṭhāḥ kṛtāhnikā jagmurumeśalokam // NarP_1,125.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:26712: jagmustato jñānaghanasvarūpā natvā purāriṃ svapiturnikāśam // NarP_1,125.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:26713: tatpādapadme praṇatiṃ vidhāya pitrāpi satkṛtya sabhājitāste /
GP12nardp1_u:26714: labdhvāśiṣo 'dyāpi caranti śaśvallokeṣu tīrthāni ca tīrthabhūtāḥ // NarP_1,125.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:26716: dadhyuściraṃ viṣṇupadābjamavyayaṃ dhyāyanti yadyatayo vītarāgāḥ // NarP_1,125.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:26718: labdhvā jñānaṃ savijñānaṃ bhṛśaṃ prītamanā hyabhūt // NarP_1,125.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:26720: praṇamya satkṛtaḥ pitrā brahmaṇā niṣasāda ca // NarP_1,125.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:26722: varṇayāmāsa tattvena so 'pi śrutvā mumoda ca // NarP_1,125.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:26736: atha śvetābhrasadṛśe śṛṅge tasya ca bhūbhṛtaḥ // NarP_1,125.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:26742: taṃ dṛṣṭvā nārado viprā bhaktinamrātmakandharaḥ // NarP_1,125.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:26746: athāpṛcchacca kuśalaṃ nāradaṃ jagatāṃ guruḥ // NarP_1,125.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:26747: sa ca prāha prasādena bhavataḥ sarvamasti me /
GP12nardp1_u:26748: sarveṣāṃ yogivaryāṇāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ tatra vāḍavāḥ // NarP_1,125.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:26750: sa śivaḥ sādaraṃ tasya bhaktyā saṃtuṣṭamānasaḥ // NarP_1,125.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:26752: sa labdhvā śāṃbhavaṃ jñānaṃ śaṅkarāllokaśaṅkarāt // NarP_1,125.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:26756: etadvaḥ kīrtitaṃ viprā nāradīyaṃ mahanmayā // NarP_1,125.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:26762: setau kāñcyāṃ kuśasthalyāṃ gaṅgādvāre kuśasthale // NarP_1,125.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:26764: sa labhetsarvaya jñānāṃ tīrthānāṃ ca phalaṃ mahat // NarP_1,125.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:26770: kathitaḥ sarvapāpaghnaḥ paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ sadā // NarP_1,125.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:26775: tapasāṃ ca vratānāṃ ca phalānāṃ saṃprakāśakam /
GP12nardp1_u:26776: mantrāṇāṃ caiva yantrāṇāṃ vedāṅgānāṃ vibhāgaśaḥ // NarP_1,125.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:26778: ya etatpaṭhate bhaktyā śṛṇuyādvā samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,125.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:26780: śrutvedaṃ nāradīyaṃ tu purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam // NarP_1,125.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:26784: yastu vyākurute viprāḥ purāṇaṃ dharmasaṃgraham // NarP_1,125.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:26786: kāyena manasā vācā dhanādyairapi saṃtatam // NarP_1,125.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:26788: śrutvā purāṇaṃ vidhivaddhomaṃ kṛtvā surārcanam // NarP_1,125.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:26790: dakṣiṇāṃ pradadecchaktyā bhaktyā prīyeta mādhavaḥ // NarP_1,125.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:26791: yathā śreṣṭhā nadī gaṅgā puṣkaraṃ ca saro yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:26792: kāśī purī nago merurdevo nārāyaṇo hariḥ // NarP_1,125.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:26794: mārgo mṛgendraḥ puruṣo 'śvatthaḥ prahlāda ānanam // NarP_1,125.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:26795: uccaiḥ śravā vasaṃtaśca japaḥ śeṣor'yamā dhanuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26796: pāvako viṣṇurindraśca kapilo vākpatiḥ kaviḥ // NarP_1,125.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:26800: śāntirastu śivaṃ cāstu sarveṣāṃ vo dvijottamāḥ // NarP_1,125.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:26805: śrutaṃ samyaganuṣṭhāya tatra tasthuśca satriṇaḥ // NarP_1,125.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:26807: sa tu nirviṣamanasā sametya yāgaṃ labhate satamabhīpsitaṃ hi lokam // NarP_1,125.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:26808: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde purāṇamahimāvarṇanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
